Powers require energy.
Absorb this energy sphere...

/lotus/language/game/tutorialwarframepow.value: Warframe Power TEMPORARILY unlocked. Use the Arsenal to upgrade weapons and unlock powers as you level up...

/lotus/language/game/uranusdesc.value: Remote Grineer bases focus on research and development of bio-modification and gene repair.

/lotus/language/game/venusdesc.value: The Corpus have focused their manufacturing facilities in this area.

/lotus/language/game/voiddesc.value: Ancient Orokin places are hidden here.

/lotus/language/game/vortwodesc.value:
I was cut in half, destroyed, but through its Janus Key, the Void called to me. It brought me here and here I was reborn. 

–Vor

/lotus/language/game/wardenleaderdesc.value: Life leech weapon, increased speed, weak to stealth takedowns

/lotus/language/gamemodes/annihilationde.value:
Fight against seven other Tenno in this free-for-all arena.

Annihilate the Oro, by collecting it to gain a point.

Beware that if another enemy annihilates the Oro, they will gain the point instead.

The Tenno with the most points at the end of the match is declared the winner.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/assassinationd.value: Assassination contracts mark high priority targets around the system. Hunt down and eliminate these enemies, then head to extraction.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/capturecephalo.value:
Tenno pit their prowess and techniques against one another, as two teams fight each other in an attempt to capture the opposing team's Cephalon, while protecting their own.

A Tenno must make their way into the opposing team's territory, and run into the opposing Cephalon to capture it. If the opposition defeat the Tenno before they can capture it, the Cephalon will be dropped. For a short time, the Cephalon will remain where it was dropped and will be returned if an opponent runs over it, or picked up if an ally runs over it.

Bringing an opponent's Cephalon to your own Cephalon will capture it, and award your team a point.

The first team to gain three points, or the team with the highest amount of points when time runs out wins the match.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/capturedesc.value:
The location of an enemy VIP has been discovered. Track them down and then capture them. Watch out, as these enemies would rather run from combat than fight. If they see you, they will run towards the nearest extraction point. Defeat them before they can escape.

Once a target is downed, press <USE> to capture these targets and teleport them to a waiting holding facility.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/conclavedesc.value:
Compete against other Tenno individually or in pairs. In order to hold fair competition, Tenno can only compete against other Tenno of similar Conclave Rating. Every piece of gear has its own Conclave Rating, based on its power. A Tenno's Conclave Rating is based on the sum ratings of their gear.

Different conclave missions around the system have different conclave score requirements. This allows Tenno to compete against other Tenno with the same level of gear.

In conclave matches, Tenno will spawn in with no energy. The maps will spawn health orbs, energy orbs and ammo packs at various points around the mission to aid Tenno.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/deceptiondesc.value: Enter the enemy ship, and hack their navigation console to redirect their path. At the start of deception missions, a data mass will spawn next to the Tenno. It can be picked up with the <USE> key, but will prevent the carrier from using their primary weapon. Take the datamass through the mission and place it in the enemy navigation console.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/defensedesc.value: Defend an important target against waves of enemy units. If the defense target is destroyed, the mission automatically fails. Every 5 waves choose to stay and fight or extract from the mission.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/excavationdesc.value:
At the start of the mission, objective markers will appear showing the location of Excavators. 

Travel to these points, and use Power Cores to activate the Excavators. Defend the Excavator until it can unearth what it was looking for. Up to three excavators can be activated at the same time.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/exterminatedes.value: Enter the level and kill every enemy you encounter. Leave no one standing.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/hijackdesc.value:
Hijack an enemy transport and escort it to extraction. Guard the vehicle from enemies as it moves along a path. 

In order to make the target move, Tenno must stand next to the cart and use energy from their shields to power it. As the shields drain, the cart will move along the path towards extraction. The more Tenno giving shield power, the faster the transport moves. The transport will lose health over time, so speed is critical to ensuring success.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/hivesabotagede.value:
These Sabotage missions are set in an infested Hive. There are three major Hives around the level, however each of these are invincible at first. Growing near the Hives are 5 Tumor Nodes that have to be located and destroyed. Once the Tumors are all destroyed, the Hive will become vulnerable to attacks.

After a Hive is destroyed, it will activate one of six different traps that will trigger for the remainder of the mission. Once all three have been destroyed, Tenno will have to reach extraction with three traps active.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/interceptionde.value:
Use enemy relay stations to intercept and decode important enemy transmissions.

Interception missions have 4 relay points. Standing beside these relay stations will begin to capture the point. The enemy will spawn endlessly and attempt to take and hold their own points. 

When you capture a point, it will start decoding a message. The more points you hold, the faster the decoding will occur. When you fully decode a message, you will have the option of leaving or staying to decode another. The more messages you decode, the tougher the enemies will become.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/invasiondesc.value:
The Corpus and Grineer are fighting for control of this planet. Choose one faction to represent in the conflict. Your faction will fight with you as you exterminate the enemy forces.

This mission can be repeated until one faction has completely taken control. If enough missions for the same faction are completed, they may see fit to grant you battle pay. Battle Pay can only be earned for a single faction.

Information for progress of the conflict can be found on the Solar Chart. Once a faction wins enough battles, the conflict will end.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/mobiledefensed.value:
In Mobile Defense missions, Tenno must find and defend multiple consoles while the Lotus hacks into enemy systems. A datamass will spawn, and the Tenno must carry it to one of the nearby targets.

Take the datamass to one of the targets, place it in the console by pressing <USE>, then defend the target. When the timer is completed, pick up the datamass and move to the next target. When all the targets have been defended, head to extraction.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/recoverydesc.value:
When a Tenno is defeated by the Zanuka hunter, they are immediately taken to the Recovery mission. Tenno will start the level with no weapons or Warframe, and will have to search through the level for their missing gear.

With no weapons, Tenno can only use their fists for attacking so using Stealth attacks can be an effective method of taking enemies down.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/rescuedesc.value:
A valuable ally has been captured by the enemy. Infiltrate their stronghold and search for the prison. Once there, hack the door and free the prisoner.  Be warned, the prison cell has been rigged with a killswitch. If the Wardens detect an intrusion they will start an execution sequence. Failure to rescue the hostage before that sequence finishes will result in their termination.

Once the prisoner is free, they will begin to follow the Tenno. Protect them and get them to extraction

Tenno can choose to give the Rescue target a weapon to help defend themselves. Walk up to the target and press <USE> to give them your secondary weapon.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/sabotagedesc.value: Infiltrate the enemy hold, and cripple their operation by striking at vulnerable points. The mini map will lead you to the target. Once it has been destroyed, get to extraction as fast as possible.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/spydesc.value:
This is an espionage mission. Tenno must search through enemy ships and outposts to find Data Vaults containing crucial Intel. 

The Data Vaults are guarded by a myriad of security measures, from laser traps to Sensor Drones. Tenno should attempt to extract the Intel without being detected. If the enemy detects any intrusion, Tenno will only have a short time to retrieve the Intel before it is destroyed. 

Most missions will contain multiple Data Vaults, the number of successful extractions required changes by mission.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/survivaldesc.value:
The enemy has cut off life-support systems. The Lotus is able to drop in small life support reserves periodically, these will be marked on the mini-map. To maintain life support Tenno must activate these as they appear. 

Enemies themselves have a chance to drop smaller tanks of life-support. These will help keep the life-support levels up between the larger canister drops. If life support runs out Tenno will begin to suffocate and take damage. At this point the only options are extraction or death.

The longer Tenno survive, the more rewards they will receive but the tougher the enemies will become.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/teamannihilati.value:
Join three team mates and battle against an opposing team of four players.

Defeating your enemies will cause them to drop an Oro.

Either yourself or a team mate can annihilate the Oro by collecting it, granting your team a point.

Other enemies can deny your team the point, if they are able to annihilate the Oro dropped by their fallen team mate.

The team with the most points at the end of the match is declared the winner.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/trialdesc.value:
Trials are deadly challenges that will allow up to eight Tenno to work together to overcome the greatest threats in the Origin System.

Tenno will be expected to survive unique traps, and solve elaborate puzzles before facing off against exceptionally powerful opponents.

The rewards for completing a trial are among the most exotic in the system, but are only attainable once per day.

/lotus/language/gametips/emberdesc.value:
Ember is a nightmare for light-armored targets.
Ember can super-heat the air which opens up surprising crowd-control possibilities.

/lotus/language/gametips/excaliburdesc.value:
Excalibur is well balanced for beginner players.
It features devastating blade attacks.

/lotus/language/gametips/heavymeleedesc_.value:
Hold <NEXT_INV> to holster your current weapon, and draw your melee weapon.
You can switch back to your firearms by holding <NEXT_INV>

Hold <NEXT_INV> to holster your current weapon, and draw your melee weapon.
You can switch back to your firearms by holding <NEXT_INV>

Hold <NEXT_INV> to holster your current weapon, and draw your melee weapon.
You can switch back to your firearms by holding <NEXT_INV>

/lotus/language/gametips/levelupdesc.value:
Warframes and weaponry Level Up as you use them!
Leveling up increases power and unlocks Mod slots for your weaponry.

/lotus/language/gametips/lokidesc.value:
For the advanced player, Loki offers a variety of unique tools to reconfigure the battlefield.
While lacking direct damage abilities, Loki gives creative players the edge in combat.

/lotus/language/gametips/lootdesc.value:
Be on the look out for upgrades!
Destroy supply crates and search open containers.

/lotus/language/gametips/magdesc.value:
Control of magnetic forces gives Mag the edge in one-on-one combat.
Mastering Mag grants a devastating attack that can reverse the tide of any battle.

/lotus/language/gametips/mistdesc.value:
Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat.
Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_fusionammo.value: Mods of the same polarity provide twice the fusion energy than Mods of different polarities.
Get the most fusion energy out of your mods by fusing duplicates.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_fusionener.value: Rare mods require more energy to rank up. They also provide more energy when fused.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_transmuter.value: The rarity of mods being transmuted will increase the odds of producing a rare mod.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_transmutes.value: The item compatability of mods being transmuted will influence the item compatibility of the mod you receive.
The polarity of mods being transmuted will influence the polarity of the mod you receive.

/lotus/language/gametips/modsdesc.value:
Search for rare Mods dropped by downed enemies.
Apply Mods in the Arsenal screen to increase the power of your weaponry or add stunning new effects!

/lotus/language/gametips/rhinodesc.value:
A must-have for defensive players, the Rhino is the heaviest Warframe.
The Rhino's charge is devastating.

/lotus/language/gametips/slidedesc.value: Press <CROUCH> while sprinting to perform a slide manuever.

/lotus/language/gametips/slidedesc_alt.value: Hold <HOLD_CROUCH> while sprinting to perform a slide manuever.

/lotus/language/gametips/trinitydesc.value:
Trinity is great for players who prefer a supportive role.
Warframes with healing technology are rare, making Trinity a great equalizer when the odds are stacked against a group of Tenno.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_aurasa.value: Aura mods add to your total mod capacity.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_blastc.value:
Combine Heat <DT_FIRE> and Cold <DT_FREEZE> to create Blast <DT_EXPLOSION> damage.
Very effective against machinery.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_capaci.value: Capacity is the larger of a Weapon's Rank and your Mastery Rank, and is doubled if an Orokin Reactor or Catalyst is installed.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_coldda.value: Cold <DT_FREEZE> damage can slow down enemies and deal damage.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_corros.value:
Combine Electricity <DT_ELECTRICITY> and Toxin <DT_POISON> to create Corrosive <DT_CORROSIVE> damage.
Very effective against ferrite armor.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_differ.value: Enemies are resistant and vulnerable to various elements. Use the Codex scanner to learn about them.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_electr.value: Electricity <DT_ELECTRICITY> damage is capable of stunning and damaging enemies.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_elemen.value: Combine primary elemental damage types to create secondary ones.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_fireda.value: Heat <DT_FIRE> damage will burn and scorch foes.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_gascom.value:
Combine Heat <DT_FIRE> and Toxin <DT_POISON> to create Gas <DT_GAS> damage.
Very effective against infested.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_magnet.value:
Combine Cold <DT_FREEZE> and Electricity <DT_ELECTRICITY> to create Magnetic <DT_MAGNETIC> damage.
Very effective against shields.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_matchp.value: If the polarity of the mod and the slot you install it on match, the capacity cost of the mod will be halved.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_modtut.value: Press <MENU_RTRIGGER1> to view the mod tutorial.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_ordero.value: Install Companion precepts in the order you want them to be followed, starting from upper-left.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_oxinda.value: Toxin <DT_POISON> damage is effective at damaging an enemy's health.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_radiat.value:
Combine Heat <DT_FIRE> and Electricity <DT_ELECTRICITY> to create Radiation <DT_RADIATION> damage.
Very effective against alloy armor.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_stance.value: Stance mods unlock the ability to perform advanced combos.
Stance mods add to your total mod capacity.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_viralc.value:
Combine Cold <DT_FREEZE> and Toxin <DT_POISON> to create Viral <DT_VIRAL> damage.
Very effective against flesh.

/lotus/language/gametips/voltdesc.value:
Volt can create and harness electrical elements.
This is a high-damage Warframe perfect for players who want a potent alternative to gun-play.

/lotus/language/irc/channelban.value: Your access to this channel has been suspended.

/lotus/language/irc/channellocked.value: You are not currently qualified to use this channel.

/lotus/language/irc/d_motd.value:
Honorable Design Council, welcome to your private channel. 
We gather here to discuss Warframe. Recruiting here is discouraged for connectivity reasons. 
Note: We at [DE] speak English and we’d prefer English discussion so we can participate.

/lotus/language/irc/g_motd.value:
Welcome, Tenno.
Be respectful.
No profanity.
No spamming.
Only Recruit in “Recruiting” Channel.

/lotus/language/irc/h_motd.value:
Welcome to the Relay! Explore and meet with fellow Tenno. Mastery Rank 3 or higher players can access Syndicate rewards. Stay tuned for Baro Ki’Teer visits with unique items!
New players can seek out a Guide of the Lotus for help!

/lotus/language/irc/ps4_t_motd.value:
Trading is done within the Dojo at a Trading Post
You can invite non-members of your clan to your Dojo to trade
Trading is currently limited to: MODS, KEYS, PLATINUM, and PRIME BLUEPRINTS/PARTS.  
You must have a Mastery Rank of 2 or higher in order to trade.  
Please refrain from trading PSN item redemption codes.

We do not enforce trades for promises, clan membership, and other favors. Trade for items only.

/lotus/language/irc/r_motd.value: Recruit for a Squad or Clan here!

/lotus/language/irc/t_motd.value:
Trading is done within the Dojo at a Trading Post
You can invite non-members of your clan to your Dojo to trade
Trading is currently limited to: MODS, KEYS, PLATINUM, and PRIME BLUEPRINTS/PARTS.  
You must have a Mastery Rank of 2 or higher in order to trade.  

We do not enforce trades for promises, clan membership, and other favors. Trade for items only.

/lotus/language/irc/tr_motd.value:
Welcome to Maroo's Bazaar! 
Players can set themselves available for a trade openly by selecting the ‘Trade’ option above the Emote wheel when in the Relay’s Concourse.
You must have a Mastery Rank of 2 or higher in order to trade.  

We do not enforce trades for promises, clan membership, and other favors. Trade for items only.

/lotus/language/items/absorbabilityaugme.value: Absorb Augment - Creates a ring every 3 seconds that drags in enemies at |PULL_STR| meters per second.

/lotus/language/items/absorbabilityboost.value: Boost the amount of damage you can absorb.

/lotus/language/items/absorbabilitydesc.value: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.

/lotus/language/items/acolytenogglebundl.value: A collection of Noggle Statues depicting the followers of the Stalker.

/lotus/language/items/acolytestalkermios.value: A unique skin for the Lacera used by the Slayer acolyte.

/lotus/language/items/actuatordesc.value: Synthetic tensor components. Used in the manufacture of Corpus Robotics.

/lotus/language/items/advancedresourcedr.value:
Deploy the EXTRACTOR on a planet to collect large amounts of resources.

Must be emptied regularly for maximum efficiency and monitored for damage.

/lotus/language/items/advanceducresource.value:
The Distilling Extractor Prime has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.

Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect large amounts of resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.

/lotus/language/items/adventurerkubrowde.value: Enterprising Orokin genetic designers recognized that the Kubrow's affinity for games of fetch could be used for more serious endeavors. They soon developed a strain adept at reconnaissance and contraband recovery. Tenno often used the creatures to help resupply while in the field.

/lotus/language/items/affinityboosterdes.value: Doubles the rate at which you earn affinity. Upgrade your weapons and Warframes faster.

/lotus/language/items/aggressioneventcor.value: An insignia marking Tenno who aligned with the Corpus during the Gradivus Dilemma.

/lotus/language/items/aggressioneventgri.value: An insignia marking Tenno who aligned with the Grineer during the Gradivus Dilemma.

/lotus/language/items/ahakboltodesc.value: For the Arbiters of Hexis these pistols are more than simple weapons, they are symbols of truth and discipline.

/lotus/language/items/ahboltordesc.value: Bring down judgement, with this boltor crafted by the Arbiters of Hexis.

/lotus/language/items/ahscarfdesc.value: With every enemy struck down the Telos Syandana glows stronger.

/lotus/language/items/akimboautopistolde.value: Furis pistols equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.

/lotus/language/items/akimboboltodesc.value: A Bolto equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.

/lotus/language/items/akimbohandcannonsd.value: A Bronco equipped in each hand.

/lotus/language/items/akimbopistoldesc.value: A Lato equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.

/lotus/language/items/akimbosomapistolsd.value: The devastating power of the Soma rifle compacted into two elegant pistols.

/lotus/language/items/akimboviperpistold.value: A Viper equipped in each hand.

/lotus/language/items/aklexdesc.value: Dual Lex pistols double the amount of high caliber lead you can throw at the enemy, but accuracy and reload time suffer.

/lotus/language/items/akmagnusdesc.value: Twice the ammo and twice the stopping power of a single Magnus.

/lotus/language/items/alertiumdesc.value: Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.

/lotus/language/items/allianceemblemdesc.value: An insignia that projects a holographic image of your alliance emblem. Requires a Warlord in the clan that created the alliance to upload an image of the alliance emblem.

/lotus/language/items/alloyplatedesc.value: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.

/lotus/language/items/alloyplatestoreove.value:
Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
This bundle of 1500 Alloy Plates can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.

/lotus/language/items/alphacorruptordesc.value: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

/lotus/language/items/alternatearrowskin.value: A unique set of arrows, compatible with any bow.
A unique set of arrows, compatible with any bow.
A unique set of arrows, compatible with any bow.
A collection of unique arrows, compatible with any bow.

/lotus/language/items/ancienthealerballd.value: Deploys a ANCIENT HEALER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

/lotus/language/items/ankyrosprimedesc.value: This Orokin variation of the Ankyros is superior to its successor in every way.

/lotus/language/items/antimatteragileani.value: The Agile Animation Set for Nova.

/lotus/language/items/antimatterdesc.value: Nova uses electromagnetic energy to contain and control highly volatile antimatter that fuels her abilities.

/lotus/language/items/antimatternobleani.value: The Noble Animation Set for Nova.

/lotus/language/items/antlerbowdesc.value: Evoking the design of ancient bows, the high impact Cernos is perfect for hunting down highly shielded enemies.

/lotus/language/items/april2015scarfdesc.value: A Tenno Syandana evocative of winged night creatures.

/lotus/language/items/arbitershexisprofi.value: A profile icon of the Arbiters of Hexis

/lotus/language/items/arcaneashalthelmet.value: This helmet is worn by Ash, and adds Energy Capacity, with a reduction to Speed.

/lotus/language/items/arcanebansheealthe.value: This helmet is worn by Banshee, and adds Power Efficiency, but reduces duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.
This helmet is worn by Banshee, and grants Max Energy Boost, with a reduction to Health.

/lotus/language/items/arcaneemberalthelm.value: This helmet is worn by Ember, and adds Health, with a reduction to Speed.
This helmet is worn by Ember, reduces Shields in order to boost Energy Capacity.

/lotus/language/items/arcaneexcaliburalt.value: This helmet is worn by Excalibur, and adds Power Strength, with a reduction to Armor.
This helmet is worn by Excalibur, increases Shields at the expense of Health.

/lotus/language/items/arcanefrostalthelm.value: This helmet is worn by Frost, and adds Power Strength, with a reduction to Shields.
This helmet is worn by Frost, increases Armor at the expense of Health.

/lotus/language/items/arcanejadealthelme.value: This helmet is worn by Nyx, increases velocity of parkour maneuvers, but reduces Shields.

/lotus/language/items/arcanelokialthelme.value: This helmet is worn by Loki, and adds Power Range, with a reduction to Health.
This helmet is worn by Loki, increases Power Efficiency, but reduces Armor Rating.

/lotus/language/items/arcanemagalthelmet.value: This helmet is worn by Mag, and adds Max Energy, with a reduction to Speed.
This helmet is worn by Mag, gives increased Power Range with a drain on Shields.

/lotus/language/items/arcaneninjaalthelm.value: This helmet is worn by Ash, increases duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, but reduces Power Efficiency.

/lotus/language/items/arcanenovaalthelme.value: This helmet is worn by Nova, and increases duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, but reduces Health.

/lotus/language/items/arcanenyxalthelmet.value: This helmet is worn by Nyx, and adds Power Efficiency, with a reduction to Armor.

/lotus/language/items/arcanerhinoalthelm.value: This helmet is worn by Rhino, and adds Speed, with a reduction to Power Strength.
This helmet is worn by Rhino, and increases Health, but reduces Sprint Speed.

/lotus/language/items/arcanesarynalthelm.value: This helmet is worn by Saryn, and increases velocity of parkour maneuvers, but reduces Power Duration.
This helmet is worn by Saryn, and increases Movement Speed, with a reduction to Health.

/lotus/language/items/arcanetrapperalthe.value: This helmet is worn by Vauban, and increases Power Max, with a reduction to Shields.

/lotus/language/items/arcanetrinityalthe.value: This helmet is worn by Trinity, and adds Shield Capacity, with a reduction to Power Efficiency.
This helmet is worn by Trinity, and increases the Power Duration, but adversely affects Health.

/lotus/language/items/arcanevaubanalthel.value: This helmet is worn by Vauban, and increases velocity of parkour maneuvers, but reduces Power Duration.

/lotus/language/items/arcanevoltalthelme.value: This helmet is worn by Volt, and adds Power Duration, with a reduction to Shields.
This helmet is worn by Volt, and increases Ability Power, but reduces duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.

/lotus/language/items/arcataskinadesc.value: A stylized arcata skin for Lunaro.

/lotus/language/items/arcatasugatradesc.value: [PLACEHOLDER] The traditional sugatra for Lunaro for generations.

/lotus/language/items/arcdronedesc.value: Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.

/lotus/language/items/archaxedesc.value: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.

/lotus/language/items/archcannondesc.value: When fully charged, this flak-cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.

/lotus/language/items/archerbundledesc.value: Hunt down your prey with this collection of lethal gear. Includes the Ivara Warframe, Rubico sniper rifle,  Lacera sword-whip and the explosive Talon throwing darts. Enhance progression with 3-Day Affinity and Credit Boosters.

/lotus/language/items/archerbundlefeatur.value: Hunt down your prey with this collection of lethal gear.

/lotus/language/items/archhammerdesc.value: Using Archwing’s jets for thrust, this massive hammer crushes anything in its path.

/lotus/language/items/archheavypistolsde.value: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.

/lotus/language/items/archlongrifledesc.value: Devastate free-space enemies with Phaedra, the Soma's big-sister.

/lotus/language/items/archmachinegundesc.value: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.

/lotus/language/items/archrailgundesc.value: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.

/lotus/language/items/archrocketcrossbow.value: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.

/lotus/language/items/archscythedesc.value: Become an angel of death, with this Archwing scythe.

/lotus/language/items/archsworddesc.value: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.

/lotus/language/items/archswordshielddes.value:
[ARCHWING]
Part sword, part shield, the Centaur excels at charging headlong into enemy fire.

/lotus/language/items/archwingnavcodedes.value: Archive detailing the locations of hidden Archwing technology

/lotus/language/items/arctrapstoreitemde.value: Sentinel will zap multiple enemies within range.

/lotus/language/items/argoncrystaldesc.value: Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the void.

/lotus/language/items/aristeasmagicianhe.value: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Limbo.

/lotus/language/items/artillerybarrageab.value: Creates a localized storm of punishing explosions.

/lotus/language/items/ashalthelmet2desc.value: Locust Helmet for the Ash Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/aspagileanimsdesc.value: The Agile Animation Set for Saryn.

/lotus/language/items/aspdesc.value: Saryn's venomous attacks are horrifyingly effective against organic and synthetic enemies, and her ability to 'shed' her skin makes her very elusive.

/lotus/language/items/aspnobleanimsdesc.value: The Noble Animation Set for Saryn.

/lotus/language/items/assassinbaitbdesc.value: Lures the Zanuka Hunter out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.

/lotus/language/items/assassinbaitcdesc.value: Lures the Grustrag Three out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.

/lotus/language/items/assassinbaitdesc.value: Lures the Stalker out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.

/lotus/language/items/attacklensdesc.value: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

/lotus/language/items/autocrossbowdesc.value: The Ballistica crossbow features a unique dual firing mechanism. Choose between a four bolt volley or a deadly accurate charged shot.

/lotus/language/items/autopistoldesc.value: The Furis delivers a high damage output in a short time frame thanks to its high rate of fire.

/lotus/language/items/autoshotgundesc.value: A shotgun with low accuracy and strong recoil, but able to deliver its payload in full-auto. The Boar is best used at close range.

/lotus/language/items/ballisticbatteryab.value: Ballistic Battery Augment - Applies a |PROC_CHANCE|% status chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.
When activated, this power stores damage caused by guns. When triggered again, that damage is channeled through the next gunshot.

/lotus/language/items/banishabilityaugme.value: Banish Augment - Allies banished to the rift will have |HEALTH_PERCENT|% of their max health restored.

/lotus/language/items/banishabilitydesc.value: Displaces a target into the rift plane, inflicting additional damage if the target is hostile.

/lotus/language/items/bansheealthelmet2d.value: Chorus Helmet for the Banshee Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/bansheealthelmetde.value: Reverb Helmet for the Banshee Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/bansheedefaulthelm.value: The standard issue helmet for the Banshee warframe.

/lotus/language/items/bansheedeluxebundl.value: Be heard, with this collection of skins for Banshee, Sonicor and the Banshee Soprana sigil.

/lotus/language/items/bansheedeluxedesc.value: Sleek and stylish, Banshee Soprana sings a song of devastation.

/lotus/language/items/bansheedeluxehelme.value: The helmet matching the Banshee Soprana Skin.

/lotus/language/items/bansheepackdesc.value: Get Banshee and all of her favourite gear.

/lotus/language/items/baroarrowdesc.value: Arrows of distinction, the perfect compliment for any bow.

/lotus/language/items/barocapedesc.value: Walk the cutting edge of fashion with this exclusive Ki'Teer original.

/lotus/language/items/baropetmaskdesc.value: A mask designed to match the one worn by Baro Ki'Teer, for your Sentinel pet.

/lotus/language/items/baropettaildesc.value: A statement piece for any Sentinel.

/lotus/language/items/baropetwingsdesc.value: Soar to new heights of luxury with these angular Sentinel wings.

/lotus/language/items/basicresourcedrone.value:
Deploy the EXTRACTOR on a planet to collect resources.

Must be emptied regularly for maximum efficiency and monitored for damage.

/lotus/language/items/basicsolarraildesc.value: Constructing a Solar Rail allows travel to previously inaccessible locations. All Tenno who use the rail pay tribute to the Clan who built it.

/lotus/language/items/basicucresourcedro.value:
The Distilling Extractor has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.

Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.

/lotus/language/items/beacondesc.value: One part of a long lost mathematical proof.

/lotus/language/items/beamweapondesc.value: Therma is a short range weapon that deals a constant stream of damage.

/lotus/language/items/berserkeragileanim.value: The Agile Animation Set for Valkyr.

/lotus/language/items/berserkerdeluxedes.value:
Before Alad V, before the experiments, there was Gersemi Valkyr. 

*Valkyr not included.

/lotus/language/items/berserkerdeluxefea.value: Before Alad V, before the experiments, there was Gersemi Valkyr.

/lotus/language/items/berserkerdeluxehel.value: The helmet matching the Valkyr Gersemi Skin.

/lotus/language/items/berserkerdesc.value: Forged in the labs of the Zanuka project, the original Valkyr was subject to cruel experiments, leaving her scarred, angry and frighteningly adept at killing.

/lotus/language/items/berserkermeleedesc.value: These talons emerge when Valkyr unleashes her Hysteria.

/lotus/language/items/berserkernobleanim.value: The Noble Animation Set for Valkyr.

/lotus/language/items/berserkerpackdesc.value: Get the new Warframe bundled with boosters and the latest in close-combat weaponry.

/lotus/language/items/berserkerscreamabi.value: Warcry Augment - While active, Warcry's duration is increased by |DURATION_INC| seconds for each melee kill.
Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.

/lotus/language/items/berserkertubesdesc.value: Remnants of the bonds that restrained the original Valkyr during her time in 'the lab'. A reminder to never forget the torment.

/lotus/language/items/betacorruptordesc.value: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

/lotus/language/items/bigboyabilitydesc.value: Launches a plodding missile capable of unleashing a massive explosion.

/lotus/language/items/biofragmentstoreov.value:
These samples could advance our knowledge of biological research.
This bundle of 1 Mutagen Sample can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.

/lotus/language/items/blackoutorthosdesc.value: The Void's corrupting energy has scarred this Orthos, leaving it permanently out of phase with conventional space.

/lotus/language/items/blanktraitprintdes.value:
Copies the dominant genes of a Kubrow onto the template. 
This can then be used to increase the chances that traits from the original Kubrow will carry across to a newborn clone.

/lotus/language/items/bleedingkeybluepri.value:
Blueprint required to craft the Bleeding Dragon Key. Health is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

Blueprint is reusable and will not be consumed.

/lotus/language/items/blessingabilityboo.value: Boosting this ability increases the duration of the invulnerability.

/lotus/language/items/blessingabilitydes.value: Restore the health and shields of allies within Trinity’s Affinity aura. These allies also receive a degree of damage immunity, the greater the healing the greater the immunity.

/lotus/language/items/blueantitoxinbluep.value: Fuses the extracts from both Moonlight and Sunlight variations of Jadeleaf and Dragonlily to create a potent antitoxin.

/lotus/language/items/blueantitoxindesc.value: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.

/lotus/language/items/blueskyshipdesc.value: This blade-like landing craft is armed with Carpet Bomb air-support.

/lotus/language/items/blueskyskinbundled.value: A collection of unique skins for the Scimitar landing craft.

/lotus/language/items/blueskyskindeluxed.value: A unique skin for the Scimitar landing craft.

/lotus/language/items/blueskyskinsoundde.value: A unique skin for the Scimitar landing craft.

/lotus/language/items/blueskyskinsplashd.value: A unique skin for the Scimitar landing craft.

/lotus/language/items/blueskyskinstalker.value: Cast the Stalker's caustic shadow across the Scimitar with this skin.

/lotus/language/items/boarprimedesc.value: One of the finest examples of Tenno craftsmanship, the Boar Prime offers a higher fire rate and clip size with a slight decrease in per-shot damage.

/lotus/language/items/bobbleheadvordesc.value: [Placeholder] Remember Vor? He's back, in bobblehead form

/lotus/language/items/boltonfadesc.value: An intimidating Tonfa set designed to match the briary design of the Boltor.

/lotus/language/items/boltorbundledesc.value: Featuring the Boltace tonfa, Boltor rifle, and the Bolto pistol, this bundle contains enough weaponry to shatter the heaviest Grineer armor.

/lotus/language/items/boltorifledesc.value: The Boltor fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.

/lotus/language/items/boltorprimedesc.value: Fires Orokin designed bolts that are faster and sharper.

/lotus/language/items/boprimedesc.value: A classic Orokin weapon, Bo Prime creates elegant fury on the battlefield.

/lotus/language/items/bossnavcodedesc.value: Coordinate used to locate the Lephantis.

/lotus/language/items/bountyhunterbadged.value: The holographic interface on this emblem will update to display the rank achieved through exemplary dedication to Tactical Alerts.

/lotus/language/items/bowmodconvertammod.value: Convert unused ammo drops into Arrows

/lotus/language/items/brandremovalitemde.value: Safely disengages the Grustrag Bolt from a Warframe

/lotus/language/items/brassandgoldakbolt.value: Custom edition of the Akbolto forged by Tenno artisans.

/lotus/language/items/brassandgoldboltod.value: Custom edition of the Bolto forged by Tenno artisans.

/lotus/language/items/brassknucklesdesc.value: These coverings for the hands and feet allow devastating high flying hand-to-hand combat attacks without risking harm to the user.

/lotus/language/items/brawlerbarrierabil.value: Tectonics Augment - Create up to |NUM_WALLS| walls with |HEALTH_MULT|% health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.
Summon a rock-wall, activate again to send the rocks crashing toward the enemy.

Includes the Atlas Warframe, the Sonicor blaster, the Convectrix laser rifle and the jagged Tekko gauntlets. Enhance progression with 3-Day Affinity and Credit Boosters.

/lotus/language/items/brawlerbundlefeatu.value: Crush enemies between a rock and a hard place.

/lotus/language/items/brawlerdesc.value: Titan of stone, lord of the earthly elementals.

/lotus/language/items/brawlergazeability.value: Petrify Augment - Petrified enemies are scanned into the codex and have a |CHANCE|% chance to drop additional loot when killed.
Fossilize foes with Atlas' hardened gaze.

/lotus/language/items/brawlerhelmetdesc.value: The standard issue helmet for the Atlas warframe.

/lotus/language/items/brawlerknucklesdes.value: These iron fists that rip through foes with each strike are Atlas' signature weapon.

/lotus/language/items/brawlernobleanimsd.value: The Noble Animation Set for Atlas.

/lotus/language/items/brawlerpunchabilit.value: [Placeholder] Landslide Augment - Leave behind a trail for |TRAIL_DURATION|s, petrifying enemies that touch it for |STONE_DURATION|s at a rate of |STONE_RATE|%/s.
Bash enemies with an explosive sliding punch, repeat for a devastating combo.

/lotus/language/items/brawlersummonabili.value: Rumblers Augment - Create a single rumbler with |HEALTH_MULT|% health, |DAMAGE_MULT|% damage, and |SPEED_MULT|% speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.
Rumblers Augment - Atlas becomes a Rumbler with rock armor that can absorb up to |ABSORB| damage.
Summon two elemental stone brawlers to the melee.

/lotus/language/items/broncoprimedesc.value: Infused with rare Orokin alloys, the Bronco Prime is a highly efficient weapon, trading an increased clip size and damage for a lower rate of fire.

/lotus/language/items/bronzespectredesc.value:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.

Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Vapor Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

/lotus/language/items/bulletattractorabi.value: Boosting this ability increases the area of the magnetic field.
Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.

/lotus/language/items/bunnyearsdesc.value: A stylish accessory for your Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/burstlaserpistolst.value: Fires a small burst of lasers.

/lotus/language/items/burstpistoldesc.value: The Sicarus fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.

/lotus/language/items/burstrifledesc.value: The Burston fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of automatic rifles and the accuracy of semi-automatic rifles.

/lotus/language/items/cameradesc.value: Deploys a short-lived remote camera that overrides your Warframe optics

/lotus/language/items/demolitionarchwing.value:
This bundle offers unparalleled opportunity for maximum destruction.

This heavy duty Archwing was designed for one purpose, destruction.
This bundle offers unparalleled opportunity for maximum destruction.

/lotus/language/items/dethcubepowersuits.value:
With 'Swift Deth' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

/lotus/language/items/dethmachineriflede.value: Standard issue weaponry signature to Dethcube.

/lotus/language/items/dexdakradesc.value: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

/lotus/language/items/dragonscalesabilit.value: Vex Armor Augment - Taking |DMG_REQ| damage will trigger a |RADIUS|m burst. Shield damage will cause a puncture proc while health damage will cause a blast proc.
When shields are hit, Chroma's armor grows stronger, when health takes a hit, weapon damage increases.

/lotus/language/items/drakerifledesc.value: Forged by a master gunsmith, this Tenno burst rifle will strike down targets with swift precision.

/lotus/language/items/dropabilityaugment.value: Antimatter Drop Augment - Absorbs enemy bullets within |RANGE| meters, increasing its damage when it explodes.
Antimatter Drop Augment - Creates a fully charged stationary orb that explodes after |DURATION|s or within enemy proximity.

/lotus/language/items/dropabilitydesc.value: Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision with increased deadliness when targeted by weapons.

/lotus/language/items/dualaxedesc.value: Short axes held in each hand. High attack speed and can hit multiple targets. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.

/lotus/language/items/dualcorpusminigund.value: Wield two Cestras to unleash a dual torrent of high energy bolts.

/lotus/language/items/dualethersworddesc.value: Fast and precise. The Ether Sword cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for ‘cleansing’ infested allies. Capable of hitting multiple targets.

/lotus/language/items/dualheatsworddesc.value: With a Heat Sword in each hand, enemies reach their fiery demise twice as fast. Can connect with multiple targets at once.

/lotus/language/items/dualkamasdesc.value: Wielding a Kama in each hand brings a savage amount of slash damage to bear against your enemies.

/lotus/language/items/dualshortsworddesc.value: A shorter Skana in each hand. Can hit multiple targets.

/lotus/language/items/dualswordstancebde.value: Multi-angle strikes and deadly thrust attacks.

/lotus/language/items/dualvastosdesc.value: Vasto revolvers equipped in each hand.

/lotus/language/items/excaliburxbonepack.value:
Show your power and mystique with the Xbox One Exclusive Warframe®: Prestige Pack I.

Emanating with the colors of Xbox One, the Exclusive Jade Excalibur Skin will make your allegiance clear on the field of battle. 

Also included is Platinum to super charge your arsenal.

This Pack includes:
- 170 Platinum
- Xbox One Exclusive Excalibur Jade Skin*

* SKIN ONLY, Excalibur Warframe not included.

This item may only be purchased once per account.

/lotus/language/items/frostprimevaultban.value: Now Available for a Limited Time

/lotus/language/items/frostprimevaultdes.value:
INSTANTLY UNLOCK FROST PRIME, DISCOUNTED PLATINUM AND PRIME GEAR!

For a limited time, you can purchase this package and gain instant access to Frost Prime, Latron Prime and more!

Pack Includes:
- 1050 Platinum – Highly discounted from its regular price, Platinum is Warframe's Premium in-game currency.
- Frost Prime Warframe – Frost Prime features the same sub-zero powers as Frost but with unique Mod Polarities for greater customization.
- Latron Prime – The sleek elegance of this ancient Orokin battle rifle is surpassed only by the raw power of its puncturing rounds.
- Reaper Prime – Envelope those who would stand against you in an unstoppable dance of death. 
- Titan Extractor Prime – Empower your resource collection efforts with a fully restored Orokin Titan Extractor, boasting twice the capacity of a common extractor.
- Misa Prime Syandana – Discovered in the vaults of a drifting derelict, this Syandana was worn by Temple Guardians before the fall of the Orokin Empire.

/lotus/language/items/glaiveabilitydesc.value: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.

/lotus/language/items/glapistoldesc.value: The Marelok combines the stopping power of a rifle with the portability of a pistol.

/lotus/language/items/glarifledesc.value: With pinpoint accuracy, the Grinlok lever-action repeating rifle can easily find the soft spot on any target.

/lotus/language/items/goldspectredesc.value:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.

Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Force Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

/lotus/language/items/golemraidbadgedesc.value: A fragment of the Jordas Golem worn as a trophy by those who defeated him.

/lotus/language/items/golemtrialsdesc.value:
Jordas lied to us, he wasn't the last of his kind and now a new much larger Golem looms. Destroy this menace before it reproduces any further.

This is a key for a TRIAL mission, work with up to 8 Tenno in order to solve problems and defeat the enemy. This mission can be initiated from Pluto.

/lotus/language/items/goodstuffdropchanc.value: Doubles the chance to drop good items.

/lotus/language/items/gorgonwraithdesc.value: The Gorgon Wraith is a powerful variant of its precursor that features unique styling.

/lotus/language/items/grandfinaleability.value: Prism Augment - Prism follows above Mirage for |DURATION| seconds.

/lotus/language/items/grandfinaledesc.value: Fires an energy prism that shoots lasers in all directions. Activating again detonates the prism, blinding nearby foes.

/lotus/language/items/grapplehookability.value: Rip Line Augment - After using Rip Line, the next |RIP_LINES| Rip Lines will have no energy cost while airborne.
Valkyr hurls forth a hook. If it hits an enemy, she pulls them to her. If it hits terrain, she pulls herself to the hook's location.

/lotus/language/items/greaterattacklensd.value: Channels a greater amount of Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

/lotus/language/items/greaterdefenselens.value: Channels a greater amount of Affinity into Focus for the Vazarin Way.

/lotus/language/items/greaterpowerlensde.value: Channels a greater amount of Affinity into Focus for the Zenurik Way.

/lotus/language/items/greatertacticlensd.value: Channels a greater amount of Affinity into Focus for the Naramon Way.

/lotus/language/items/greaterwardlensdes.value: Channels a greater amount of Affinity into Focus for the Unairu Way.

/lotus/language/items/greatsworddesc.value: The heavy two-handed sword known as Gram requires great strength to wield, but it is notorious for its splitting power. Can hit multiple targets with each strike.

/lotus/language/items/grineerakimbopisto.value: Designed as a pair, these Grineer sidearms fire projectiles at a slower rate but with greater force and accuracy.

/lotus/language/items/grineerassaultrifl.value: Equipped with a huge magazine and impressive fire rate, the Grakata is the preferred weapon of Grineer Lancers.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamogorgond.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Gorgon.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamograkata.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Grakata.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamogremlin.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Gremlins.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamokrakend.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Kraken.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamoskinbun.value: A desert camouflage skin pack for your Grineer arsenal. Contains 7 weapon skins.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamosobekde.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Sobek.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamotwinvip.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Twin Vipers.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamoviperde.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Viper.

/lotus/language/items/grineercamovulkard.value: Desert camouflage skin for the Vulkar.

/lotus/language/items/grineerchampionspr.value: A collection of profile icons featuring the Executioners of the Rathuum.

/lotus/language/items/grineercombatknife.value: Built for close combat, the Sheev's plasma blade slices through flesh and armor with equal ease.

/lotus/language/items/grineercordmeleeda.value: Expressing the martial finesse and skill of its master, the Tantu Sugatra is based on a Grineer design.

/lotus/language/items/grineerdoublebarre.value: Sobek is a rapid-firing Grineer shotgun that has reduced damage per shot but boasts extra large clip capacity.

/lotus/language/items/grineerdualcleaver.value: Butcher your foes with brutal blades in each hand.

/lotus/language/items/grineerflakcannond.value: The Drakgoon flak cannon sends volleys of intensely hot shrapnel ricocheting around the room. Can be fired in wide or concentrated bursts.

/lotus/language/items/grineerflyingdrone.value: Fitted with cloaking technology, this Grineer observation drone collects battlefield information and supports tactical deployments.

/lotus/language/items/grineergoogundesc.value: Firing a sticky, toxic, explosive compound, the Stug Gel Gun offers multiple ejection modes, delivering maximum damage in all situations.

/lotus/language/items/grineerhandcannond.value: Simple but powerful. The semi-automatic Brakk hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package.

/lotus/language/items/grineerheavyhammer.value: This variation of the Hammer has 5% faster swing speed, but 10% lower channeling efficiency.

/lotus/language/items/grineerheavypistol.value: The Kraken is a heavy pistol of Grineer design that fires two quick shots with a single pull of the trigger. Skilled marksmen will appreciate the value in this deadly accurate weapon.

/lotus/language/items/grineerjetpolearmd.value: Deliver crushing blows with this Grineer built, jet powered mace.

/lotus/language/items/grineerlightpistol.value: A full-auto pistol known as the most compact and lightweight weapon of the Grineer arsenal. Though it has a small clip size, the Viper has a very high fire rate and ultra-fast reload times thanks to a simplified magazine design.

/lotus/language/items/grineerm16rifledes.value: Solid, dependable and deadly. The Karak is a standard issue rifle in many Grineer platoons.

/lotus/language/items/grineermachetedesc.value: A ferocious melee weapon crafted by the Grineer and carried by their elite melee forces.

/lotus/language/items/grineermicrowavepi.value: Creates and focuses a high-frequency field of microwaves, literally cooking the target from within.

/lotus/language/items/grineerpackdesc.value: Use the Grineer's power and brutality against them with this special assault package.

/lotus/language/items/grineerprofileicon.value: A collection of profile icons featuring the military personnel of the Grineer.

/lotus/language/items/grineersawbladegun.value: The MITER launches high velocity saw blades, tearing apart anyone unfortunate enough to be in their path.

/lotus/language/items/grineersniperrifle.value: Built by the Grineer for their elite troopers, the Vulkar is a devastating distance weapon. In the right hands it is capable of taking down targets long before they get into attack range.

/lotus/language/items/grineerstaffdesc.value: Fashioned with Grineer materials and balanced for marine infantry use, the Amphis is a traditional staff weapon that has received a monstrous makeover that enables shock damage on jump attacks. Connects with multiple enemies with each strike.

/lotus/language/items/grineertrialsdesc.value:
Vay Hek's Fomorian assault on our Relays was devastating but he failed to break us. Now we take the fight back to him. Now we exact justice.

This is a key for a TRIAL mission that has been designed to be challenging for 8-players, and can be initiated from Earth.

/lotus/language/items/grineerturbinearma.value: Decorative shoulder plates for your Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/grineerturbinearmo.value: This prototype Grineer Exo-Armor was destined to be worn by Grineer generals until it was stolen and repurposed by Tenno agents. Wear it as a sign of defiance.

/lotus/language/items/grineerturbineches.value: A decorative breastplate for your Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/grineerturbinelega.value: Decorative leg armor for your Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/grineerturbinesyan.value: A syandana of Grineer design. Matches the Harkonar Armor Set.

/lotus/language/items/grnantiairgundesc.value: Shatter your targets with explosive shells from this devastating Archwing cannon.

/lotus/language/items/grnarchhanddesc.value:
[ARCHWING]
Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat. Designed by the infamous Tyl Regor.

/lotus/language/items/grnarchhandfeature.value: Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat.

/lotus/language/items/grnbannercapedesc.value: Add insult to injury by mocking the Grineer with their own banner.

/lotus/language/items/grnboomerangdesc.value: This jet powered Grineer throwing mace always comes back to its master and is even capable of disarming targets.

/lotus/language/items/grndualfireaxedesc.value: These nasty, little hatchets slice through steel as if it were flesh.

/lotus/language/items/grngorgsniperrifle.value: Mark your targets and then unleash a barrage of bullets, the Buzlok's homing rounds always find the enemy.

/lotus/language/items/grngrenadelauncher.value: Hurl mayhem and destruction with this Grineer grenade launcher.

/lotus/language/items/grnharpoongundesc.value: Spike enemies to the wall or reel them in with this automatic harpoon gun.

/lotus/language/items/grnheatgundesc.value: This particle cannon generates a condensed beam of super-heated plasma designed to melt rock to ore, and enemies to molten slag.

/lotus/language/items/grnmeleedangledesc.value: Only Grineer who have proven their strength in combat can brandish these.

/lotus/language/items/grnsealabeventbadg.value: An emblem awarded the Tenno who fought to destroy Tyl Regor's cloning labs.

/lotus/language/items/grnsealabeventweap.value: Determined by the winning side of the Operation.

/lotus/language/items/grnsparkrifledesc.value: For every shot fired in rapid succession the Kohm releases an additional bolt and grows more lethal.

/lotus/language/items/grntorpedopistolde.value: Rain hell on the enemy with this handheld cluster-rocket launcher.

/lotus/language/items/grntridentdesc.value: Inflict maximum devastation with this massive Grineer trident.

/lotus/language/items/grntubescarfdesc.value: A prototype destined for one of Tyl Regor’s experiments, this syandana has been repurposed for Tenno Agents.

/lotus/language/items/grnurbancamoackbru.value: This camouflage pattern was employed by one of the most lethally efficient Grineer corps.

/lotus/language/items/grnurbancamobundle.value: This bundle of weapon skins suits the Ack & Brunt, Ogris and Nukor. They have been modeled after the camouflage employed by the Nightwatch Corps, an elite squadron in the Grineer Military.

/lotus/language/items/grnurbancamofeatur.value: A bundle of weapon skins fashioned after the camouflage employed by an elite Grineer Corps

/lotus/language/items/grnurbancamonukord.value: This camouflage pattern was employed by one of the most lethally efficient Grineer corps.

/lotus/language/items/grnurbancamoogrisd.value: This camouflage pattern was employed by one of the most lethally efficient Grineer corps.

/lotus/language/items/grnwhipdesc.value: A multi-bladed whip that is adept at flaying skin from bone. In extreme cases, disobedient Grineer are sentenced to death by Atterax.

/lotus/language/items/grnwinduppistoldes.value: Like the larger Kohm, this hand-shotgun doubles its volley with each successive shot.

/lotus/language/items/guardianstoreitemd.value: Boosts owner's shield when it runs out.

/lotus/language/items/guardkubrowdesc.value: Designed by the Orokin to be the perfect companion, a Kubrow was never far from its master's side. Loyal and obedient, these creatures made ideal bodyguards. Equipped with shield generators for added protection, their fierce growl could paralyze any attacker with fear.

/lotus/language/items/gunbladestanceades.value: Bullets spray between wicked slash attacks.

/lotus/language/items/gunfuabilityaugmen.value: Peacemaker Augment - Dodge roll while Peacemaker is active at the cost of |COST| Energy

/lotus/language/items/gunfuabilitydesc.value: With intense focus, Mesa draws her Regulator pistols, shooting down her foes in rapid succession.

/lotus/language/items/gunslingeralthelme.value: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Mesa.

/lotus/language/items/gunslingerbundlede.value: Get shooting with Mesa and her favorite weapons.

/lotus/language/items/gunslingerdesc.value: With a steady hand and quick reflexes, Mesa is a true gunfighter.

/lotus/language/items/gunslingerhelmetde.value: The standard issue helmet for the Mesa Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/gusokuarmorsetdesc.value: The Edo decorative armor set rekindles faint memories of warriors long forgotten.

/lotus/language/items/gusokuchestplatede.value: A decorative breastplate for your Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/gusokukneeplatesde.value: Decorative leg armor for your Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/gusokushoulderplat.value: Decorative shoulder plates for your Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/gyroscopeshipdesc.value: Featuring Sentry Gun air-support, this stylish landing craft is an asset in any battle.

/lotus/language/items/hammerdesc.value: A large two-handed hammer, the Fragor requires great strength to wield, but impacts with enough force to send groups of enemies tumbling.

/lotus/language/items/hammerstanceadesc.value: Methodical strikes and high impact combos.

/lotus/language/items/hammerstancebdesc.value: Aerial attacks with crowd control combos.

/lotus/language/items/handcannondesc.value: The Bronco is a small-scale shotgun that can be wielded with one hand. Only effective at close range, it has a limited clip size.

/lotus/language/items/harlequinagileanim.value: The Agile Animation Set for Mirage.

/lotus/language/items/harlequinalthelmet.value: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Mirage.

/lotus/language/items/harlequindefaulthe.value: The standard issue helmet for the Mirage Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/harlequindesc.value: A master of illusion, Mirage confounds the enemy in a spectacle of style and power.

/lotus/language/items/harlequinnobleanim.value: The Noble Animation Set for Mirage.

/lotus/language/items/harlequinpistolsde.value: The choice weapon of Mirage, these fast-firing dual pistols deliver a deadly performance.

/lotus/language/items/headshotstoreitemd.value: Sentinel charges a powerful shot and fires at the first enemy in sight.

/lotus/language/items/healthdebuffkeydes.value: Health is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

/lotus/language/items/heatdaggerdesc.value: This short blade weapon has limited range but comes out fast and can inflict fire damage.

/lotus/language/items/heatsworddesc.value: A strong blade capable of inflicting fire damage to its foes.

/lotus/language/items/heavyaxedesc.value: The Scindo is a heavy war axe crafted by the Tenno. Reduced speed and agility is balanced by heavy, devastating strikes capable of connecting with multiple targets at once.

/lotus/language/items/heavypistoldesc.value: The Lex is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.

/lotus/language/items/heavyrifledesc.value: The Gorgon sports a large clip that allows it to provide suppressing fire and sustain a high damage rate over a long time. Its high fire rate is only achieved following a short wind-up cycle.

/lotus/language/items/hekkeydesc.value: Raid Earth and Assassinate Councilor Vay Hek

/lotus/language/items/heknavcodeadesc.value: Locator beacon broadcasting on the delta frequency

/lotus/language/items/heknavcodebdesc.value: Locator beacon brodcasting on the gamma frequency

/lotus/language/items/heknavcodecdesc.value: Locator beacon brodcasting on the kappa frequency

/lotus/language/items/heknavcodeddesc.value: Locator beacon brodcasting on the Omega frequency

/lotus/language/items/heknavcodedesc.value: Coordinate used to locate Councilor Vay Hek [obsolete??]

/lotus/language/items/heknavcodekeydesc.value: Locate Vay Hek by analyzing the frequency output of a set of his beacons

/lotus/language/items/heliosglaiveweapon.value: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack enemy targets using pieces of itself.

/lotus/language/items/henrusyandanadesc.value: In the Orokin era, only the Tenno were permitted to wear the Henru Syandana

/lotus/language/items/hinddesc.value: A powerful mid-range rifle used by Grineer shock troops, the Hind fires in five round bursts.

/lotus/language/items/hivesabotageeventb.value: Awarded to Tenno for the contributions they made during the Breeding Grounds event.

/lotus/language/items/hobbledkeyblueprin.value:
Blueprint required to craft the Hobbled Dragon Key. Speed is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

Blueprint is reusable and will not be consumed.

/lotus/language/items/holidayfrostskinde.value: A festive skin for the Frost Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/holidaymirageskind.value: A festive skin for the Mirage Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/holidayscarfdesc.value: A festive variation of the Imperator Syandana.

/lotus/language/items/hornskullscarfdefa.value: Used for festive ceremonies, this Syandana was often worn during social gatherings.

/lotus/language/items/hornskullscarfdesc.value: The Rakta Syandana is awarded by the Red Veil for exemplary valor. This honor is rarely given to outsiders.

/lotus/language/items/hunterkubrowdesc.value: Once the value of Orokin guard-pets had been realized, Orokin scientists began experimenting with strains designed for combat. These were no longer household pets but superior war animals bred for ferocity and aggression.

/lotus/language/items/huntertooldesc.value: Specialized trap for attracting and slowing the movement of synthesis targets.

/lotus/language/items/huntingbowdesc.value: Based on one of the world's oldest weapon designs, this Tenno-crafted weapon can be used both in stealth and in open combat. The Paris uses a chargeable magnetic field to launch arrows capable of impaling enemies to walls.

/lotus/language/items/huntsmansomaskinde.value: This unique casing for the Soma was crafted from the oldest trees on Earth, and entwined in golden trimming.

/lotus/language/items/hydroidalthelmetde.value: An alternative helmet for the Hydroid Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/hydroiddefaulthelm.value: The standard issue helmet for the Hydroid warframe.

/lotus/language/items/iceballisticenhanc.value: The Frost Ballistic Enhancer increases your ballistic weapon damage by a small percentage.  The extra damage is frost damage, which is effective against robotics.

/lotus/language/items/iceeventmodpackdes.value: A collection of Mods that increase Status chance and apply Cold damage.

/lotus/language/items/icehammerdesc.value: Ice in motion can crush mountains, this frozen hammer is no different.

/lotus/language/items/icemeleedangledesc.value: A crystallized companion to the Sibear hammer.

/lotus/language/items/icewaveabilityaugm.value: Ice Wave Augment - Leaves a frozen trail for |DURATION| seconds, that will slow down enemies that come into contact with it.

/lotus/language/items/icewaveabilityboos.value: Boost the distance your Ice Wave travels

/lotus/language/items/icewaveabilitydesc.value: Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystalized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.

/lotus/language/items/ictuspackdesc.value: A bundle containing the HELIOS Sentinel and the ICTUS range of cosmetic upgrades for your Sentinel pet.

/lotus/language/items/magprimevaultbanne.value: Now Available for a Limited Time

/lotus/language/items/magprimevaultdesc.value:
INSTANTLY UNLOCK MAG PRIME, DISCOUNTED PLATINUM AND PRIME GEAR!

Prime variants are the most sought after items by Tenno. For a limited time, you can purchase this package and gain instant access to Mag Prime, Boar Prime and more!

Pack Includes:
- 1200 Platinum – Highly discounted from its regular price, Platinum is Warframe's Premium in-game currency.
- Mag Prime Warframe – Manipulate and destroy your enemies as a master of all things magnetic. Features unique mod polarities for extended customization. 
- Boar Prime – A fine example of Tenno craftsmanship paired with a high firing rate.
- Dakra Prime – Renowned for speed, power and the ability to hit multiple targets.
- Targis Prime Armor Set – This highly decorated armor was once worn by the personal guards of an Orokin Emperor.
- Exclusive Mag Prime Avatars – Show your loyalty in-game and in our community with these Exclusive Profile Icons.

/lotus/language/items/polearmstancebdesc.value: A blend of strong and rapid strikes with leaping combos.

A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.

Three Fusion Cores.

/lotus/language/items/prestigepackfiveba.value: Show your Xbox One allegiance with the all-new Prestige Pack V!

/lotus/language/items/prestigepackfivede.value:
Show your Xbox One allegiance with the all-new Prestige Pack V!

Keep your Kubrow safe in the midst of battle and display your Xbox One pride with the Exclusive Jade Valinn Kubrow Armor. Plus, give your Arsenal a boost with the included Platinum!

Prestige Pack V includes:
- Xbox One Exclusive Jade Valinn Kubrow Armor (Does not include Kubrow)
- 170 Platinum
- 1 Kubrow Egg
- 1 Stasis Slot

This Pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.

/lotus/language/items/prestigepackfourba.value: Now Available for a Limited Time

/lotus/language/items/prestigepackfourde.value:
Take Xbox One glory and pride wherever you go with the all-new Prestige Pack IV!

This pack lets any Xbox One player demonstrate their command of battle with an exclusive Jade Imperator Syandana.

Prestige Pack IV includes:
- Xbox One exclusive Jade Imperator Syandana
- 170 Platinum

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.

/lotus/language/items/prestigepackthreeb.value: Take Xbox One pride and allegiance into the unknown with the all-new Prestige Pack III!

/lotus/language/items/prestigepackthreed.value:
Take Xbox One pride and allegiance into the unknown with the all-new Prestige Pack III!

This Pack lets any Xbox One player illuminate the darkness of space with an exclusive Itzal Archwing skin and Liset skin.

Prestige Pack III includes:
- Xbox One exclusive Jade Itzal Archwing skin (Does not include Archwing)
- Xbox One exclusive Jade Liset skin
- 170 Platinum 

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.

/lotus/language/items/prestigepacktwoban.value: Show your power and mystique with Prestige Pack II

/lotus/language/items/prestigepacktwodes.value:
Show your power and mystique with Prestige Pack II. The Latron and Dual Kamas equipped with exclusive skin that emanates colors of the Xbox One will make your allegiance clear in the field of battle. Also included is Platinum to supercharge your arsenal.

This Pack includes:
- 170 Platinum
- Xbox One Exclusive Jade Latron Skin (includes Latron rifle)
- Xbox One Exclusive Jade Dual Kamas Skin (includes Dual Kamas)
This item may only be purchased once per account.

/lotus/language/items/primebucksdesc.value: Currency exchanged for Prime components and used to purchase items from the Void Trader.

/lotus/language/items/primeburstlaserpis.value: Fires a small burst of lasers.

/lotus/language/items/primeburstondesc.value: Once thought lost to the ages, attempts to reengineer the Burston Prime never fully replicated this weapon's power and agility.

/lotus/language/items/primecarriersentin.value: This ornate sentinel is an excellent example of late Orokin craftsmanship and styling.

/lotus/language/items/primedethcubedesc.value:
[Placeholder]
With 'Swift Deth' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

/lotus/language/items/primedjinnsentinel.value:
[Placeholder]
With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

/lotus/language/items/primedualbroncosde.value: Used together, these Orokin pistols feed off each other, inflicting greater damage with an enhanced chance for inducing elemental effects on targets.

/lotus/language/items/primeflamescarfdes.value: A ceremonial version of the Pyra that drapes the entire back in a cape of flames.

/lotus/language/items/primeglaivedesc.value: The Glaive Prime is a deadly and beautiful weapon from the Orokin era. The blades are as effective in close quarters as they are when thrown at distant enemies.

/lotus/language/items/primelexdesc.value: The Lex Prime is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.

/lotus/language/items/primemeleepetdesc.value:
[Placeholder]
With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner.

/lotus/language/items/primenikanadesc.value: An ancient blade predating the fall of the Orokin Empire. Forged using techniques lost over the centuries, the edge remains sharper than that of any modern Nikana.

/lotus/language/items/primepolearmdesc.value: Orthos Prime is an ancient Orokin martial weapon, forged from the purest rubidium making it extremely light-weight.

/lotus/language/items/primescarfddesc.value: An ancient Syandana worn during Tenno purification meditation.

/lotus/language/items/primesentinelshotg.value: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Prime Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.

/lotus/language/items/primeshadepowersui.value:
[Placeholder]
With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

/lotus/language/items/primesicarusdesc.value: The Sicarus Prime is an ornamental firearm that fires rounds in rapid bursts, providing a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.

/lotus/language/items/primesomadesc.value: Known for taking down whole squads with its single massive clip, few weapons were as feared as the Prime Soma.

/lotus/language/items/primevastodesc.value: This elegant rapid-fire revolver is the embodiment of superior Orokin craftsmanship.

/lotus/language/items/primevectisdesc.value: Once thought destroyed, the newly uncovered Vectis Prime revives Tenno martial traditions.

/lotus/language/items/prismaarchsworddes.value: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the void’s energy.

/lotus/language/items/prismaarrowdesc.value: Forged from hardened prisma crystal, these extravagant arrows make a bold statement.

/lotus/language/items/prismaburstlaserpi.value: Fires a small burst of lasers.

/lotus/language/items/prismacleaversdesc.value: Blades of energized prisma crystal make these ornamental cleavers cut as sharply as they look.

/lotus/language/items/prismacorpusumpdes.value: When bathed in void energy and prisma crystal, the simple Tetra becomes a beacon of style and intimidation.

/lotus/language/items/prismaexcaliburbun.value: Let Excalibur stand apart with skin and helmets forged from the purest prisma crystal.

/lotus/language/items/prismagorgondesc.value: Adorned with void hardened prisma crystal, this Gorgon variant is prized for its beauty and enhanced mechanics.

/lotus/language/items/prismagrakatadesc.value: Encased in plates refined from pure prisma crystals, this rare element gives this assault rifle a radiant luster.

/lotus/language/items/prismamachetedesc.value: The addition of Prisma Crystal allows this otherwise barbaric weapon to elegantly hack through any foe.

/lotus/language/items/prismasentinelacce.value: An ordinary Sentinel becomes extraordinary with striking prisma accessories.

/lotus/language/items/prismasentineldesc.value: A rare jewel of the void. How could anything so beautiful be crafted for stealth?

/lotus/language/items/prismaskanadesc.value: Forged from raw prisma crystals and infused with void energy, this blade's pristine edge is honed razor-sharp to eviscerate even the most deadly of foes.

/lotus/language/items/prismayamakoscarfd.value: Forged by Orokin era artisans, this exquisite syandana is finished by bathing its prisma crystal in pure void energy.

/lotus/language/items/projectsinisterbad.value: An insignia dropped by an Acolyte of the Stalker.

/lotus/language/items/projectsinisterpha.value: Rewards for completing Phase One of Shadow Debt
Rewards for completing Phase Two of Shadow Debt

/lotus/language/items/promoparisdesc.value: With it’s constantly shifting finish of polished cloud-stone, the Paris Abra Skin is sure to impress.

/lotus/language/items/protectabilitydesc.value: Engulfs a target ally in an impregnable stasis field, preventing damage and slowing player bleedout.

/lotus/language/items/protoexcalibursuit.value:
Discovering the precise nature of this recently uncovered armored prototype has proved elusive. Initial attempts at dating point to ancient origins, perhaps even predating Orokin Empire. 

*Excalibur not included.

/lotus/language/items/protoglaivedesc.value:
A mysterious relic, predating even the Orokin Empire.

*Glaive not included.

/lotus/language/items/prototyperaidsekha.value: Those who risked everything to exact justice for the Tenno are honored with this Sekhara.

/lotus/language/items/provavandaldesc.value: A customized version of the vicious Prova, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.

/lotus/language/items/ps4skanadesc.value: A next-generation skin for the Skana.

/lotus/language/items/razormeleedanglede.value: Expressing the martial finesse and skill of its master, the Uru Sugatra complements the Uru Syandana used in the Tenno Absolution Ceremony.
