/lotus/language/items/scattergrenadedesc.value: The scatter grenade is a medium yield explosive that hurls out several other small explosives on detonation.

/lotus/language/items/scrollingsugatrade.value: With a form that echos the sails of ancient sea ships, this sugatra creates a commanding silhouette on any weapon.

/lotus/language/items/scythestanceadesc.value: Far flung attacks and multi-hit combos.

/lotus/language/items/searchthedeadabili.value: Desecrate Augment - No longer consumes energy, but consumes |HEALTH_AMMOUNT| health instead.
Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.

/lotus/language/items/selfpistolammodesc.value: Restores a bunch of pistol ammo.

/lotus/language/items/selfrevivedesc.value: Recovers you from the knocked down state.

/lotus/language/items/selfrifleammodesc.value: Restores a bunch of rifle ammo.

/lotus/language/items/selfshielddesc.value: Instantly restores 150 shield, even if your shields have been completely depleted.

/lotus/language/items/selfshotgunammodes.value: Restores a bunch of shotgun ammo.

/lotus/language/items/selfsniperammodesc.value: Restores a bunch of sniper ammo.

/lotus/language/items/semiautorifledesc.value: The Latron is a highly efficient rifle that performs well at medium and at long range, its accuracy making it a deadly weapon in the hands of skilled marksmen.

/lotus/language/items/sentelecrailgunrif.value: Standard issue sniper rifle for Diriga.

/lotus/language/items/sentientabilitydes.value: Chroma turns his pelt into a massive sentry that strengthens nearby allies and engulfs enemies in elemental attacks.

/lotus/language/items/sentinelbioweapond.value: Standard issue weapon for Djinn Sentinel. Fires poisonous projectiles.

/lotus/language/items/sentinelglaiveweap.value: [Placeholder] Standard weapon for Helios Sentinel, throws glaives

/lotus/language/items/sentinelhealthrege.value: Sentinel will occasionally heal its owner, restoring |healPct|% health over |duration|s

/lotus/language/items/sentinelmaskdesc.value: A mask attachment for your sentinel pet.

/lotus/language/items/sentinelmaskgunhea.value: A mask attachment for your sentinel pet.

/lotus/language/items/sentinelshotgundes.value: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.

/lotus/language/items/sentineltaildesc.value: A stylish tail attachment for your sentinel pet.

/lotus/language/items/sentinelwingsdesc.value: A pair of wings for your sentinel pet.

/lotus/language/items/shadepowersuitstor.value:
With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

/lotus/language/items/shadespritesentine.value: The Sprite skin customization for the Shade Sentinel.

/lotus/language/items/shamrockcolorpicke.value: Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.

/lotus/language/items/shedabilityaugment.value: Molt Augment - After casting Molt, Saryn regenerates |HEAL_AMMOUNT| health every second for |DURATION| seconds.

/lotus/language/items/shedabilitydesc.value: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.

/lotus/language/items/shieldabilityaugme.value: [Placeholder] Electric Shield Augment - Electric Shield follows Volt, but is reduced in size and reduces movement speed by |SLOW_PCT|%.
Electric Shield Augment - Allies that pass through have |SHIELD_INC| shields restored.

/lotus/language/items/shieldabilityboost.value: Boosting this ability increases the life-time of the shield.

/lotus/language/items/shieldabilitydesc.value: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.

/lotus/language/items/shieldbashabilitya.value: Paralysis Augment - Affected enemies are pulled towards Valkyr and the stun duration is increased by |STUN_INCREASE|%.

/lotus/language/items/shieldbashabilityd.value: Valkyr unleashes her shields, stunning and damaging enemies around her.

/lotus/language/items/shielddebuffkeydes.value: Shields are greatly reduced while key is equipped.

/lotus/language/items/shielddroneballdes.value: Deploys a SHIELD OSPREY EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

/lotus/language/items/shieldregenability.value: Polarize Augment - Mag gains |SHIELD_PERCENT|% overshields from depleted enemy shields.
Polarize Augment - Increases the time for the target's shields to regenerate by |SHIELD_DELAY| seconds.
Boosting this ability increases its range and improves the amount of shield restored or drained.
Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.

/lotus/language/items/shipchristmasifier.value:
For a limited time, adds festive decorations to your Liset! 

Sell this item to remove the decorations at any time.

/lotus/language/items/shipfeaturefoundry.value:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Foundry with the following features:

- Allows construction of Landing Craft
- Allows construction of Air Support Charges

(Equip Air Support Charges in Arsenal -> Gear Menu)

/lotus/language/items/shipfeaturegenetic.value: [Placeholder]Upgrades the Orbiter's Incubator with the following features:

Upgrades the Orbiter's Incubator with the following features:

- Stasis Recovery reduced to 30 mins
- Stasis Recovery can be rushed with Credits
- Kubrows are placed into Stasis if they become mortally ill 
- Egg incubation reduced by a day 
- Stabilizers last twice as long

/lotus/language/items/shiplayercnydesc.value:
For a limited time, adds festive decorations to your Landing Craft! 

Sell this item to remove the decorations at any time.

/lotus/language/items/shipyardeventbadge.value: An insignia awarded to the Tenno who distinguished themselves during Tethra's Doom event.

/lotus/language/items/shockabilityaugmen.value: Shock Augment - Casting on allies will add |DAMAGE_INCREASE|% Electricity damage to their attacks for |DURATION| seconds.

/lotus/language/items/shockabilityboost.value: Boosting this ability increases the damage dealt.

/lotus/language/items/shockabilitydesc.value: Launches a shocking projectile.  It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.

/lotus/language/items/shockballisticenha.value: The Shock Ballistic Enhancer increases your ballistic weapon damage by a small percentage.  The extra damage is shock damage, which is effective against shields.

/lotus/language/items/shotgundesc.value: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.

/lotus/language/items/shotgunmodconverta.value: Convert unused ammo drops into Shotgun Ammo

/lotus/language/items/silenceabilityaugm.value: Silence Augment - Finisher damage is increased by |DAMAGE_INCREASE|% while Silence is active.

/lotus/language/items/silenceabilitydesc.value: Using Silence surrounds Banshee in an aura that stuns enemies and will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.

/lotus/language/items/silverspectredesc.value:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.

Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Phase Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

/lotus/language/items/singlekamadesc.value: The Kama is a Tenno style hatchet, capable of making short work of any foe.

/lotus/language/items/singlestaffdesc.value: A lone Tenno once used this staff to fight back a horde of Infested.

/lotus/language/items/skanaprimedesc.value: A basic blade known as a Skana. It is widely used by the Tenno. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.

/lotus/language/items/skullbadgebronzede.value: Awarded to Tenno who achieved a Bronze Rank on the retired Global Leaderboards.

/lotus/language/items/skullbadgegolddesc.value: Awarded to Tenno who achieved a Gold Rank on the retired Global Leaderboards.

/lotus/language/items/skullbadgesilverde.value: Awarded to Tenno who achieved a Silver Rank on the retired Global Leaderboards.

/lotus/language/items/slashdashabilityau.value: Slash Dash Augment - Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your melee counter by |COMBO_COUNT|.
Slash Dash Augment - Allies in the path of Slash Dash have |NUM_DEBUFF| debuffs removed |SHIELD_INC| shields restored.

/lotus/language/items/slashdashabilitybo.value: Boosting this ability increases the distance traveled and damage dealt.

/lotus/language/items/slashdashabilityde.value: Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.

/lotus/language/items/sleightofhandabili.value: Sleight of Hand Augment - Pickups are turned into proximity mines that deal |DAMAGE| damage with a |PROC_CHANCE|% proc chance.
A natural prankster, Mirage booby traps nearby objects.

/lotus/language/items/slingstone2emblemd.value: An insignia awarded to the Tenno Elite who proved themselves during Operation Eyes of Blight.

/lotus/language/items/slingstoneemblemde.value: An insignia awarded to the Tenno Elite who proved themselves during Operation Sling-Stone.

/lotus/language/items/smhekdesc.value: Forged in the fires of rebel struggle, this shotgun is a force for liberation.

/lotus/language/items/smiteabilityaugmen.value: Smite Augment - Casting on allies will add |DAMAGE_INCREASE|% Radiation damage to their attacks for |DURATION| sec.

/lotus/language/items/smiteabilitydesc.value: Focuses deadly energy within a target and then projects it outwards, damaging both the target and surrounding enemies.

/lotus/language/items/smmarelokdesc.value: Taken from defeated Grineer commanders and rebuilt to improve combat efficiency and reliability.

/lotus/language/items/smokescreenability.value: Smoke Screen Augment - Conceals allies for |DURATION| seconds.
Smoke Screen Augment - Blinds enemies within |RADIUS| meters for |DURATION| seconds.
Boosting this ability increases the duration of the invisibility.
Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.

/lotus/language/items/smscarfdesc.value: The Vaykor Syandana flares up whenever the Tenno takes damage.

/lotus/language/items/snipermodconvertam.value: Convert unused ammo drops into Sniper Ammo

/lotus/language/items/sniperrifledesc.value: Manufactured by the Corpus, the Snipetron is a powerful and accurate rifle that sports optical zoom capabilities. Perfect for long range engagements.

/lotus/language/items/snipetronvandaldes.value: A customized version of the elusive Snipetron, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.

/lotus/language/items/snowflakesigildesc.value: A sigil depicting a snow flake.

/lotus/language/items/snowglobeabilityau.value: Snow Globe Augment - Enemies that enter have a |FROZEN_PCT|% chance to become frozen solid for |DURATION| seconds.

/lotus/language/items/snowglobeabilitybo.value: Increases the amount by which enemies touching your snow globe are slowed.

/lotus/language/items/snowglobeabilityde.value: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.

/lotus/language/items/soloantitoxinbluep.value: Fuses many extracts from both Moonlight and Sunlight variations of Jadeleaf and Dragonlily to create a potent antitoxin.

/lotus/language/items/soloantitoxindesc.value: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.

/lotus/language/items/somadualkamasdesc.value: Razor sharp battle-hatchets, designed to compliment the Soma.

/lotus/language/items/sonarabilityaugmen.value: Sonar Augment - Killing an enemy by shooting the weak spot will trigger another Sonar for |DURATION_PERCENT|% of remaining duration.
Sonar Augment - Affected enemies also become visible through walls for |DURATION|s.

/lotus/language/items/sonarabilitydesc.value: Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.

/lotus/language/items/soulpunchabilityau.value: Soul Punch Augment - Use on a downed ally to revive him with |HEALTH_PERCENT|% of health. Nekros's energy will be consumed.
Soul Punch Augment - depletes up to |ENERGY| energy from the target.

/lotus/language/items/soulpunchabilityde.value: A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.

/lotus/language/items/soundquakeabilitya.value: Sound Quake Augment - Increase damage by |DAMAGE|, range by |RANGE|m and energy cost by |ENERGY|, for every second this ability is active.

/lotus/language/items/soundquakeabilityd.value: Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.

/lotus/language/items/sparksigildesc.value: Shock the world with your sense of style.

/lotus/language/items/spectrearmybronzed.value: An army composed of vapor-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for one conflict.

/lotus/language/items/spectrearmygolddes.value: An army composed of force-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for three conflicts.

/lotus/language/items/spectrearmyplatinu.value: An army composed of cosmic-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for four conflicts.

/lotus/language/items/spectrearmysilverd.value: An army composed of phase-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for two conflicts.

/lotus/language/items/speedabilityaugmen.value: Speed Augment - Enemies touched while sprinting under the effects of speed will take |DAMAGE| electrical damage with guaranteed proc.
Speed Augment - Running into an opponent increases the duration of Speed by |DURATION_INC| seconds.

/lotus/language/items/speedabilityboost.value: Boosting this ability increases its duration.

/lotus/language/items/speedabilitydesc.value: Gain a brief boost of movement speed and place a Hasten Coil which does the same for allies.

/lotus/language/items/speeddebuffkeydesc.value: Speed is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

/lotus/language/items/stablecorruptordes.value: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.

/lotus/language/items/staffdesc.value: A two-handed, reinforced staff that can send multiple enemies airborne.

/lotus/language/items/stairwaytoheavenab.value: Hallowed Ground Augment - The next time this ability is cast it will consume the Hallowed Ground, dealing the remaining damage in a burst with |PROC_CHANCE|% chance of Radiation proc.
Sanctifies the ground before Oberon with righteous fire, inflicting damage to any enemy that stands in the flames.

/lotus/language/items/stalkerarmourarmde.value: Formed from the bones of Sentient fighters and given to the Stalker by Hunhow.

/lotus/language/items/stalkerarmourchest.value: Formed from the bones of Sentient fighters and given to the Stalker by Hunhow.

/lotus/language/items/stalkerarmourlegde.value: Formed from the bones of Sentient fighters and given to the Stalker by Hunhow.

/lotus/language/items/stalkerbowdesc.value: Dread is the calling card of The Stalker. It fires arrows that can decapitate.

/lotus/language/items/stalkercapedesc.value: Formed from the bones of Sentient fighters and given to the Stalker by Hunhow.

/lotus/language/items/stalkerkunaidesc.value: Used by The Stalker, Despair throwing blades have a mono-filament edge, sharp enough to penetrate a Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/stalkerscythedesc.value: Hate is a scythe with a cruel blade, wielded by The Stalker.

/lotus/language/items/stalkertwobundlede.value: All the items bestowed upon the Stalker by the Sentient Hunhow.

/lotus/language/items/stalkertwobundlefe.value: All the items bestowed upon the Stalker by the Sentient Hunhow.

/lotus/language/items/stalkertwogreatswo.value: The Stalker's sword as bestowed on him by the Sentient Hunhow.

/lotus/language/items/stalkertwosworddes.value: A fragment of Stalker's War sword, a symbol of his defeat.

/lotus/language/items/stancemodpackdesc.value:
A pack of three randomly selected Stance Mods. 

Two Stance Mods are guaranteed to be Uncommon.

One Stance Mod is guaranteed Rare.

/lotus/language/items/standardarchwingde.value: The systems built into this Archwing balance offensive capabilities with defensive countermeasures.

/lotus/language/items/startingrifledesc.value: The MK1-Braton is the standard issue rifle for all Tenno. A versatile weapon that can be customized to support a wide variety of play styles.

/lotus/language/items/stealtharchwingbli.value: The Itzal Archwing teleports a short distance, dropping all enemy target locks.

/lotus/language/items/stealtharchwingbun.value:
Pull off the perfect sneak attack with this Archwing gear.

It includes the Itzal Archwing, perfect for covert operations, and comes outfitted with the Centaur blade and guard, and the Fluctus crossbow.

/lotus/language/items/stealtharchwingclo.value: Activates a cloaking field that hides the Warframe and any nearby allies who remain stationary.

/lotus/language/items/stealtharchwingdes.value: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.

/lotus/language/items/stealtharchwingdis.value: Deploys drones that fight alongside the Warframe, each detonating in a destructive blast when killed.

/lotus/language/items/stealtharchwinggra.value: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for |val| seconds.
Forms a miniature black hole that sucks in all nearby objects before rupturing in a massive shock wave.

/lotus/language/items/stealthpackdesc.value: The best gear for eliminating your enemies silently

/lotus/language/items/steelmeridianprofi.value: A profile icon of the Steel Meridian

/lotus/language/items/stickybombdesc.value: The remotely triggered Castanas quietly deliver a lethal dose of electricity to unsuspecting enemies.

/lotus/language/items/strunvandaldesc.value: A different take on a familiar shotgun, the Strun Wraith features unique styling.

/lotus/language/items/sundialpistoldesc.value: This intricate automatic pistol is able to fire its clip which then spins in the air for a short time, firing lasers at nearby enemies.

/lotus/language/items/superchargepackdes.value: A cache packed full of Darvo's finest wares, including a 7-day Affinity Booster, 7-day Credit Booster, a Forma, an Orokin Reactor, an Orokin Catalyst.

/lotus/language/items/superjumpabilitybo.value: Boosting this ability increases the jump height.

/lotus/language/items/superjumpabilityde.value: Excalibur launches into the air, jumping 3 times higher than normal.

/lotus/language/items/supremesomasetdesc.value: This bundle features the Soma assault rifle, Dual Raza battle hachets and Aksomati pistols. Sharing a unique visual style, the weapons in this set will inspire awe in your allies and fear in your foes.

/lotus/language/items/tearinspacedesc.value: A violent blast of void energy tears open a pocket of rift plane which can sustain itself for a short period before collapsing in another lethal blast.

/lotus/language/items/teleporttoabilitya.value: Teleport Augment - Teleport will perform a finisher on the target, dealing |DAMAGE_MULT|% extra damage. |ENERGY_REIMBURSEMENT|% of energy cost is refunded on a kill.

/lotus/language/items/teleporttoabilityb.value: Boosting this ability increases its range.

/lotus/language/items/teleporttoabilityd.value: Ash teleports towards the target, bringing him into melee range and making enemies vulnerable to finishers.

/lotus/language/items/telluriumdesc.value: This rare metal is foreign to the Origin System and can only be found in asteroids that have made the long journey from other stars.

/lotus/language/items/tenguagileanimsdes.value: The Agile Animation Set for Zephyr

/lotus/language/items/tengunobleanimsdes.value: The Noble Animation Set for Zephyr

/lotus/language/items/tengupackdesc.value: Enjoy Update 12 in style. This pack features the latest items, including the Zephyr Warframe and the deadly new weapons: Phage, Akstiletto and Jat Kittag. Rapidly level your new gear with the included 3-Day Experience and Credit Boosters.

/lotus/language/items/tennoanglecapescar.value: Envelope a Warframe in this silky nature inspired Syandana.

/lotus/language/items/tennoarfeatureddes.value: Deadly and elegant. Unload a curtain of steel death with this high-caliber, Tenno Assault Rifle.

/lotus/language/items/tennoassaultrifled.value: Accuracy coupled with a massive clip makes the Soma assault rifle a formidable weapon.

/lotus/language/items/tennocapepackdesc.value: Three colorful silken capes inspired by nature.

/lotus/language/items/tennoclawsdesc.value: Utilizing a new fighting stance, this Tenno weapon turns fists into claws and enemies into messy piles of meat and scrap metal.

/lotus/language/items/tennoconscarfdesc.value: Bestowed upon those who joined together in celebration at TennoCon.

/lotus/language/items/tennodoublebarrels.value: The double-barreled Tigris shotgun fires two bursts in rapid succession, easily taking down the toughest prey.

/lotus/language/items/tennofeatherscapes.value: Envelope a Warframe in this silky nature inspired Syandana.

/lotus/language/items/tennogauntletdesc.value: A pair of mighty gauntlets, the Ankyros were designed by the Tenno for close quarters combat. What they lack in range they make up for in speed.

/lotus/language/items/tennogenavatarfeat.value: A collection of profile icons made by fellow Tenno, from the Warframe community.

/lotus/language/items/tennogenavatarpack.value:
A collection of profile icons made by fellow Tenno, from the Warframe community.

<UGC>TennoGen designs by: Dynline, Epsilon, Fabpsi, Inkary, LocoCrazy and Sharksteeth

/lotus/language/items/tennogreatsworddes.value: With massive charged power and the ability to hit up to five foes in a single swing, the Galatine sword is the heavy artillery of melee weapons.

/lotus/language/items/tennohandshotgunde.value: Chew through the enemy with this vicious automatic hand shotgun.

/lotus/language/items/tennoleafdotcapesc.value: Envelope a Warframe in this silky nature inspired Syandana.

/lotus/language/items/tennoleveractionri.value: This Tenno crafted, lever action rifle, is equal parts elegance and executioner.

/lotus/language/items/tennomiosdesc.value: In the practiced hands of a master, this blade and whip becomes exceedingly devastating.

/lotus/language/items/tennorevolverdesc.value: Steady and reliable, the Vasto revolver combines speed and power for a classic gunslinger feel.

/lotus/language/items/tennoshurikendesc.value: As an alternative to Kunai, these Tenno throwing stars do less damage but they come with expanded ammo capacity and a higher rate of fire.

/lotus/language/items/tennosilentcrossbo.value: Quickly fire off a volley of deadly bolts with the Attica repeating crossbow.

/lotus/language/items/tennosniperriflede.value: A classic Tenno sniper rifle, the Vectis is ideal for ranged takedowns.

/lotus/language/items/tennoswordshieldde.value: This fiery sword and shield combination perfects the balance of Tenno offense and defense prowess. In the hands of a Master, even a defensive tool like a shield can be used as a weapon.

/lotus/language/items/tennotommygundesc.value: A high-capacity, high-damage enforcer, this weapon can switch between the high crit semi-automatic and full automatic firing modes.

/lotus/language/items/tennouzidesc.value: These diminutive rapid-fire Stiletto machine-pistols are just the right size to be akimbo style without sacrificing accuracy.

/lotus/language/items/terrortotemability.value: Terrify Augment - Affected enemies have |SLOW_PCT|% reduced movement speed.
Cast fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.

/lotus/language/items/tidalwaveabilityau.value: Tidal Surge Augment - Clears status effects and grants |DURATION| seconds of proc immunity for yourself and allies that come in contact with it.

/lotus/language/items/tidalwaveabilityde.value: Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water

/lotus/language/items/tigrisredeemersetp.value: A stylish repertoire of weapons incorporating bladed designs for razor-sharp gunplay.

/lotus/language/items/tnobladedpistolsde.value: The design of these hard-hitting dual pistols is a mix of organic and bladed elements.

/lotus/language/items/tnocapedesc.value: The exclusive garment of Tenno chosen to protect the Orokin Council of Executors.

/lotus/language/items/tnogunbladedesc.value: Striking with massive twin blades, the Redeemer fires the killing blow with its built-in shotgun.

/lotus/language/items/tnokrisknifedesc.value: Once the blade weapon of choice for an exclusive order of Tenno assassins, the Karyst dagger grew to become a symbol of honor and duty for all Tenno.

/lotus/language/items/tnomeleedangledesc.value: This sugatra is favoured by Tenno participating in the Conclave, as it is a symbol of unity and conviction.

/lotus/language/items/tnomiterdesc.value: Firing high-velocity blades, this weapon can also be used as a battle-saw, shredding anything unfortunate enough to get within range.

/lotus/language/items/tnomonkspadedesc.value: With its crescent shaped blades flying in sweeping arcs and striking at tremendous speed, the Tipedo demands focus from those wishing to unlock its true power.

/lotus/language/items/tnonunchakudesc.value: With these blazing fast nunchaku, the enemy will never know what hit them.

/lotus/language/items/tnorapierdesc.value: Elevate martial combat into an art form with this Tenno rapier.

/lotus/language/items/tnotonfadesc.value: The Kronen resurrects a lethal fighting style once thought lost to the ages.

/lotus/language/items/tntabilitydesc.value: Fires a high-yield, remotely detonated explosive projectile capable of latching onto targets.

/lotus/language/items/tonfastanceadesc.value: A style exhibiting sweeping slash attacks and swift jabs.

/lotus/language/items/toxininjectordevic.value: The Grineer are using this machine to poison the local habitat.

/lotus/language/items/translatorbadgedes.value: A special emblem worn only by a select few Tenno.

/lotus/language/items/transmutationcorea.value: Ensures transmuted mod is of Madurai polarity and eliminates credit cost.

/lotus/language/items/transmutationcored.value: Ensures transmuted mod is of Vazarin polarity and eliminates credit cost.

/lotus/language/items/transmutationcoret.value: Ensures transmuted mod is of Naramon polarity and eliminates credit cost.

/lotus/language/items/transmutationpartd.value: Removes credits cost and guarantees the resultant mod polarity.

/lotus/language/items/transmutepackdesc.value: A pack of four random Transmute Cores. Including one of these in a transmutation eliminates credit cost and ensures the resulting mod will be of the same polarity as the core.

/lotus/language/items/trapperagileanimsd.value: The Agile Animation Set for Vauban.

/lotus/language/items/trapperalthelmetde.value: Esprit Helmet for the Vauban Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/trapperdefaulthelm.value: The standard issue helmet for the Vauban warframe.

/lotus/language/items/trappermultinadeab.value: Cycle through four deployable trap mines: Bounce, Trip Laser, Shred and Concuss.

/lotus/language/items/trappernobleanimsd.value: The Noble Animation Set for Vauban.

/lotus/language/items/trapperwarframedes.value: The highly tactical Vauban uses his powers to create deadly traps that can zap, imprison and dimensionally crush enemies.

/lotus/language/items/trinityagileanimsd.value: The Agile Animation Set for Trinity.

/lotus/language/items/trinityalthelmet2d.value: Meridian Helmet for the Trinity Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/trinityalthelmetde.value: Aura Helmet for the Trinity Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/trinitydefaulthelm.value: The standard issue helmet for the Trinity warframe.

/lotus/language/items/trinitydeluxebodes.value: Enchant the Bo with this skin

/lotus/language/items/trinitydeluxebundl.value: This beautiful bundle contains alluring skins for Trinity, Bo and the exclusive Bruja Kubrow Armor.

/lotus/language/items/trinitydeluxedesc.value: Embrace the dark power that swirls through this Trinity skin.

/lotus/language/items/trinitydeluxehelme.value: The helmet matching the Trinity Strega Skin.

/lotus/language/items/trinitydesc.value: Trinity is great for players who prefer a supportive role. Warframes with healing technology are rare making Trinity a great equalizer when the odds are stacked against the Tenno.

/lotus/language/items/trinitynobleanimsd.value: The Noble Animation Set for Trinity.

/lotus/language/items/twilightcolorpicke.value: Features earthen hues of brown, and dusky shades of blue and purple.

/lotus/language/items/twingrakatasdesc.value: When one Grakata isn't enough, bring another for extra firepower.

/lotus/language/items/twinkohmakdesc.value: Doubling their volley on each successive shot, the Twin Kohmaks decimate foes in seconds.

/lotus/language/items/twinkohmakfeaturet.value: Decimate your foes with the Twin Kohmaks

/lotus/language/items/u175capebundledesc.value: Step out in style with the Opulas Robe, a symbol of wealth amongst the Corpus elite and the beautiful, winged design of the Igaro Syandana.

/lotus/language/items/u17capebundledesc.value: Try out the latest designs to surface in the Origin System, including the Nelumbo, Udyat and Izvara syandanas and the Vanquished Banner.

/lotus/language/items/u17megapackdesc.value: Get the latest gear to emerge from the depths, including the Equinox Warframe, Solstice Equinox Helmet, Harpak, Kulstar, Ack & Brunt, Final Harbinger stance mod, and complimented with a Credit Booster and Affinity Booster.

/lotus/language/items/u18throwingknivesd.value: The claws of these tactical bombs dig into the target and detonate on command.

/lotus/language/items/uncommonfusionpack.value: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of randomly upgraded Fusion Cores, with one guaranteed Uncommon or better.

/lotus/language/items/uncommonupgradepac.value: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of mods, with one guaranteed Uncommon or better.

/lotus/language/items/update10bundlefeat.value: Get Nekros and the deadliest weapons from Update 10, all in one place

/lotus/language/items/update10packdesc.value: This bundle features some of the deadliest items from Update 10, including the Nekros Warframe and the Carrier Sentinel, both courtesy of the Design Council. Also included is Soma, the new Tenno Assault Rifle and an Ether Reaper, the perfect companion blade for your Nekros Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/update12cosmeticpa.value:
Find all the latest cosmetic accessories for Update 12, bundled in this pack! 

It contains Immortal Skins for Vauban, Saryn, Volt and Nova Warframes, Zephyr Cierzo Helmet and Oberon Oryx Helmet.

/lotus/language/items/update14packdesc.value:
Start playing with the Mirage Warframe, Silva & Aegis sword and shield set and Akzani pistols with this bundle! Includes the 'Eleventh Storm' Stance Mod and Credit and Affinity Boosters to accelerate your gaming experience. 

Also includes a fully crafted 'Hidden Messages' quest key, giving you instant access to experiencing the lore behind Mirage!

/lotus/language/items/update15packdesc.value: Start playing with the Limbo Warframe, Opticor laser cannon and the Halikar throwing mace with this bundle! Includes Credit and Affinity Boosters to accelerate your gaming experience.

/lotus/language/items/warriorstoreitemde.value: Sentinel will attack first visible enemy in range.

/lotus/language/items/waterwarframedesc.value: Rising from the ocean depths, Hydroid harnesses the power of water to a devastating effect.

/lotus/language/items/weaponanalyststore.value: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack the first target it sees.
Upgrading increases the number of parts the Helios Sentinel can fling at a target.

/lotus/language/items/weaponpoisonabilit.value: Toxic Lash Augment - Melee kills create |RADIUS|m toxic clouds, dealing |DAMAGE| <DT_POISON>Toxin/s for |DURATION|s.
When active, melee strikes burst spores causing them to spread to nearby enemies.

/lotus/language/items/weaponskinscontest.value:
A collection of weapon skins made by fellow Tenno, from the Warframe community.

<UGC>TennoGen designs by: MaaYuu, Verifitas, ming1345, ZeroJackdaw, Rekkou, StratoS117

/lotus/language/items/weaponupgradeplace.value: [Placeholder] Missing Loc tag! Please create a loc tag for this upgrade in Items.loc

/lotus/language/items/welloflifeabilitya.value: Well of Life Augment - On death, marked enemies will drop |HEALTH_ORBS| health orbs with a |ENERGY_ORB_CHANCE|% chance of dropping an energy orb.

/lotus/language/items/welloflifeabilityb.value: Boosting this ability increases its duration and the health leech percentage.

/lotus/language/items/welloflifeabilityd.value: Create a well of life on an enemy. Allies will gain health when damaging the target.

/lotus/language/items/whipstancebdesc.value: Powerful arcing strikes with energetic flips.

/lotus/language/items/wikiabadgedesc.value: A special emblem worn only by a select few Tenno.

/lotus/language/items/winteraccessoriesb.value: This essential bundle contains everything you need to bring the Winter spirit to Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/winterbundledesc.value: Celebrate the Winter holidays in style!  This bundle includes Mirage and a host of Winter-themed items.

/lotus/language/items/worldonfireability.value: World On Fire Augment - Enemies hit have a |KNOCKDOWN|% chance of being knocked down.
Boosting this ability increases the duration and area of effect.

/lotus/language/items/wormholeabilityaug.value: Worm Hole Augment - Allies that travel through wormhole gain a |SPEED|% speed bonus for |DURATION| seconds.

/lotus/language/items/wormholeabilitydes.value: Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.

/lotus/language/items/wraithlatrondesc.value: The Latron Wraith is a powerful variation of the standard, semi-automatic rifle that features unique styling.

/lotus/language/items/wraithmachetedesc.value: A different take on a familiar combat knife, the Machete Wraith features unique styling.

/lotus/language/items/wraithtwinvipersde.value: The uniquely styled Wraith Twin Vipers are a powerful variation on the standard akimbo machine-pistols.

/lotus/language/items/wukongalttwohelmet.value: An alternative helmet for the Wukong Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/wyrmpowersuitstore.value:
With 'Warrior' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

/lotus/language/items/wyrmprimedesc.value: Both bodyguard and status symbol, the Wyrm Prime Sentinel was the last line of defense for high ranking Tenno in the Orokin Era.

/lotus/language/items/xmasglaxionskindes.value: A festive skin for the Glaxion.

/lotus/language/items/xmassonicorskindes.value: A festive skin for the Sonicor.

/lotus/language/items/yellowantitoxinblu.value: Fuses the extracts from Sunlight Threshcones and Sunlight Dragonlily to create a strong antitoxin.

/lotus/language/items/yellowantitoxindes.value: This is a moderately effective antitoxin.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangauradesc.value: In Night Form reduces damage inflicted by nearby enemies. In Day Form increases Power Strength of nearby allies.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangauradescaug.value: Pacify & Provoke Augment - Pacify converts damage done to allies into an aura that slows enemies by |SLOW|%. Provoke converts damage done to enemies into |STRENGTH|% extra Power Strength.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangburstabilit.value: [Placeholder] Mend & Maim Augment - Mend damages enemy shields by |SHIELD_DRAIN|/s and restores ally shields by |SHIELD_REGEN|/s. Maim damages enemy health by |HEALTH_DRAIN|/s and regenerates ally health by |HEALTH_REGEN|/s.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangburstdesc.value: In Night Form, allies are healed with each nearby enemy killed. In Day Form, nearby enemies are bled and then subjected to a wave of slashing force.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangdesc.value: Split between day and night, Equinox manifests aggressive and defensive forms at will.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangswitchabili.value: Metamorphosis Augment - Equinox's other half breaks free for |DURATION| seconds, dealing |DAMAGE_MULT|% damage.
Metamorphosis Augment - Switching to Day-form staggers enemies within |RADIUS|m and knocks them down when switching to Night-form.
Switch forms, temporarily gaining bonus shields and armor in Night-Form, or bonus damage and speed in Day-Form.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangtargetabili.value: Rest & Rage Augment - Killing an affected enemy causes the effect to spread to enemies within |RADIUS| meters for |DURATION_PCT|% of the remaining duration.

/lotus/language/items/yinyangtargetdesc.value: In Night Form targets are put to sleep. In Day Form targets become more vulnerable to damage.

/lotus/language/items/yomosyandanadesc.value: A traditional garment, popular with high ranking Tenno.

/lotus/language/items/zaptrapabilityaugm.value: Tesla Augment - Every pair of Teslas will connect forming a beam that will cause |DAMAGE| Slash damage when contacted.

/lotus/language/items/zaptrapabilitydesc.value: Launches a grenade that holds an electrical charge, zapping enemies that come within range.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrcierzohelmet.value: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Zephyr.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrdesc.value: Specializing in air attacks and mobility, Zephyr dominates from above.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrdivebombabil.value: Dive Bomb Augment - Enemies within |DISTANCE| meters of the point of impact are dragged into it.
Zephyr nose dives towards the ground creating an explosion on contact.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrhelmetdesc.value: The standard issue helmet for the Zephyr Warframe.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrtailwindabil.value: Creates a blast of energy, propelling Zephyr through the air, damaging anything in her wake.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrtenguhelmetd.value: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Zephyr.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrtornadoabili.value: Tornado Augment - Creates |NUM_TORNADOES| additional tornadoes. All tornadoes are |SIZE_MULT|% their original size and won't pick up enemies.

/lotus/language/items/zephyrturbulenceab.value: Turbulence Augment - Turbulence increases movement speed by |MOVEMENT_SPEED|% and projectile speed by |PROJECTILE_SPEED|% for Zephyr and her allies.
Turbulence Augment - Turbulence increases movement speed by |MOVEMENT_SPEED|% and projectile speed by |PROJECTILE_SPEED|% for Zephyr and her allies.
Creates a wind shield around Zephyr, redirecting all incoming projectiles.

/lotus/language/launcher/prime_access_la.value:
Prime Access offers instant access to the latest Prime Gear and exclusive items! Who and what are these gilded masterpieces? Origins of the Orokin era. Supreme masters of gun and blade.

Visit the in-game Market to obtain the latest Prime Access offering different packs including Prime Gear, exclusive items and discounted Platinum.

/lotus/language/launcher/serversdown.value: The content servers are temporarily unavailable.

/lotus/language/launcher/system_software.value: "PlayStation Network" features are disabled - an update for the system software is available.
Xbox Live features are disabled - an update for the system software is available.

/lotus/language/launcher/tab1_desc.value:
Corpus and Grineer ships have received a substantial upgrade to their reactors - it's time to discover a new way to Sabotage! Enemy upgrades include new security measures and failsafe cooling systems that will alter the environment as you play.

Choose a unique Sabotage strategy and destroy these new reactors in the improved Reactor Sabotage 2.0. Play to the strength of your squad and take down those ships, Tenno!

/lotus/language/launcher/tab2_desc.value: New advancements in harnessing Infestation has led to deadlier weapons in the hands of the Tenno. Use the range of the Lesion staff to pierce enemy defenses at a comfortable melee distance or the Mutalist Cernos to deliver toxic contagion from afar.. Brain-strikes excite the Dual Toxocyst sidearm, causing it to rapidly release toxic munitions.

/lotus/language/launcher/tab3_desc.value:
The Second Dream unveiled the desolate Moon from The Void. But there was once a time when the Orokin ruled over the Solar System from this prestigious satellite, a home full of awe-inspiring architecture.

The time has come to explore both timelines. Your deft spy skills are called upon as you overcome time-bending challenges on new Moon missions.

/lotus/language/menu/currentprimeaccessd.value:
INSTANTLY UNLOCK THE NEW PRIME GEAR AND DISCOUNTED PLATINUM!

Prime variants are the most sought after items by Tenno. For a limited time, you can purchase this package and gain instant access to Vauban Prime, Fragor Prime and more!

Pack Includes:
- 2625 Platinum – Highly discounted from its regular price, Platinum is Warframe's Premium in-game currency.
- Vauban Prime Warframe – Transform the battlefield into a weapon with this gilded tactician. Features unique mod polarities for extended customization. 
- Fragor Prime – A beautifully forged instrument of devastation. 
- Akstiletto Prime – Stylish, discreet and accurate, perfect for the Tenno of distinction.
- Exclusive Vauban Prime Avatars – Show your loyalty in-game and in our community with these Exclusive Profile Icons.

/lotus/language/menu/currentprimeaccesso.value:
ACCESS EXCLUSIVE PRIME GEAR AND DISCOUNTED PLATINUM FOR A LIMITED TIME WITH THE PRIME ACCESSORIES PACK! 

Masterpieces of the Orokin era, Prime variants of gear are the most elusive and rare items, coveted by the Tenno above all else. The Exclusive Prime Accessories Pack will be available for a limited time ONLY through Prime Access.
Increase your rewards with 90-day Affinity and Credit boosters, doubling the rate at which Affinity and Credits are collected. Display an Orokin relic upon the hilt of your weapon with the Cateno Prime Sugatra. Charge into battle with the Citadella Prime Syandana 

Pack Includes:
- 1365 Platinum 
- Citadella Prime Syandana – Evoking fortress designs of the ancient past, this is Vauban Prime’s signature Syandana
- Cateno Prime Sugatra – An Orokin relic of the highest distinction
- 90 Day Affinity Booster
- 90 Day Credit Booster

/lotus/language/menu/mainmenu_referedpla.value:
Welcome Tenno!

We need your help to fight the Grineer and reclaim the solar system! Your friend referral has given you an extra advantage. I have added a 7-day Affinity Booster to your Arsenal. This will double the rate that you earn Affinity in the game, helping you upgrade your weapons and Warframes faster.

Your first mission is at the Terminus node on Mercury, found on your Solar Map. That will be the only mission available to you until you successfully complete it. As you complete more missions, you will soon unlock new regions of space to explore.

Be diligent, Tenno!

The Lotus

/lotus/language/menu/nextprimeaccessdesc.value:
INSTANTLY UNLOCK THE NEW PRIME GEAR AND DISCOUNTED PLATINUM!
 
Prime variants are the most sought after items by Tenno. For a limited time, you can purchase this package and gain instant access to Saryn Prime, Nikana Prime, Spira Prime, and more!
 
Pack Includes:
- 2625 Platinum - Highly discounted from its regular price, Platinum is Warframe's Premium in-game currency.
- Saryn Prime - A golden blossom conceals deadly nectar. 
- Nikana Prime - An ancient blade predating the fall of the Orokin Empire. Forged using techniques lost over the centuries, the edge remains sharper than that of any modern Nikana.
- Spira Prime - These rare, braided throwing daggers were a favorite tool of high ranking Orokin assassins. 
- Exclusive Saryn Prime Avatars - Show your loyalty in-game and in our community with these Exclusive Profile Icons.

/lotus/language/menu/nextprimeaccessorie.value:
ACCESS EXCLUSIVE PRIME GEAR AND DISCOUNTED PLATINUM FOR A LIMITED TIME WITH THE PRIME ACCESSORIES PACK.
 
Masterpieces of the Orokin era, Prime variants of gear are the most elusive and rare items, coveted by the Tenno above all else. The Exclusive Prime Accessories Pack will be available for a limited time ONLY through Prime Access.
 
Increase your rewards with 90-day Affinity and Credit boosters, doubling the rate at which Affinity and Credits are collected. Adorn the ancient Syandana worn during Tenno mediation with the Cycuta Prime Syandana, along with an ancient glyph, the Cycuta Prime Sigil.
 
Pack Includes:
- 1365 Platinum 
- Cycuta Prime Syandana
- Cycuta Prime Sigil 
- 90 Day Affinity Booster
- 90 Day Credit Booster

/lotus/language/menu/storymodedecisionpa.value:
The Prologue will introduce you to the core mechanics of the game, and will allow you to progressively unlock features aboard your Liset ship. You may skip this mode if you would 
prefer to begin the game with your ship completely unlocked. You will not lose any items in your inventory, Mods, Resources, Credits, or Platinum if you choose to play through
the Story Mode, however you will need to unlock the basic features of your ship. What would you like to do?

Ship features, such as Foundry, Arsenal and Navigation will be unlocked as the Prologue is completed. You must complete the Prologue to fully unlock all the features of your ship. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You have chosen to skip the Prologue. All base ship features will be unlocked. Are you sure you want to proceed?

Operator,

Terrible news, |PET_NAME| has died. Internal deterioration caused by lack of DNA Stabilization eventually turned fatal. 

Ordis has taken the liberty of ejecting its remains into space. The incubator is now free, should you wish to raise another pet. Ordis hopes you will.

Ordis, Ship's Cephalon
