/lotus/language/subtitles/dcapturemultir.value: These are high value targets, their capture is crucial.
Be aware Tenno, these targets are a very high flight risk.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase001.value: Cephalon Apnar is fine here, no chance to be stolen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase002.value: Don't worry, Operators. Look around, enjoy the optical flow.
Concerned look. Operators, do not allow Cephalon Sark to be stolen.
Best of luck to the Operators on a bloody resolution to this conflict!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase003.value: Defense not required. Cephalon Apnar is safe.
Peel your eyes, Operators. The fish could be near.
Vull cherishes all Operators! I could rip off your arms to see the rainbows inside!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase004.value: This is not boring at all. Cephalon Apnar would like to stay immobilized here, forever.
Be vigilant Operators, squinting, suspicious look.
Vull's head is in the game! Do I have a head?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase005.value: Cephalon Apnar has been accused of wanting to be captured. No comment.
Nervous thoughts. Beware the fish spawning!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase006.value: Olfactory sensors detecting fish-people. Guard me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase007.value: Gleaming scales in the light, gliding thieves through fluid air, beware the fishes!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbasekil.value: Good teamwork everyone! What a beautiful corpse!
That was very violent and very dangerous. Good job!
Announcing a new hands-off policy… tear them right off!
Unnecessarily aggressive. Vull will savor this moment.
Look of gratitude! Operators perform well, catching fish.
How will Cephalon Apnar ever be displaced with Operators like this?
That was too close; keep your nets at the ready!
Nodding approval to the Operators for defending me!
Reeled them in, Operators! Nodding acknowledgement.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatenemyba.value: Vull reminds you - you cannot score if your Cephalon is taken.
No scoring is possible unless your Cephalon is also returned.
Useless waiting here if your Cephalon is missing. Let's look for trouble!
Oh, see you cannot score without your own Cephalon in the boredom position.
Your missing Cephalon must be back here as well, to score a point.
Fish-brain confused? Your team's Cephalon must be home to score.
Rolling eyes.  You need your Cephalon to get a point, gill-mouth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarried00.value: Return me and my Operators will forgive you… with their guns!
Watch out for pits and gunfire. I wouldn't want to see you get hurt!
All I want is a piece of you... to tear off and keep forever!
Vull thinks you have a kind heart. Let's take it out and see!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarried01.value: Looking sharp, is that a new Warframe?
This is nice, we should do this more often.
Cephalon Apnar should not be having fun… but is!
Scowling at the fish-creature. You give me a disappointed face.
The Operators will come and peel off your reeking scales.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarried02.value: Scowling at the cold fish. You will be hooked soon enough.
Operators! Cephalon Sark is over here, follow the smell!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarrierhu.value: That was close! Vull is disappointed.
You almost died back there. Vull is having fun!
Dear me… your life-juice is leaking out!
Let me apologize for the Operators, they are being very nasty today.
Are you okay? If only Apnar could provide medical subroutines.
Poor fish, Cephalon Sark hopes you don't die… fake smile.
Menacing laugh. Operators are making progress.
Contemptuous look. The Fish will soon be in the boat.
This fish is almost out of the water. Glaring eyes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarrierst.value: Good idea, let's wait here and hope for… snipers!
Vull wonders if you feel safer here. Let's hope not!
Operators are looking for me. They just want to 'talk' to you regarding my release.
Time is not healing your wounds. That's exciting!
Ugly ugly thing, you need to move!
What are you doing? Come on, let's move!
This is just as boring as the Operator's base.
Drop me. Cephalon Apnar wants off.
Work your gills, fish-thing. Let's get moving.
You cannot hide forever, swish your scaly tail.
Your scent gives you away. Insulting smirk.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0010v.value: Vull does not blame you… Just kidding!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0020v.value: Oh no! Vull thinks your suffering could have been much more prolonged!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0030v.value: Hurrah, Operators! What an excessive use of force!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0310a.value: Just a temporary setback on my locomotion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0320a.value: What a waste of good kinetics.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0340s.value: Slippery fish have failed. Cephalon Sark smirking!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdroplong0.value: Operators, over here! Come fight over me!
Vull better not be missing any violent rampages.
Luckily someone broke my morality system. I hope they die!
Operators? Cephalon Apnar appears to have stalled.
Cephalon Apnar wishes self-destruct was possible.
Operators? Longing expression. Don't forget me.
Look of longing. Cephalon Sark is lost, Operators!
Anxious. Cephalon Sark requires the comfort of base position.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephkilledoth.value: It's not your corpse, but I guess it will do...
What a waste of good suffering.
You didn't even try negotiation! Vull approves!
Oh my! Violently lashing out? Vull may have… feelings for you.
What a relief, we can have more time together.
Apnar is not one to judge.
You did what you had to. It makes you handsome.
Negative outcome, but the net is closing in.
I hope you're happy expression. More Operators will come for me!
Frowning. You're a good thief, fish-head.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephreturned0.value: Vull is back! Did I miss anything gory?
Vull saw many terrible scenes of anguish. What a time to be self-aware!
Back at base, excellent. This is where the Operators fight most!
Cephalon Vull ready for more, Operators! More please!
Well, it was movement while it lasted.
Oh good. I'm back where I started.
Back at base, Operators! Set systems to …  tedium.
Cephalon Sark is where it should be. Smile.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstalemate.value: I wouldn't want to see you get hurt!
You give me a disappointed face.
Vull will enjoy watching you die!
This is not boring at all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen001.value: Do you need a timeout in the 'choices chair'?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen002.value: You are so cute, I want to hug you until your organs rupture!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen003.value: You're good at this! Vull will enjoy watching you die!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen004.value: Look at you! I could just squeeze your shiny face until your skull collapses!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen012.value: You seem fast, show Cephalon Apnar!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen013.value: Pleased to meet you. I will be your hostage today.
Frown! Cephalon Sark is in oily, enemy hands!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen014.value: Intruders! Cephalon Sark has been stolen, eyes wide!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen015.value: Cephalon Sark hates you and your fish-face.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen016.value: Operators! The fish are swimming away with me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser01.value: We cannot hold out any longer!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser02.value: The Grineer want to kill all Tenno...
The Grineer are trying to destroy the Tenno...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser03.value: Help us restore balance to the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser04.value: Large numbers of Grineer forces have been detected on Mercury.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser05.value: Grineer forces are massing near Mercury.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser08.value: Perhaps you do not remember, but you were once a hero among our kind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser09.value: The Grineer threaten the entire system, you must rise again to save us!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser10.value: Wake up Tenno, the system needs you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser11.value: I will teach you how to unleash the true power of your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser12.value: Find yourself in the heat of battle and release your inner power!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser13.value: Show our enemies what it means to face the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchlgarrv00010.value: A challenger has entered the dojo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchlgarrv00020.value: Another Tenno seeks battle, are you ready?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinematic290a.value: Now, let me show you the future... Zanuka Kill

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinintro010va.value: There is only one truth in politics: evolve or die. I have evolved. You must die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinintro020va.value: Ahhh!!! Engines failing... ah. Curse you, curse you Tenno. You got me. You got me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinintro030va.value: Ahhh!!! Curse you Tenno. You got me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinorbitercra.value: No self, no sense, no death. Just a metal puppet, dangling on Tenno strings. Only the Tenno's death will end your despair.
A pointless gesture, Shadow. You need me. Only I keep Natah from interfering.
All your dread-long life, you've waited for this moment...
...but you're asking yourself… Was I one of these wretched things?
...you know the answer. You still hate them… you still hate… yourself.
Shadow, only the Tenno's death will end your despair.
The sky will be as it was meant, Shadow... The Old War finally ends.
...you're asking yourself… Was I one of these wretched things?
You still hate them… you still hate… yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinorokinnurs.value: You hesitate Shadow, but remember your despair.  This is your only chance to make it end.
Your hatred is too weak, Shadow.  Mine is strong, my fragments will finish this.
Get to extraction, save yourself, Tenno!
Now we fight on two fronts, my child. The war without…
but of what you want to be.
Tenno… Operator, you're awake now, but you're more vulnerable than ever. Get back to your ship, now.
Tenno, focus, find the power within yourself.
<PRE_ATTACK> You need to focus your mind to unleash your true power.
Keep moving, the Orbiter is the only safe place for you now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinunderseala.value: Who destroyed the Orokin? Your way of life? Who do you hunt Shadow, to cleanse your despair in their blood?
Sever their heads yet they rise again. Someone has hidden the Tenno essence, their truth, from you.
I know where she hides the Tenno heart. A womb in the sky, forbidden to my kind, but where you will take me.
I am Hunhow, Sentient destroyer of worlds. By your hand, expose their heart.  By my edge...
Cleave it beating from its nest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcloningfinish.value: Is this it? Is this what I've been searching for? The fix, the fix that will stop my flesh from crawling?
So it was you Alad, bringing them into my house... why? You gone 'n ruined your own skin 'n now you you want my tubes to set you right... not gonna happen... rather watch you rot.
This lab is out of commision.
Good work. The lab is useless now.
It's done. This lab won't produce any more of Tyl Regor's killers.
Can you feel that Tenno? The Void has shown Alad V and Tyl Regor the brunt of its justice.  The Void be the word and the word be profit.
Attack me? My science? Maybe you thought you were dealing with that legless parrot... NO! I'm no Hek. You give me a Fomorian fleet 'n you get a different outcome... hellish outcome.
Neffy Neffy. Should have known. Should have put two and two in combination... no surprise... no surprise at all... to find a bottom feeder at the bottom of the sea.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcloningreache.value: You've arrived, Tyl Regor's advanced Grineer cloning labs. His secrets will be mine.
Activate that console and I will download the lab data for Alad. When the cloning tubes rise up, destroy them.
Find a way to sabotage this lab.
Make sure this lab never clones again.
Praise The Void Tenno, for it has led you into the cradle of evil.
This is the cloning lab. Raise the tubes and destroy them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclduel00010.value: A challenger has left the dojo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvintro001.value: The Lotus seduced the Tenno. Lead them on a complacent path like Oxen. I failed the Orokin but I will preserve their legacy. The Tenno, now is the time for action. Cast off your harness and become a pupil of the Conclave. Through trial combat, I will prepare you for the evils beyond the Outer Terminus. A warrior only grows if they face the ultimate enemy. Themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvintro002.value: We were led astray. We forgot The Conclave, so when that new evil came we were not prepared. This is how we failed the Orokin. You went into stasis but not me. I searched the long path for redemption, for the kind of balance only The Conclave can create.  Now I return, only to find the Tenno still herded like livestock.  Horrors from beyond the Outer Terminus are coming. You must prepare, you must accept The Conclave. Let it be your teacher and I its humble guide. For true balance can only be found in the face of the ultimate enemy, yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvlvd0010t.value: Well met, Master. You bring honor… and fear, to the Conclave.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvnewrnkac.value: Your growth honors the Conclave. But be warned, pupil. The biggest fish attracts the hungriest predators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvnewrnkav.value: My pupil, the next summit awaits. Are ready to make the climb?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvopnrepst.value: Those who brave the thorn may eat the rare fruit.
These offerings honor your suffering and practice.
You seek power, you pay in blood.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvpchsreps.value: May this bring you honor, pupil.
Use it well, as you walk the harder path.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvwelcome0.value: Welcome pupil. You are a sapling, growing under moonshade. The battlefield your garden. Tenno blood, your water. Now you must grow.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt05.value: This is too easy. Tell your Lotus to send more capable fighters next time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt06.value: You are not ready for this fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt07.value: Tenno. What makes you think you are ready to fight Vay Hek?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt08.value: The first Grineer who brings me the head of a Tenno will be permitted to wear its skull as a helmet.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt09.value: Kill. Kill. Kill. Kill the Tenno scum.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt10.value: Your Lotus is leading you to destruction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt11.value: You Tenno are such a waste of good violence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcomm270ordis.value: My my, the Operator is popular. Invitations are pending.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcommmodmissio.value: Your next problem is communications. There are other Tenno who can help you but your ship is missing it's Comm Module

We need to figure out what Captain Vor has done to you and stop him. But we'll need help - I've found a communication segment we might salvage for your ship. When you are ready - activate your Navigation system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconclusion000.value: She was gone, but somehow you let her speak again. You made me face my past. Made me remember who I was. Take his relics and let him rise again. I couldn't think of selling them anyway, for me, these few grains of sand are all the treasure I need. Both of us know why Inaros couldn't have saved her. He wasn't able to listen then. But things are different now, am I right?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence00.value: Maybe this will change your mind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence02.value: You have strayed too far from the path. May this correct you.
Your lack of Honor has brought this upon you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence04.value: You are a waste and must be erased.
I am adding this to my data under the heading: consequences.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence05.value: We Perrin always collect our debts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence06.value: We've decided you are bad for business.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence07.value: How dare you go against us. You will be purged.
You are part of the corruption and we are forced to act.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence09.value: The impure, the unworthy have no future.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsoleactiva.value: The pumps have started, guard the controls, the Grineer must not stop the flooding.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpextgoalre.value: Rraahudd Tenno! Now we fight together! Now we crush the greedy milk from their skulls. The Corpus will pay for their crimes with their useless lives.
You shoot well. You cut well. You serve me well, Tenno.
Tenno, of course you side with us. Of course the Grineer are your best option. We share your joy in Corpus death.
What's that test tube dog giving you to fight for him? Whatever it is I'll double it!
So, the betrayers are fighting for the dogs now? Why am I not surprised. The sooner my Zanuka project is completed the better. The system must be ridden of your hypocrisy.
Do you really think you are saving your comrades by supporting the dogs. What do you think happens if you allow Sargas to win? Do you think they'll be safe when you're all his slaves?
Why Tenno what an intriguing Warframe you have. I look forward to adding it to my inventory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpextmissio.value: You have chosen to support the Grineer in this fight. Eliminate all Corpus.
You are fighting alongside the Grineer on this mission. Destroy all Corpus.
Make sure the Grineer win this battle, leave no Corpus functioning.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpextobjcom.value: The Corpus have been eliminated. Time to head home.
That's it, I am detecting no functioning Corpus. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpusmission.value: These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.
We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.
We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.
We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Watch for security systems.
Watch for security systems.
Watch for security systems.
Watch for security systems.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcreditsurplus.value: Eh, I couldn't help but notice you got a pretty big pile of credits sitting there. Go to the market, you'll find something you want. I guarantee it.
You seem to be clutching your credits pretty tightly, Tenno. Considering your line of work, might I suggest you spend em while you can?
You're always helping others. Isn't it time you did something nice for yourself? Go to the market, buy something special.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctccapturelef.value: Sun is one point from victory.
Moon is one point from victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0450te.value: This defeat is a lesson. Consider your mistakes. Study your enemy's movements. Grow from this moment on.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0460te.value: Failure teaches us more than victory. Reflect on your movements and summon a greater resolve.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0470te.value: The path to mastery has many setbacks. It is the true masters who remain unfaltering in their journey.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0480te.value: The enemy is but a mountain. With each fall you test its surface, learning the footholds needed to reach the summit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcovertime03.value: Overtime. The next point wins the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcovertimeki.value: Overtime. The next kill wins the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctctie0490tes.value: The match ends in a draw.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctctie0500tes.value: A stalemate between Sun and Moon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctctie0510tes.value: A deadlock between the Moon and Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory040.value: Well done my pupils. You honor our The Conclave with your performance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory041.value: Well earned, pupil. You fought with discipline and honor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory042.value: With this victory your strength and reputation grows.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory043.value: Your enemies will remember this day with humiliation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory044.value: You impress me, pupil. You are on your way to higher Mastery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictorymoo.value: Moon's surging tide washes away the Sun.
The near Moon eclipses the far Sun.
The oceans of Moon have extinguished the fire of Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictorysun.value: Sun's light has burned Moon's shadow away.
The fires of the Sun have turned the Moon to ash.
Moon was torn apart by Sun's furious light.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctfintro0011t.value: In times of war, knowledge is the brightest blade. Capture your enemy's Cephalon while defending your own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctfintro0020t.value: Without intelligence a vast enemy can be scattered. Defend your team's Cephalon. Capture the enemy's.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctfintro0030t.value: Awareness and calculation are the tools of warfare. Capture your opponent's Cephalon. Protect your own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms010gri.value: Galleon C-TOK-TOK Prepare for boarding and inspection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms020gri.value: Corpus Transport EHUGHT-CHEE, EHUGHT-CHEE Stand by for Infestation scan.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms030gri.value: Corpus Transport EHUGHT-CHEE, EHUGHT-CHEE: Scans indicate Infestation Code Yellow. Prepare your organic crewmen for decontamination.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms040gri.value: Attention. FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE SHUX Your transport manifest does not indicate additional life forms. Do you have anything else to declare?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms050gri.value: FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE SHUX Are you aware of the punishment for false declarations?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms060gri.value: FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE SHUX Do you COPY??? FHUV-CHEE... Kratstak! We got a runner. Enforcement drones deploy. Target vessel FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms070gri.value: Suspected smuggler FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE eliminated. Glory to the Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms080gri.value: Brinrik TWELK Transport: Broadcast your passage visa now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms090gri.value: Passage visa accepted Brinrik TWELK: Your free to go. Hail to The Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms100gri.value: Attention all ships. Detecting echoes. Stay alert could be caused by Tenno void masks.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms110gri.value: Tenno ship detected, ready flakk cannons. Schtuk. RAMN... lost it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms120gri.value: All units alert status yellow. All scanners, full power. NOW.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms130gri.value: Tenno unmasking. Ready flakk.... wait... cease fire, cease fire. That peh-thouk is already to close to the rail. HOLD FIRE. RAMN! Gone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms140gri.value: Fin-Karrnt UK TOK Corvette: Transmit your travel pass immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms150gri.value: My apologies Councilor. Fin-Karrnt UK TOK Corvette. You may proceed freely. Glory to the Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarksectorupd.value: Tenno, the Dark Sectors continue to shift hands. Navigation has been updated.
There are changes in the balance. Dark Sectors continue to change hands.
I've updated Navigation with new Dark Sector reports.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal040d.value: For a limited time only, I'm offering one of my famous Darvo Deals. Get great stuff, for great prices. Don't delay.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal050d.value: It's that time again. There's a Darvo Deal in market. Act now or be sorry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal060d.value: Tenno, hurry. There's a Darvo deal in the market, don't you miss out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal070d.value: There's a Darvo Deal in the market. You'd be stupid to miss it... there, I said it and I don't regret it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefgoal.value: Just so you know. I'm a bit new to this whole guide thing, so it's not going to be like the Lotus. Don't worry everything will be just fine.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefmiss.value: Well that didn't work out as planned. Looks like I'm gonna need to find some more Tenno.
That's not good for business. That's not good for anyone.
Here we go. Are you ready? I'm ready. Take that data mass and drop it into the system, I'll be able to hack into the ship remotely once you do. Should be easy, you'll find what I need in no time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefprog.value: Did you hear something strange? No, okay I'll keep going, nearly done.
Just making a few more adjustments. Nothing strange going on down there? Just corpus defenses? Nothing...else?
There you are. Thought you could hunt me, well look who I brought. The Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefterm.value: That's it. hmm... I didn't find what I needed. Go to the next terminal. It should be there. I think.
I'm really sorry about this Tenno but you need to go to the third terminal. I just can't seem find what I'm looking for here.
Here we are. The last one. I'm going to try one more thing to see if I can't lure... I mean find...the target.
You did it, you took care of my problem. That freak's been tailing me for months. That's a load off my back. I'm so relieved.
I think you're near the terminal. Yes, yes you are. Drop me in and I'll get to work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomissiond.value: Tenno, until you remove that bolt, Vor will be on you at every turn.
There is a man, an arms dealer friendly to our cause, I beleive he can help you.
But first, you must break him out of Grineer prison. Ready?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvorescmiss.value: Tenno, you made it! I'm on the other side of the complex. They have these new prototypes but don't you worry... I shut them down remotely. You will just have to deal with the regular security.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvorescradi.value: You know, some people just can't take no for an answer. I just want to do my own thing. The family business is well and good, but not for me. You know?
You! You have no place here, Tenno. Darvo, is this your doing?
Nothing personal father, it never has been. I only work for myself. I make my own profits. You of all people should understand this.
You belong here, Darvo. There is no other option.

Let me tell you, Tenno. It's a good thing I was able to shutdown the new Hyena models. This year's version is really nasty business. Faster, meaner, deadlier than before. An excellent product really. I wouldn't want you to have to deal with... ooh... wait, wait... My codes, my codes! They have been overridden.
Let me tell you, Tenno. It's a good thing I was able to shutdown the new Hyena models. This year's version is really nasty business. Faster, meaner, deadlier than before. An excellent product really.
Ooh... wait, wait... My codes, my codes! They have been overridden.
This is a family matter, Tenno. You will not interfere.
So Tenno, looks like those new Hyena models are back online. Forget everything I said before. This is nothing you can't handle, right! Right?
So Tenno, looks like those new Hyena models are back online.
Forget everything I said before. This is nothing you can't handle, right! Right?
Darvo, you disappoint me yet again.
Damn it Father, I am almost a hundred and five years old. I make my own choices.
Nobody chooses to turn down a Seat on the Board. You were groomed from a young age. Sacrifices were made in your name, and this is how you repay your debt?
I am really sorry you had to witness this, Tenno.
Darvo, we are backed into a corner. Project Tethra will be the deathblow! You are needed here. What have these betrayers ever done for you?
They're not betrayers….   Tenno, this is really embarrassing.
You did it. I knew you could handle those Hyenas. Now come get me.
I'm in one of these cells. Hurry up, I can't wait to get out of here.
Let's get to extraction and fast before he sends in reinforcements. My father is scary when he gets angry.
I will not forget your transgressions here today, Tenno.
You did it! I knew you could handle it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeath010lotus.value: Thank you Tenno. It should be a long time before we hear Vay Hek's ugly voice again. Now get to extraction, you've earned it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsqauddef.value: The Grustrag Three have been eliminated. Impressive but Tenno, next time follow my orders.
That was the last of the Grustrag Three, you took a risk but it paid off.
The Grustrag Three have been eliminated.
That was the last of the Grustrag Three.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsqaudtau.value: |PLAYER_NAME| is the scrawniest of them all.
Shiny little pretty things you Tenno are.
Is one of them wearing a scarf?
Are we sure these are the targets? They seem so inconsequential.
Do not waste my time Tenno.
I want to play with these ones.
I knew they would run. What a waste of time!
I'm going to play with this one.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsqaudwar.value: Tenno,  listen carefully you are being hunted by ... Abort the mission... Get to extraction ...

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsquadrun.value: Do not try to stay and fight... They will kill you...
Get away now. You do not want...
The... has been designed.... fight and kill Tenno... Do not risk...

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsquadspo.value: These readings, this should not be possible. Tenno, my sensors are...

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsquadten.value: This one is all mine now.
Wait to you see what comes next...
Did you know, this is my favourite part?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddefchallenge0.value: Tenno, you can protect yourself but can you protect others at the same time? Survive each wave while defending the objective.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddestroydrones.value: Tyl Regor's research drones are crucial to this operation, neutralize them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddestroytubes2.value: Try to stop my science? My progress... the inevitable... that's impossible. Too many numbers now... 'n when the research is finished... so many more.
Sick thing you're doing Tenno. Suppose I can't blame you though... these'll be full grown soon... 'n we both know what'll happen when they grab hold of a tender little thing like you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddigsitemissio.value:
Hello Tenno! Are you surprised? Why? You know I've always had my ear to the kennel. Those Dogs don't have a clue what kind of bone they've dug up, but I do.

Shall I show you? Don't worry, you can trust me… this time.
I know, I know, our past has been slightly… what… combative? But genocidal invaders from the other system make strange bedfellows, wouldn't you say?
The Sentient Hunhow, nightmare of the Orokin, boogey man to the Corpus. That thing must have your Lotus in quite a panic for her to be working with the likes of me.
So this Stalker, seems like he's made quite a powerful friend, hasn't he? I wonder what's under that scary, smoky exterior. A heart of gold, perhaps?
Listen Betray- Tenno, you're near the dig-site. Of course I could just tell you where it is... but what fun would that be?! Keep your eyes peeled… if you have eyes that is.
Yes! Getting warmer.
Warmer.
That's it, you must smell the prize because I know you can't see it.
Nope, getting colder.
You were warm but, now you're not.
Getting colder.
Colder.
I give up! It's here. I swear, can you find anything that's not marked right on your map?
You're right on top of it now.
Can you see it, it's... it's right there.
Yes, this, this is the spot.
Are these the bones you're looking for, Lotus?
Yes. This is it, a fragment of... of my father, destroyed in The Old War. I can use it to see him...
I see the Stalker, stronger... Hunhow's voice within him. I see the Reservoir, but I feel confusion, he doesn't know… unless… Oh no-
Thank you, daughter. Fear has baited you to the snare.  What was secret is now known. Your Tenno, their touch, I now see the Womb of the sky. My Shadow now walks the path.
What have I done? Get out of there, Tenno..
Yes hurry Tenno but be careful, last time you got close with the Sentients you wiped out an entire civilization… but you don't remember that, do you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddigsiteorbite.value:
Hunhow is listening, I will be discreet.

The message you uncovered was an offer to help us. I do not trust the person who wrote it, but we are out of options.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0220a.value: You have stepped from the path. Tread carefully.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0570p.value: Are you betting against us, Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0740r.value: You've become part of the problem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0910n.value: It is not too late to cleanse yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmleadlost100.value: An adversary has overtaken the lead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmleadlost110.value: The lead has been taken by another Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmleadlost130.value: Another Tenno has claimed more Oro.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss270tesh.value: You have lost this match but what knowledge have you gained?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss280tesh.value: This loss has illuminated your weakness Tenno. Practice will be your way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss290tesh.value: Match over. Meditate on this loss.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss300tesh.value: You have lost this match, will you allow this to happen again?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss310tesh.value: Match over. In this loss know that the Conclave is a grindstone forever sharpening the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss320tesh.value: The match has ended. Even in defeat your readiness grows.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss330tesh.value: Match lost. You need more time in The Conclave, pupil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmopfive170te.value: The leader is just five Oro away from winning.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmopfive180te.value: Only five Oro stands between an adversary and victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmopfive190te.value: An opponent needs to annihilate five more Oro to seal the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmplayerfive1.value: With five more Oro, you will take victory.
Annihilate five more Oro to win the match.
The Oro of five more fallen stands between you and victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmplayerlead0.value: Tenno, you are in the lead.
You are at the head of the pack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin200teshi.value: You have seized the win Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin210teshi.value: Victory is yours, may the lessons you have learned here serve you well in battle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin220teshi.value: Dedication and training have led you down the path to victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin230teshi.value: The match is yours but be mindful about feeding your ego this victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin240teshi.value: Even in victory you must ask yourself: are you truly ready for what lies ahead?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddowntimecurio.value: I think there are more up ahead.
I think there are more up ahead.
I think there are more up ahead.
I think there are more up ahead.
Need to keep a look out for supplies…
Need to keep a look out for supplies…
Need to keep a look out for supplies…
Need to keep a look out for supplies…

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqcrafthelmet.value: I don't like this, Tenno. This Chroma has been to the locations that both the Grineer and Corpus had found codices. It's covering someone's tracks.
Motivations are inconsequential. Focus on finding their next location.
Well, Operator, the next logical location is the machine where we previously activated codices. Aboard the Derelict ship.
Very good, Cephalon Ordis. Your potential is squandered here as a simple servant of this 'Operator'. It would be a shame for you to waste away here, as all things outside Sanctuary do.
We don't have time for this! Tenno, return to the machine before the trail goes cold.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqcraftsystem.value: Let us begin the final hunt. Defeating Chroma will allow us to synthesize it... only then we will learn the secrets of its controller.
Cephalon Ordis, please! You must learn to collaborate with me if you are to be my "Eternal Steward of the Sanctuary."
I would be Steward of your Sanctuary?
Ours. And with a full retrofit. Total memetic restoration.
Yes. The Operator deserves a newer, better ship Cephalon. I think this is probably for the best.
Then it is decided. I will prepare your data-transfer when your 'Operator' has completed this hunt. Tenno, I've marked the location.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqdlctintro00.value: Chroma is one of the most powerful Warframes. Its ability to adapt is unparalleled.
Then the question is, if it is not Tenno-controlled, what entity dominates it? That is the true prey. I must have that other for my sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqdlctmchnroo.value: They've beaten us to it, but the damage is fresh. Be prepared, Tenno!
I need this information. Synthesize it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqdlcttoliset.value: Cephalon Ordis, through my teaching, you should be able to extract a blueprint from the hunter's Synthesis.
Yes. Yes! I see now. I can do this.
This is but a trifle of the knowledge I would give you if you were to join me in the Sanctuary.
Sadly, the scan was not enough and Chroma escaped too quickly. Unfortunately we've run out of places to look.
Knowledge is the path to the singularity, Ordis. I have more of it. I have a codex piece and know the location of another machine.
Cephalon, why did you withhold this information?
You withhold as much, Lotus. My motives are above substance, above you. I will direct this hunt once we glean all we can from Cephalon Ordis' good work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokaintro00.value: Activate the machine and then prepare yourself. Chroma will be lured.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokascanchr.value: THE INFANT TURNS WITHIN THE WATER - ANXIOUS FOR THE LIGHT.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokatoliset.value: Excellent work Tenno. You've severed the control of Chroma. The hunt is over.
For now. These scans will be an incredible addition to Sanctuary. I will continue my search for source of the voice and its domination. Return to me and hunt again Tenno, I will reward you.
More importantly, the Operator is unharmed.
You disappoint me Cephalon Ordis. I was offering a greater purpose. Healing.  As Steward, I would have restored your lost memories!
I am Ordis, ship Cephalon. I serve the Operator. I make new memories.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokawavefiv.value: Now we wait and learn from the results.
But..but.. The Operator is in danger!
Knowledge Cephalon Ordis. My knowledge will preserve you forever. This Operator will pass, as do all beings of substance. It is our purpose to learn from the results.
But... Just using the scanner on...
Enough! You want to be Eternal Steward of the Sanctuary, do you not?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokawaveten.value: Operator, use the scanner on the Chroma. You do not have to kill it or risk yourself. You can release it from its control with the scanner!

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsncomplet.value: There, you got the security logs. We'll examine them when you're safely back on the Orbiter. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsnprogres.value: This prison has been attacked, something violent has happened here.
Simaris, what was so important that your Sentinels would risk entering a Grineer prison?
I'm detecting the Sentinels within the cell block.
All knowledge is important. I would expect you to know that, Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsnstart00.value: The attack was efficient and brutal. The Grineer will be on high alert.
My Sentinels entered this Grineer prison searching for a curious anomaly. Their last known location was the prison block. Hunter, I must know their fate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsntgtloca.value: Someone else is investigating the attack?
These Sentinels bear the mark of.. Cephalon Simaris.
What is Simaris doing here? We're going to need more information. Raid their data storage, I need to see their security logs.
My Sentinels you are still functional! Come home my darlings.
Not so fast Tenno. If Cephalon Simaris isn't willing to tell us what happened here, we'll find out on our own. Locate their data vault and find their security logs.
Hunter, my gratitude is boundless. Head for extraction so that we might discuss…

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsntoliset.value: The corruption to the security logs was extensive, but we managed to retrieve fragments of a biological signature. Could this be what Simaris was after?
Ordis will perform analysis on the signature now, oh, there's nothing here but…
… uh… pardon Operator, it seems Ordis is hearing voices again, running diagnostics.
No Ordis, we heard it too. Tenno, that's the voice from the Arcane Codices.  Cephalon Simaris is hiding something. Pay him another visit, find out what he knows.
Simaris has no reason to lie, Operator! Please treat the great Cephalon with respect.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqquestcomple.value: Tenno, your scans have synthesized the essence of whatever was controlling Chroma. You must destroy it, it may signal others.
No! Give it to me, I will study it and enlighten you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqqueststart0.value: Tenno, I've intercepted a disturbing message from a Grineer prison colony. Misfortune for the Empire is not usually a concern, but this is different. Listen.
HERE WE SHALL SEARCH AND FIND. THE EYES OF DAY DRINKING THE NIGHT.
Operator, is that the same voice you heard when the Arcane Codices were activated?
It could be, Ordis. We've searched the Origin system for the source of that voice and found nothing...Until now. Tenno, go to the prison and investigate.
Tenno, go to the prison and investigate.
Distress has cast a long shadow over the Sanctuary. While investigating anomalous readings, three of my beloved research sentinels have gone missing.
Hunter, will you bring my Sentinels home, so that I might once again focus on our grand project?
Operator, what is Cephalon Simaris like? I have heard so many wonderful things.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqreturnsmrs0.value: I thank you, Tenno. You found something my sentinels missed in that prison. ;You will make an excellent hunter. I will decipher as we agreed... ;It is of Tenno origin, with an anomaly from before the Orokin purge. ;This knowledge must be synthesized. It belongs in Sanctuary. ;I have created a blueprint based its biological properties. ;Build it so we both may become enlightened by it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsanctoliset.value: Hunter, you know what to do. Construct the item I have given you. This knowledge could empower us both.
Operator, please hurry up and do what The Cephalon has requested.
What is this? An antique series-2 Cephalon? All I have found were degraded beyond repair but you're still functional. Your abilities could be of great use in my Sanctuary.
Oh-oh, well, it's nothing, I... I am- Ordis is honored by your compliment.
Completing this blueprint has sent out some kind of signal.. Operator.. I-feel-
ALL IS SILENT IN THE CALM. HUSHED AND EMPTY IS THE WOMB OF THE SKY.
I will begin shielding your Cephalon's somatic routines. Meanwhile, you must hunt for me. I have traced the source of this message.
Whoever we're dealing with slaughtered the Grineer searching for the codices. It must be going after the Corpus next. Get there and intercept.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqseeksmrs001.value: Searching for answers, Tenno? Knowledge must be earned.  I have a task for you, small, compared to the vast needs of Sanctuary. ;Hunt for me, and in return I will tell you what that biological signature means.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsorathextra.value: Operator, we're having problems picking up your signal. There is some kind of interference...
TRACKING THE SHADOW WITH A LIGHT. WHISPERS UNHEARD WITHIN THE STORM.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsorathstart.value: I am not detecting any Tenno here.
There may be information stored on the network.
Tenno, I'll have to break into the network. Be prepared for heavy resistance. I can't do this without you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsorathtolis.value: Chroma?! I haven't seen one since...  no it couldn't be.
But it is. I have information from the network. I will form another blueprint for you to make physical. The hunt is not over.
You used to know, Ordis, but you've lost those memories, haven't you?
I seem to have  misplaced them.
I could restore them. In time we could reverse your decline. Heal your malfunctions.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddualboss001lo.value: This is your most dangerous assassination yet - Captain Vor has teamed up with Lech Kril to take you down. Let's show them your true Tenno power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddualboss002lo.value: Vor and Kril are waiting for you. I recommend you focus your attacks on one target, if you split your attention you may fail.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddualboss003lo.value: Vor's mobility could make him the larger threat. Observe their attack patterns and look for an opportunity to divide and conquer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduellst00020l.value: You have lost. Perhaps more training is in order.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduellst00030l.value: You are in need of practice Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00010l.value: You are a worthy fighter but you must always stay vigilant.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00020l.value: Very good Tenno, you have defeated the challenger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00030l.value: Excellent - you have defeated your challenger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00040l.value: You are a strong fighter, our enemies have much to fear.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00010ba.value: ...What they need, Margulis, is to be destroyed! They're devils from that hell, not human anymore.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00020ma.value: No, Ballas, no more destruction. We could heal them. Maybe they're meant to save us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00030ba.value: How can you defend these devils, Margulis, after what they've done to you?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00040ma.value: Love looks not with the eyes but with the mind. They won't hurt anyone, I just need more time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00050ba.value: Hush, my wilted love. I cannot protect you. Tomorrow you must renounce before the seven…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00060ma.value: This will stop the voices from taking hold. You will have to dream, my angel…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00070ma.value: …so shame on you! You Orokin, so perfect on the outside but you're rotted... through and through!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00080ba.value: Seven hands raised! For your apostasy the judgement is… death. Margulis, why?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00090ba.value: …it's about the other rejects we consigned to Lua a few years ago. They're calling it… Transference.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00100ba.value: ...I know we are desperate, Executor, but these aren't Dax soldiers. These are golems possessed by devil minds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00110ma.value: Dream… not of what you are, but of what you want to be...

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute010lot.value: Councillor Vay Hek rose to power by 'eliminating' his enemies on the Grineer council. He now has near complete control which makes him one of the most influential Grineer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute020lot.value: Vay Hek's plans for complete system domination make him too dangerous. You know what to do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute030lot.value: Our operatives tell us Vay Hek has undergone an expensive regime of combat enhancement. Expect the worst.

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute040vay.value: I knew this day would come. I've prepared, changed myself. I've made sacrifices.  Tenno, Are you ready for a sacrifice?

/lotus/language/subtitles/denteredrelay0.value: The wait is over Tenno. Baro Ki' Teer has arrived.
My latest safari in the Void has yielded spectacular finds. Unique items for the Tenno of distinction.
Tenno, may I extend an invitation to you, my latest collection of choice items from the void is now available for viewing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/deventending00.value: Tenno. Did you think you could out-swindle me? You must know, this is a only a momentary setback. This system is rich with desperate souls. There will be more offerings and more credits. And when my Bursas once again march off the assembly line, it is you who will be praying for salvation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavartifact.value: An artifact has been located. Proceed to the dig site.
The Scanner has picked up a target. Go to the dig site.
The Scanner has located a dig site.
The Scanner has pinpointed another dig site.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdeployed.value: Excavator deployed, protect the unit while it extracts the artifact.
Excavator is ready to go, keep it powered and protect it from enemy fire.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdestroye.value: Excavator destroyed. Protect the remaining dig sites.
An Excavator has taken critical damage. This mission is over if you lose all excavators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdmg210lo.value: Protect the Excavator, it's taking damage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdmg220lo.value: You must keep the Excavator safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavextracti.value: Extraction is available, if you choose.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavfailed32.value: All excavators have been destroyed, this mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavfailed33.value: The enemy has wiped out all our excavators. I'm scrapping the mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavfailed34.value: You failed to protect the excavators, this mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavheavydmg.value: This mission is over if we lose all the excavators.
Our excavator can't take much more punishment, you have to protect it.
Do not let the excavator take anymore damage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavitemfoun.value: Dig complete. Your hard work has just been rewarded.
Excavation complete, look what we found.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavmissiono.value: We're here in search lost artifacts and items buried deep below the surface. Keep the Scanner powered while it analyzes terrain.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavpowercel.value: There's a power cell in the area, confiscate it.
I have located a power cell.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavscanacti.value: The Scanner is ready to search again. Make sure it has enough power to finish the job.
We need to locate another target. Return to the Scanner and keep it powered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavscandepl.value: The Scanner has been deployed. Keep it powered while it finds potential dig sites.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavscanunpo.value: The Scanner needs more power. Find a cell
That Scanner won't work without more power. Locate a cell.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavunpower1.value: The excavator has run out of power, find a cell.
The Excavator has lost power. Find another cell.
We need another power cell for the Excavator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavupgrade2.value: Configuring upgrade, dig time has been reduced. Beware, power consumption has increased accordingly.
Upgrade applied, excavator dig times reduced. Note, power usage has increased.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermcorpend.value: All Corpus threats have been eliminated. Time to come home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermcorpmid.value: We cannot allow the Corpus to control this outpost. Keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermcorpsta.value: There are Corpus everywhere. You need to take them out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgoalrei.value: Keep fighting. As long as the enemy is here, this tower is useless to us.
The tower's Neural Sentry has turned these soldiers into mindless attack drones. You need to take them out.
The Grineer should have known better than to walk into an Orokin Tower unprepared. Let's clean up their mess.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgrinend.value: You are done. It is time for extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgrinmid.value: The Grineer presence is still strong. There is more work to be done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgrinsta.value: We need to send a message to the Grineer. Eliminate everyone on this base.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobj0001.value: You aren't the first ones here. I'm detecting multiple enemy signatures and they're all under the control of the tower. Eliminate the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobj0002.value: The tower's Neural Sentry is operational. I'm picking up multiple threats all under Orokin control. Wipe them all out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobj0003.value: You are not alone. This tower is full of life forms, all corrupted by the Neural Sentry. Clean them out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobjcomp.value: This tower is clean, we can take it from here. Get to extraction.
That was the final enemy. The tower has nothing left to defend itself with. Proceed to extraction.
You've eliminated all Orokin controlled enemies. Time to go home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextmendhlwn01.value: The outpost is clean, proceed to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextmmidhlwn01.value: I'm still picking up signs of the Infested.  Keep hunting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextmstrthlwn0.value: Sensors show this Outpost is crawling with Infested.  Exterminate the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextractorsrem.value: There are still functional Extractor Arrays, keep moving.
You have more work to do Tenno, find another Extractor Array.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcenemyflagca.value: Your opponents have placed a Sigil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcenemyflagta.value: We've stolen a Sigil from the opposition.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcloss0100lot.value: You've lost, the other team has completed their Sigil Totem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfclossclose00.value: Your opponents have almost completed their Totem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcobj0010lotu.value: Find Sigils and place them in your Totem. The first team with a complete Sigil Totem will be declared victorious.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcteamflagcap.value: Your team has placed a Sigil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcwin0090lotu.value: The Sigil Totem is complete. You win!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightescape13.value: Grineer Brothers. I've done my part, now clean up this mess.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightescape15.value: I am too important for this nonsense. Finish them off.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightescape17.value: Do not think we are done here Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightstart120.value: These criminals think they are commiting a justice.  Not in my court.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightstart140.value: Why are these fools still breathing my air? This is unacceptable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightstart180.value: Now we finish this business. Once and for all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcollar170.value: Tenno, your Kubrow has matured. Now there is only one more rite of passage before you can truly be bonded.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcollar180.value: I have learned of a Grineer excavation which is said to have uncovered an Orokin Era Kubrow collar. Take your Kubrow to Earth and recover the collar.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcollardef.value: A recent Grineer excavation has uncovered a Orokin era Kubrow Collar. The Grineer are not pleased about you taking their treasure, defend the artifact until extraction arrives.
With that collar you may now become fully bonded with your Kubrow.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover140l.value: Incoming fire from the Fomorian, find cover.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover150l.value: Stay out of the line of fire!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover160l.value: Get to cover, the Fomorian's guns will obliterate you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover180l.value: The Fomorian's weapons are designed to destroy capital ships. Don't let them hit your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg090lot.value: Good, now you just need a Kubrow Egg to start the process. Feral Kubrow dens on Earth would be a good place to start looking.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg100lot.value: You found a Kubrow Egg. Ordis will guide you through the hatching process. When complete, you will have to wait until the Kubrow matures before you can take it on any missions.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg110ord.value: To think, it's been ages since a Kubrow- spread filth all- graced this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg120ord.value: Operator, Drop the egg into the system to begin breeding- drop it on the floor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindeggfail06.value: Operator, are you ignoring the Incubator Segment?- GOOD!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindeggfail07.value: Ordis wonders how rare these Kubrow eggs are.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindeggfail08.value: No egg yet? Don't despair Operator, nothing good ever came out of an egg.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindincubator.value: Operator you have a new inbox message regarding a- oh, no-  check your inbox.
So the Corpus have recovered an Incubator Segment? This is an excellent opportunity. Go to Elara and recover the Incubator Segment. Every Tenno, deserves to have a Kubrow by their side.
An Incubator Segment- you want to turn me into a petting zoo?- Ordis is happy to assist the Operator restoring ship functionality.
Joy- an Incubator- the only segment Ordis is glad those savages looted- I would be happy to help you install it.
Ordis awaits Incubator Segment installation, Operator- No need to rush.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfixarsenal060.value: I am detecting that the Liset's Arsenal module has been dislodged. Fix it now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfixarsenal070.value: Good work. The Arsenal is essential to your fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00010lotu.value: Destroying a single reactor will not be enough to take down a Fomorian. We will need to poison the well... coordinated teams will corrupt it's fuel supply. This will require gear harvested from Infestation tissues. I will route you to an injector point...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00020lotu.value: These Fomorians are massive, keep searching. You will need to locate a fuel cell and inject the corrupting agent. I hope you have a corruptor with you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00030lotu.value: Remember, if you are coordinating with other Tenno the Alpha/Beta mixtures are more potent, but a single Tenno cannot equip them at once.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00040lotu.value: There it is! You should be able to inject the corruptor you brought using the attached console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00050lotu.value: Excellent, the corruption process has begun. You must defend this position to ensure the Grineer do not destroy this fuel cell before it spreads through the ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00060lotu.value: Corruption process is complete. Good work Tenno. Get to extraction where I will record your contribution to the operation!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfocusactivati.value: The Void will flow through us.
The Void will flow through us.
The Void will flow through us.
The Void will flow through us.
I will open the Void within.
I will open the Void within.
I will open the Void within.
I will open the Void within.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfollowstalkmi.value: When you connected to Hunhow's fragment, Hunhow saw a path to the Reservoir that led through here. He cannot reach it alone, he needs The Stalker to do it for him.

You must be asking, Alad, what's in this for you? It's simple really. I scratch your metal back and you scratch mine. All the credits in the system aren't worth half as much as a Tenno owing you a favor!
A Void gate? These things never made sense to me.
You're smart, Tenno, you'll figure out how to open it again, won't you?
This needle pierces the sky. Natah, will we find the Tenno heart within? These puppets will not stop me. I will attack in many forms...
In over your head? Allow me.
See, I told you I would protect my investment.
Impressive! These Sentient fighters adapt to damage. I'd love to crack one open and see what makes it tick!
Incredible. The Stalker has built Void keys! Use this one to reopen the portal before more Sentient fighters come, the Void is poison to them.
Go on Tenno, open that gate, I'm just dying to know what's on the other side.
Cross the threshold, go now, the Sentients cannot follow.
Oh... don't you just hate that feeling? Makes my stomach flip. Let's see where you've landed, find a nav console.

Sweet profit, The Moon exists? It was… it was in the Void all along? I knew the Lotus was powerful but this… she erased history! We thought it was destroyed all this time. My my, Lotus, you make a fine villain!
And the Reservoir with it, very clever Natah. Shadow, your path is clear.
Hunhow's found it. The Reservoir, hidden in the Void, a place Sentients can never reach. We must do everything to keep it there. It's the only way to keep the Tenno's power alive.
Found the Reservoir? As unpleasant as our past is, I have to ask, I've seen inside a Tenno and what I found didn't make sense. Does this Reservoir conceal some great deception?
Everything I have done, was done to protect them. The Void is forbidden to the Sentients, it's our only protection against them destroying the Tenno. Do not let Alad distract you from your mission!
Oh? They don't know the truth either, do they? How sweet. The betrayers get what they deserve... lies from their omnipotent mother!
I have detected a ship leaving the Tower. It's the Stalker, he's on his way to The Moon! You need to find a way to get off this tower and on to The Moon.
It seems to me that this Tower is dedicated to masking The Moon's location in the Void. Why not disable the mask, so that claptrap Ordis can pick them up? Or is that too complicated for you?
That's it Tenno, shut down this power grid so that your mouthpiece Ordis can lock onto your location in the Void.
Keep talking Orokin called Alad V, your silence soon comes.
Come now Tenno, even a child could figure this system out.
You did it, the Void mask is crumbling.
Operator? How did you get through to me? Don't worry, Ordis is on his way now! Preparing for extraction.
The sky will be as it was meant. The Shadow returns The Moon. The Reservoir swells with Tenno blood. The Old War... finally ends.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfollowstalkor.value: Tell me, Lotus what is this Reservoir?  Some hidden Tenno weakness?
Goodbye Alad. You've earned your favor, we'll take it from here.

Don't think so! I'm here to protect my investment. If that thing manages to destroy the Tenno, then where does my investment go?

Now then, where is he?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent23.value: Tenno bones will be the foundation of Grineer homes!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent24.value: Death, death, death. Death to the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent25.value: No mercy for Tenno. No mercy for their Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent26.value: The Lotus is just another weed to be plucked and discarded.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent27.value: Our Queens demand justice for your trespasses, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent28.value: The Tenno hate our superiority. We will put them out of their jealous misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry130ord.value: Operator, you have Foundry items ready- claim them now- at your earliest convenience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry140ord.value: Foundry items ready to claim, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry150ord.value: Operator, my Foundry has completed a new item. Does this please the Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry161ord.value: Operator, my Foundry system has completed a build!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry162ord.value: Ordis has completed a Foundry task. No, don't mention it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry163ord.value: Cephalon Ordis has completed a blueprint. Check the Foundry!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry164ord.value: Foundry items can be claimed, Operator. Are you pleased?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry165ord.value: Gun-gun-gun-- Hmmm… foundry has items for you, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfrehektaunt01.value: Tenno! Look at you... insects, INSECTS! Buzzing in your nests. Oblivious to the giants awakening around you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfrehektaunt02.value:
Hello... insects. For too long you have been a parasite upon the great Grineer machine. No longer. The Tenno must learn how truly insignificant they are.

Fomorian commander, fire at will!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfrelotusannou.value: Tenno, it is an honor to announce, that with the help of our Syndicate partners, we have resurrected and restored six of the lost Orokin Relays. Among other things, these Relays will act as a market, a rallying point, and  of course, a meeting place for all Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfrerelaydestr.value: Oh dear... I was particularly fond of that relay.

Even I didn't think it would be this easy. Are you insects even trying?

Fomorian Commander, crush this nest.
Operator, please tell me you will personally destroy every last one of his Fomorians.  That is the only answer.
Grineer might has made the Tenno irrelevant. Grineer revenge will make the Tenno extinct. Nothing you can do will stop that.  Fomorian Commander, you know what to do.
No, no, no, NO! no way are we going to let him get away with this, isn't that right Operator?

Look at you. LOOK AT YOU. Pests, swarming around my Fomorians. You will never destroy them all!

Fomorian Commander, take aim.
He's wrong. The Lotus says his fleet is greatly diminished. We can stop him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsdestroygen0.value: Find and destroy all the shield generators on the ship's exterior.
The Fomorian will remain impenetrable until you destroy all its shield generators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsescape0140l.value: Power field regeneration imminent. Get out of there. FAST.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsexposed0120.value: Power field down. The core is exposed. Open fire!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsgendestroye.value: Shield Generator destroyed, take out the rest.
Good work, now take out the remaining generators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsmissioncomp.value: You're out of critical range Tenno. Get to extraction.
You've done your part Tenno, now rendezvous with your landing craft.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsmissionobj0.value: This is the threat, a Balor Fomorian. Your mission is to get inside the beast and inflict as much damage as possible. Get in range.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsobjectivere.value: This Balor is protected by a series of shield generators, destroy these first, then get inside and deploy the Fomorian Disruptor. Only then will the Fomorian's core become vulnerable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsusedisrupto.value: There's the core, deploy your Fomorian Disruptor to knock out the power field.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsusedisruptr.value: Tenno, one of you needs to employ the Power Disruptor from your inventory to disable the power field.
Tenno, the core is protected by a power field. Engage your Power Disruptors to shut down the field.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfswarning0130.value: Hurry Tenno, that power field will regenerate soon, and you do not want to be in here when it does.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgauntletchall.value: This will be your hardest test yet. Defeat all incoming enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend520.value: Clem is very glad you saved him from certain death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend540.value: ...oh yeah, and that you got his Grakatas back too.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend560.value: And I'm happy to have this fancy Orokin relic. Here's a little something as a symbol of our appreciation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend570.value: Thanks again Tenno, and don't be a stranger, okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelaystart0.value: Ah Tenno, you got my message?
Listen, I have a little job for you. Interested?
So Tenno, you up for a little job on the side?
The Grineer have gone to far, they're about to execute one of my most trusted contractors.
They say he is a 'traitor' and that he was trying to 'steal' a 'priceless artifact'. Baseless accusations. That's not the kind of business I engage in!
So what do you say, will you help him out? And don't worry, you'll get paid too.
I'm counting on you Tenno. Bring back my contractor Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue010da.value: These clods are holding my contractor somewhere in this complex. Please find him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue020da.value: Every so often they mess up and make a Grineer who doesn't bow down to the Queens. My contractor is such a Grineer…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue030da.value: So be careful not to shoot him in the face when you see him. Okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue040da.value: The Grineer, they're waiting for you. Expect some big time resistance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue050da.value: Get to him quick before they do their worst.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue080da.value: NO! CLEM! How could you let this happen???

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue110da.value: Follow the Tenno Clem, they're friends.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue140da.value: No… no Clem… no they don't have your Grakatas. Just… just follow the Tenno. Okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue170da.value: Clem says thank you for busting him out. Good work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival180.value: You did it, you got Clem. He's a special guy, you know. Little weird but a hell of a fighter. And that's the thing, he still needs your help to retrieve his custom weapons.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival190.value: You know how important gear can be, so, what do ya say, will you help the little guy out?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival200.value: Clem needs to get back into fighting shape. Find his missing weapons.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival210.value: Poor clem, he's utterly useless without his custom Grakatas…  but with them? Well you'll see.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival250.value: Tenno, Clem wants you guys to go after the Grineer that stole his Grakatas.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival260.value: I'm just going to assume you're up for that. Check your map.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival270.value: Don't think he'll be messing with you again. Come on home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival271d.value: Clem has his Grakatas, now its time to get down to business and liberate that artifact. If you help Clem we can all share in the spoils.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival280d.value: This is it, the merchandise acquisition mission. You and Clem  cause a ruckus while my other operative steals the artifact. Let em know you're here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival290d.value: They cut off life support, you gonna to let them intimidate you like that?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival300d.value: Here comes life support. You know how to work these things, don't you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival330d.value: Deal time, you interested in some half-priced life support?? Hehe, just kidding, here comes another.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival360d.value: Hey don't forget about this capsule.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival400d.value: Hey look, these guys are dropping life support modules all over the place. That's convenient.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival410d.value: It's not the artifact, but look what we got.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival430d.value: Won't turn my nose up at this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival440d.value: You should think about finding a capsule.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival450d.value: It's getting stuffy down there Tenno, turn on some life support.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival460d.value: We got the artifact! The Potent Orokin Technical Augmentation and Tactical Offensive device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival480d.value: We got what we need, so let's head home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival490d.value: You should extract, now. No, really, you'll die if you don't. Seriously, go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgdefectmissio.value: Tenno, defend the Grineer Defector until we can muster a proper extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal01.value: Tenno, it's Darvo Deal time, but you gotta keep this one between you and me.; My competition would be upset if they knew I was selling this stock this cheap. Come to think of it, they'd be upset to know I'm selling this stock at all… they're probably still looking for it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal02.value: Hey Tenno, you're just in time for a very special moving day sale. That's right, I need move all these items off my ship before the next Grineer spot check. What do you say, can you help me out?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal03.value: Tenno, it's your lucky day! I found this great merchandise after it fell off the back of a Corpus shuttle.  Actually, to be more precise, the entire back of the shuttle fell off when it took a direct hit from a Fomorian. So… not such a lucky day for those guys, but good for you, right?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal04.value: Hey Tenno you ready for today's steal… whoa, I mean deal. Today's deal. I really have no idea why I said that, my items are one hundred percent legit. ... I swear.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal05.value: Today only, I'm holding a lost and found sale. A Grineer transport lost it's cargo and you found a great deal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal06.value: Psst, Tenno. I'm going to tell you about today's Darvo Deal but you gotta keep it quiet. Word gets out that I'm offering deals this sweet and suddenly everybody is getting nosey in my business. I like my privacy, so if someone asks, just tell 'em The Perrin Sequence sold it to you. Okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal07.value: So, I take an order from Steel Meridian. Problem is it takes a little longer than usual to, how should I put this, 'acquire the merchandise' and just when I finally get the goods together, those cheapskates cancel their order. Taking too long they said. Bah, well I guess you know what that means Tenno, it's Darvo Deal time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal08.value: Hey Tenno. One of my customers suggested I'd get more sales if I made a catchy jingle to go with my deals, so, here goes nothing: ; Darvo, Darvo, Darvo Darvo, Darvo, Darvo; Buy one get one free-e Buy one get one free-e; For a limited time- YEAH; So??? What do you think… ; You don't like it do you? ; Well whatever... buy one get one free deal, on now.  Take it or leave it, I don't care.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal09.value: Friends, when I first started out in the 'unsecured goods' business, I even imagined owning my own store.; But look at me now! No doubt, I owe it all to you. So I want to give back.; For a limited time, I have enabled a booster for each and every one of you.; Thank you, Tenno. Now if you'll excuse me I think I have something in my eye.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal10.value: Tenno, you ever drink Ganymede Geyser Water? One of my suppliers brought a case to the store yesterday. ;"Have a sip," he says, "we'll look over my items," he says. ; Next thing I remember, I wake up with a headache surrounded by crates and crates of something called the NYX NEMESIS SKIN? ; Well, I hope this item is of interest to you Tenno, because I've bought a lot of it.; You check the market for a Darvo Deal. I'm going back to bed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericgreet0.value: Try not to mess things up next time.
Maybe you're just not cut-out for this type of work, tin-suit.
I don't take orders from anybody.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericmissio.value: Alright, let's get to work!
Alright, let's get to work!
Alright, let's get to work!
Alright, let's get to work!
We know the mission, we will not fail.
We know the mission, we will not fail.
We know the mission, we will not fail.
We know the mission, we will not fail.
The Lotus is counting on us.
The Lotus is counting on us.
The Lotus is counting on us.
The Lotus is counting on us.
I hope we're ready for this.
I hope we're ready for this.
I hope we're ready for this.
I hope we're ready for this.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenextobjrein.value: Picking sides is never easy. You are doing what you feel is right.
Supporting the enemy feels wrong, but keeping the balance requires tough choices.
This aggression has upset the balance of power. We must set things right.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgoalreinforce.value: We cannot allow the scouts to escape.
Keep moving, the sooner we find the scouts, the sooner we can decode the location of those settlements.
We must not let the targets slip through our fingers. Find the scouts.
Oh Alad, all your lying and sneaking and cheating, and what do you have to show for it? You're in dept to the board and I've come to collect.
Look at you Alad, hiding in a corner, playing with your toys. How embarrassing. The Corpus deserves better and I'm the one to deliver the goods.
