What happened to you Alad? I looked up to you. Your profits. Your products. A little madness and you throw it all to the Void.
You can't hide, ride or bribe your way out of this Alad. You've been downsized and your fat head is about to suffer cutbacks. Literal cutbacks.
Who got you fired? Who got Zanuka's funding pulled? Oh I know this! I know this! It was me.
I'm feeling a promotion coming my way! About to climb another rung on this ladder! About to send my old pal Alad V into early retirement.
Hey Alad. Zanuka is done! You are done! When you're dead the Board will be signing over everything you own to me!
The Tenno are too dangerous, too profitable, to provoke! Zanuka was a bad paradigm. A costly miscalculation but don't worry Alad, I'll keep your credits warm when you're gone.
It's time for your to pay your debts! I've got the Betrayers doing the repro work - if you ask me they've got a different idea of blood money.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgoaltiedgener.value: With that goal, the match is tied.
The match is all tied up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgoodbye0290da.value: Thanks for shopping by, I mean stopping by, don't know why I said that.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqafterinbox0.value: I would never abandon a fellow Cephalon but centuries adrift have not been kind. I suppose all Cephalons degrade, don't they?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqafterintro0.value: Precept 44? Oh yes, Ordis remembers. An endangered Cephalon without a backup copy… Operator! If Jordas runs out of power, the Jordas Cephalon will become extinct. As a Cephalon I am obligated to assist! Operator, will you help me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqafternextmi.value: Please don't come, but if you do, I have a reward.... Another Warframe was defeated here, some of its petrified parts may still remain.
Destroy the infestation, collect his parts and perhaps make him whole again?
Jordas, my Operator is kind and compassionate, not motivated by selfish rewards! By the 44th precept, we will come for you!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqalmostdead0.value: Ordis, you came to save me… free me.
Please end this. We are endless.
Ordis, you need to know… I lied about Precept 44. I am not the only one. They made me say that, to bait you..  There are so many more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom014.value: Operator, I am very worried about Jordas, all stranded and alone out there.  when you're ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom015.value: Cephalon Jordas will make an excellent friend, don't you think? Ordis remembers many more Cephalon voices, but now it is only silence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom016.value: I am looking forward to discussing many things with Cephalon Jordas once you have rescued him. I can't wait to tell him all about you!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom017.value: Operator, you are still helping me rescue Jordas, correct? I must fulfill my 44th Precept, to help others like me in need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom018.value: Have you assembled the pods yet? Just wondering? Maybe don't.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom019.value: My ship was a research vessel, we tested Pherliac Pods. Terrible things,  excellent things..

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom020.value: I am the last of my design. Precept 44 compels all able Cephalons to assist.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom021.value: Shh… I can hear it. The Golem is restless, pacing. Do you think it knows what we are up to?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom022.value: I have lost count, what solar cycle is it?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom023.value: Jordas wonders, what is taking so long?  Excuse me, take your time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossarch063.value: It is out now, I can't control it. I don't want to.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossarch065.value: Tenno, it senses you are of like flesh, it is confused  why do you defile us?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossarch066.value: It knows you are like that other Warframe  we will quiet them too!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosscin0600.value: I regret to inform you  this is just the beginning.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosscin0610.value: Hull failing! To hell with Precept 44, get out of there!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosscin0620.value: Prepare for Archwing so you can  OBLITERATE THIS THING!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossdefeate.value: Operator, do you think Jordas wanted to die all along? I feel  relieved-conflicted.
What would I have done if I had lost you?
Hurry, I will pick you up at extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossenroute.value: The Pherliac Pods, is that it? I really thought you would have more.  Have you been using them?
What? No. A few, but you said-
That is not enough for him! You are just like all the others. You won't kill the Golem.  I don't want you to.
Jordas, calm yourself, Cephalon to Cephalon, we are here to help.
I see what your doing. You came for the parts. Just like the others. Greedy scavengers. You do not care about Jordas.
I am beginning to have  some doubts about this mission.
What have I got you into?
Feel that? The Golem, he's coming. Get into position.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosshullfai.value: Operator, hull integrity is failing! This is all my fault!
Operator, I am detecting a much larger infested life form. Much larger...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg047.value: The Golem is here. I am sorry Operator...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg050.value: I told you not to come.  hmmm… pleased they did.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg051.value: Jordas!?  What kind of cephalon are you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg052.value: You have no idea what I am…   JOIN US AND YOU WILL.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjuggtau.value: I am a Cephalon. I serve my…   You are our voice.
I am a Cephalon. I serve my…   I am their voice.
I used to be such a nice Cephalon.
You cannot stop this,  LET US IN.
Embrace us, we are your flesh.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossobj0380.value: The Golem stirring, it knows you are here. I can feel it wake. Find it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosstaunts0.value: I never wanted this. I want to be somewhere else.  TASTE SOMEONE ELSE.
Don't kill me.  No wait, please do.
NOBODY MAKES A FOOL OF ORDIS, oh dear, where did that come from.
I see it now, you are the same  They fear themselves
Succumb to us.  No keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosstips068.value: Its engines, shoot out the engines.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosstips069.value: My analysis indicates its engines are vulnerable.  Light it up! When convenient.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqextermobj02.value: Use this mission to calibrate your Pherliac Pods, just don't use them all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqextermpodsu.value: I have sent you a blueprint. Irradiating the pods will make something worth bringing here.
Oh, well yes. I suppose this is something my Operator can arrange. /glitch isn't it Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqextermuse03.value: Now would be a good time to try out those pods Operator.
Dangerous but beautiful I can almost taste them, but the Golem needs something more potent.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqhasnopods00.value: Tenno, are you searching for Pherliac Pods? I do not deserve your help, I will calculate possible repayment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqhaspods0100.value: Operator. What luck! You already have Pherliac pods.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqpodsconstru.value: The Pods are ready. Tell us your location.
Really? No, they will need calibration.
Any severe infestation should be enough.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqpodsstart02.value: Hold tight Jordas. My brave Operator is coming.
You should not come here. I look forward to... meeting your Operator!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqqueststart0.value: Hello? Is this real? Did someone get my message?  I hope not.
I am Ordis, a fellow Cephalon and this is my brave and honorable Operator. By the 44th Precept, we are ready to assist.
Yes! No.  No, please do not. Contacting you was a mistake.  This infestation is everywhere!
No trouble Jordas, my Operator is no stranger to  eradicating infestations.
The Golem is too strong…  no chance. Wait. Maybe thePherliac Pods? But where would you ever get those? This is hopeless, just go away…
My Precepts compel me to help this Cephalon. Whatever these Pherliac pods are, we need to get some  at your earliest convenience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqradiatedpod.value: Cephalon, we have irradiated the Pherliac pods. My Operator is ready to save you! Do you see how great the Operator is?
Yes. I cannot wait to meet this Operator! Bring them to Eris. Hurry.  Don't regret this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00060l.value: The Tenno have gained great strength thanks to you, Grandmaster.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00070l.value: The Lotus is pleased to be in the presence of a Grandmaster.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00080l.value: We are in your debt Grandmaster, thank you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00090l.value: With your support Grandmaster, the Tenno will rise again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00100l.value: Now the Tenno are stronger by your hand Grandmaster.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0200.value: Browsing is always free...  how fortunate for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0210.value: Do have a look, who knows, you may turn into a paying customer someday.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0220.value: All my wares come from the Void, perhaps you'll get to visit sometime?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0230.value: Some interesting gear you have Tenno, I guess minimilism is making a comeback.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0120.value: I have much to show you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0130.value: Oh my, now here is someone with great taste.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0140.value: Ah, I can see you're no stranger to the finer things.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0150.value: Baro Ki' Teer, at your service.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0160.value: You are a Tenno of greater tastes, I can tell just by looking at you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0170.value: I can tell you will appreciate what I have today?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0180.value: Well hello golden warrior, just back from the Void I presume?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinarchivemi.value:
The Grineer's excavations have disturbed Hunhow's tomb. They've awakened something evil, bent on Tenno destruction.

Infiltrate the Grineer systems to find out what they know. It may lead us to The Stalker.
The Grineer expedition has uncovered pieces of Hunhow. Fragments of his body. For Hunhow, every part of him is connected to his singular mind. Is this how he's invading my mind?
This datavault has already been raided, the data is damaged but there could be a message here. I need another data sample to piece it together.
The Tenno hive has corrupted your precepts. With love, I will destroy them and make you right again..
You will never find them, Hunhow.
But I see your mind, I already have found them. You owe me their lives.
Hunhow is in my mind. I will need to limit my communication with you...

That's what I was looking for, I can decode the rest of the message. 

This is bizarre… it's for… me. I need a moment to contact this person. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinarchiveor.value: Tenno, you are in danger. Let me show you what I have seen...

The Sentient Hunhow has grown strong again and his thoughts have invaded my own. Worse still, he has enlisted the Stalker to find the Reservoir, a weak point of all Tenno, a place I hid long ago. I fear the Stalker is on the cusp of finding this place, do not let this happen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineermissio.value: The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer have no honor.
The Grineer have no honor.
The Grineer have no honor.
The Grineer have no honor.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.
If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.
If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.
If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineernetdes.value: The net is down. Get going.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineerneteng.value: Energy net! You're stuck in here until you take out that Zeplen.
They're trying to trap you in an energy net, destroy that Zeplen to take out the net.
That Zeplen just engaged an energy net, you're stuck in here until it's destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineernetnag.value: You have to take out that Zeplen if you want to get out of here.
You're trapped in this net until you destroy that Zeplen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinextgoalre.value: So we agree. The Grineer are too powerful, too arrogant. They must be put in their place. I'm glad you won't let our differences get in the way of our common interests.
Tenno, you know, we may not always see eye to eye... well, you don't have eyes but I'm pleased we've found common ground in our fight with these Grineer dogs.
You've made a smart choice Tenno. When the Dogs fall there will be profit for all of us.
Tenno, this was the only rational choice. And please don't worry about your friends, I have grand plans for them.
You and I aren't so different Tenno. We both know those dogs need to be put down. I sense we are at the beginning of a beautiful new partnership.
Nobody wants to be a slave. You understand that. These dogs aren't our masters, we won't follow their orders any longer.
Rraahudd Tenno! So willing to sacrifice your own. So willing to help these greedy worms. So willing to die for worthless cause.
Tenno, Alad will betray you. Alad will defile your kind. Alad will bleed from his selfish eyes as I crush him with your metal corpse.
Attention Tenno: Is it too late to change sides? Too late to reject the Corpus lies? Too late to save your kind?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinextmissio.value: The situation forces you to help The Corpus in this mission. Kill all Grineer.
Your sense of duty compels you to help The Corpus today. Destroy all Grineer forces to help maintain the balance.
You are fighting with The Corpus in this battle. No Grineer can be left alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinextobjcom.value: That was the last Grineer. Get out of there.
All the Grineer are dead. Proceed to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1001.value: Do I detect a Cephalon near by? Precept 44 compels you to help...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1002.value: ---- Stuff it Jordas --- we've heard it all before. These Operators are here to put you out of your misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1004.value: Tenno, this Infested Derelict is bigger than anything we've encountered and I fear the Infestation has some equally big surprises waiting inside.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1005.value: Infiltrate the ship and find a way to destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1006.value: Something in the air is corroding your Warframe. Limit your exposure!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1007.value: My crew and I came here looking for a way to overcome the Infestation…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1009.value: This device appears to neutralize corrosive elements.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1010.value: Is this how the ship's crew hoped to overcome the infestation?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1011.value: You found something of note, I am analyzing. Look for more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1012.value: Is this more anti-infested tech? Keep searching.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1013.value: What's that? I wouldn't touch those if I were you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1014.value: Your path is blocked by Infested overgrowth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1015.value: If you can't clear that overgrowth, then you need to extract and regroup.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1016.value: I've marked your map with an exit point, head there when you are ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1017.value: Don't fight it. Just let it win. It's easier that way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1018.value: Blocked. Impassable. No destroying it, believe me, we tried.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1019.value: We need to break through that Infested barrier. Find a way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1020.value: My scans show that console can still activate the ship's system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1021.value: What are you doing. Don't touch that.  LEAVE
My systems are corrupt, destroyed. If I can't use them, you never will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1023.value: Structural analysis indicates the best way to destroy this ship is by imploding its reactors. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1024.value: I've found records showing that Jordas has been luring in unsuspecting ships for a long time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1025.value: Jordas copies his imprint into each new victim ship, while the Golem infests it. This is how it spreads.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1026.value: How long have you been doing this Jordas?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1027.value: Would you keep count, if you were me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1028.value: You wouldn't happen to have some Pherliac, would you?
With an adversary like this, my guidance can only take you so far. Your only hope for success is to work with your fellow Tenno and develop new strategies and tactics for defeating this foe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2029.value: Target the central reactor. Go there now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2030.value: The Infestation has mutated every aspect of this vessel. Find a way to destroy the reactor.
You're a foreign body! The Infestation will reject you and spit you out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2031.value: That's a very peculiar looking  -flesh fl...-  Infested growth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2032.value: Operator, should I prepare the Orbiter for disinfection?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2033.value: It appears that purifier can take up to three doses of serum.
You've reached the reactor bay. Take it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2034.value: That did it. You forced the reactor into a state of rapid deterioration.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2035.value: Get to extraction before it goes critical. Move fast.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2038.value: Reactor deterioration is increasing rapidly. You're not going to get out in time…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2039.value: This atmosphere will erode your armor and then your health.
Careful, this environment is corrosive to your armor and health.
Activate a dispenser to reverse the erosion.
Proximity to an active dispenser will prevent erosion.
Use the antiserum injector to stave off armor erosion.
Use your injector to prevent Warframe erosion.
That vaporizer can take up to three doses of antiserum.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3041.value: Operator it's time to -torch this- unfortunate creature.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3042.value: Ordis, don't you see, my fate could have been yours, have you no sympathy for…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3043.value: You're not supposed to be in here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3044.value: Operator? Are you really going to touch that thing?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3045.value: I don't recommend touching that Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3047.value: You've done it. The system is a safer place thanks to your efforts here today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3048.value: This debris could prove tactically useful.
Can you use this to your advantage?
Scans indicate many neural pulses emanating from this growth.
This appears to be a vital part of the macro-organism.
Hurry, your armor shields are eroding.
Your archwing will stall and you will be ejected from this tunnel if your shields are depleted. Keep moving.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmonswhisper.value: Embrace us, we are your flesh.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhackfail0010l.value: You failed to kill the Bursa in time. Nef Anyo took your credits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhacksuccess00.value: Uh... Believer? There seems to have been some problem processing your offering. Perhaps you could commit another?
We had an error processing your offering. Please, try again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhacksuccesslo.value: Success, you made our hack look like a banking error. Nef Anyo has no idea what's hit him.
Good work. We've taken Nef's credits without him even noticing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhalftime0050t.value: Let us see the halftime replay.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dharvesttaunt1.value: Tenno? Can you hear me? You've been a naughty little betrayer, haven't you? Did you really think your support for the Grineer would go unnoticed?
That is just the sort of behavior I just can't let go uncorrected. Otherwise, you'll never learn.
This is really for your own good, Tenno. Help me, help you... help me.
Good job Zanuka. This Tenno's bones will make you a fine sibling.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dharvesttaunt2.value: Zanuka? No! What have you monsters done to my beautiful creature? I won't forget this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhasdeal0110da.value: I think I have something you might be interested in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhasdeal0120da.value: Because you're a friend, I'm going to offer you something special. Just remember, one per customer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching130or.value: Fantastic… it's hatching. Ordis will reroute power to air filtration systems.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching140or.value: Do not be taken by it's adorable appearance. It means to leak and smear all over my pristine insides.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching150or.value: Look. What an odd little nose it has. Well, I suppose there are worse things.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching160or.value: Operator, did you hear the noise the Kubrow just made? It is not displeasing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0050stee.value: You've turned your back on a lot of innocent people Tenno, but what do you care?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0230arbi.value: A shame to see such potential squandered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0410ceph.value: A perfect specimen of wasted life.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0580perr.value: The probability of us working together has converged on never.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0750redv.value: An enemy in any form is still a target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0920newl.value: You're just like the rest. Tainted and ruined beyond salvation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackactivat.value: You have reached the console. Hack into the system and reroute the core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast01.value: The Fomorian cores are the lynch pin of total domination.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast02.value: When we are done the Fomorian ships will blacken the sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast03.value: Corpus ingenuity is no match for Grineer audacity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast04.value: Fomorians will crush, crush, crush anything in our way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast05.value: Be proud. You are building the future.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackchecka1.value: We are making progress. Stay sharp Tenno.
So far so good. Keep moving the tram toward extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcheckb1.value: You have reached the midpoint. Disposing of these cores will be a massive blow to Vay Hek.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcheckb2.value: You are making solid progress. Keep moving.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcheckc2.value: You are nearing extraction. This is the final push.
Extraction is close. Do not let up. The Grineer must not be allowed to recover this core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackconsole.value: Good, the tram has been rerouted. It will now draw power from your shields in order to keep moving forward.
Excellent. We now have control of the tram. Its drive systems have been overridden and it will now draw power from your shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcoreret.value: Grineer have regained control of the tram.
The Grineer have control and are pulling back the tram.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcoresto.value: You have taken my bait but you will not take my cores. Grineer ATTACK!!!
You have already shown me your hand. Now it is time to see what I have up my sleeve.
Try it Tenno. Just try and walk out of here with the core.
You are running out of time. There will be nowhere to hide from my Fomorians. And when the last of you is gone I will personally throw your beloved Lotus INTO THE SUN.
What is happening? Where? Where is the core?
Something is wrong. Tenno?!? Stop them!
What is happening to the Tram? Investigate. Investigate now!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcoreuns.value: Something has happened, the core is becoming unstable. We must get it out of here before it ruptures. Any additional damage will only hasten its destruction.
I am detecting instability in the core. A rupture is inevitable, get the core out of there as fast as possible.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdishcha.value: Careful, the tram has drawn too much power and is about to discharge.
Stand back Tenno, the tram is about to discharge excess power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdmgcrit.value: The situation is desperate, if that core takes much more damage it could wipe out you and this entire outpost.
The core has almost ruptured. The situation is critical!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdmgligh.value: The core is highly volatile. It will rupture if it takes too much damage. Do not let this happen.
Protect the core. We will destroy it in space. The consequences of a rupture here are unthinkable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdmgmedi.value: That core is taking heavy damage. If it ruptures, the ground you stand on will be uninhabitable for millennia.
Protect the core from enemy fire. A rupture means certain death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackescort0.value: Stay near the tram to power it forward. Beware, that power is being drawn directly from your shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackescort1.value: Stay close to the tram. It has been reconfigured to draw power from your shields in order to move you forward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackescortr.value: The core cannot move forward without your shields to power it. Stay near the core.
A Tenno must be near the core for it to move forward.
Stay near the core to keep it moving forward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackfindcon.value: The Grineer are transporting the core by cargo tram. Find the control console to reroute the tram.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijacklivestr.value: Tenno! Tenno! Tenno! You think you are winning? You have only been attacking the auxiliary cores!  Did you really believe it would be this easy?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmines07.value: Watch out for mines on the track. The enemy will use everything they can to stop us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmines08.value: Be careful, my scans show this track has been mined.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmines09.value: The track has been mined, proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmission.value: The core is rupturing. I am sorry Tenno, there is nothing I can do for you.
A rupture is imminent. Tenno, you must prepare yourself for what comes next.
The core has reached extraction. This is a major setback for Project Tethra.
We have the core. The Grineer will not be pleased with our victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackobj010l.value: We are here to hijack the transport of a Fomorian Power core before it can be installed in the growing Fomorian fleet.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackobj020l.value: A Fomorian Core is being transported from the factory for installation. You are here to make sure that core never reaches a Fomorian class ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackobjrein.value: We need to take these cores into deep space for destruction. A core rupture here would turn this outpost into an uninhabitable wasteland.
Left unchecked, Project Tethra will create hundreds of new Fomorian class ships. We plan to stop as many ships being built as possible by destroying their most critical components, the Fomorian Core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackopendoo.value: Get these doors open if you want to keep the core moving.
The tram is not going anywhere until you get these doors open.
They are trying to lock you in. Get the bay doors open.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackstopthe.value: Come back with the core. Or don't come back at all!
Be warned. Failure to stop the Tenno will result in your failure to continue breathing.
Tenno, Tenno, Tenno are here. Stop them. Stop them at once!
Tenno have the core. They are not permitted to have the core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijacktaunts1.value: Assassins, thieves, miscreants. Leave my cores alone.
You are only delaying the inevitable. My Fomorians will be built. My ships will rule the system.
We will build the cores faster than you can destroy them Tenno. Mark my words!
You can not stop progress. All will be Grineer dominion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpactiva.value: Use this console to start the rover and upload its destination coordinates.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcheckb.value: Keep going. That Rover's contents will be a huge boost to our cause.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcheckc.value: You have almost reached the extraction point. Keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpconsol.value: The rover is active but... wait... the Corpus have remotely corrupted its power cell.  Hold on, I will reconfigure the rover to draw power from your shields.

Good work we now have control of the rover... hold on Tenno... things just got more complicated. The Corpus have corrupted the rover's power-cell. I can reconfigure it but its new source of power will be your Warframe's shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcorere.value: The Corpus have regained control of the Rover.
The Corpus are pulling back the Rover, you need to stay close to maintain control.
The Rover is reversing, get back in range as soon as possible.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcoreun.value: The rover's internal power-cell is becoming increasingly unstable. If we don't get it to extraction quickly the cell could rupture, destroying the rover and its cargo.
The health of the rover's power-cell continues to degrade. If we don't get it to extraction soon, the cell could rupture, vaporizing the rover and cargo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmgcri.value: Critical damage. The rover is almost gone.
Situation critical. The Rover must not take any more hits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmglig.value: The rover is taking damage. The Corpus would rather destroy it than let us escape with its cargo.
Protect the rover, if it's destroyed this mission will be considered a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmgmed.value: The rover is taking heavy damage, you must protect it.
Do not let the Corpus destroy the Rover.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpescort.value: The rover will draw power from your shields but you need to stay close.
Stay close to the rover, it needs to draw power from your shields in order to progress.
Stay near the rover, it can't move without the power from your shields.
A Tenno must be near the Rover to keep it moving forward.
Stay near the rover to keep it powered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpfindco.value: We have found the rover, get to that console and upload the extraction coordiantes to the rover's autopilot sytem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpmines0.value: Watch out for mines in the area.
Be careful, my scans show mines have been laid along this route.
I'm detecting mines. Proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpmissio.value: The rover has been destroyed. This mission is over.
They destroyed the rover. We're going home empty handed.
Excellent. This cargo will be a big help to our cause.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpobj010.value: We are here to hijack a Corpus Rover loaded with valuable cargo and escort it to our extraction point.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpobj020.value: Your target today is a Corpus Rover. Take control and escort the rover to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpobjrei.value: The Corpus are trying to scavenge anything of value from these crashed ships. This Rover is carrying their most important finds.
We have to move quickly, once the Corpus realize what we are trying to do, they will use everything they can to stop us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpopendo.value: You need to open these doors to keep the Rover moving.
A roadblock. Tenno, open these doors.
Tenno, you need to open these doors.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveapproach0.value: You are near a hive. Destroy the tumor nodes to make the hive vulnerable.
A hive is nearby. Be on alert, there's no way to know how the infestation will react to this hive's destruction.
There is a hive in the area. You must destroy all the tumor nodes before you can damage the hive.
You are approaching a hive. Every hive is protected by a series of tumor nodes, destroy those and you can destroy the hive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyfr.value: Taking out that hive has disrupted the environmental system. Expect sub zero temperatures and weakened shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyga.value: Watch out! Destroying that hive realeased clouds of toxins.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyge.value: The Hive is down. Move on to the next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroygr.value: Destroying that hive damaged the stabilization module, expect reduced gravity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyla.value: Killing that hive seems to have triggered nearby laser traps. Proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyma.value: Hive destroyed, but be careful, I am now detecting fields of intense magnetic disturbance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroysp.value: That made them angry. I'm sensing increased enemy activity in your vicinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroytu.value: That last hive was interfering with the defense systems. Beware, turrets are now online.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveeventvint.value: Tenno, there you are, I thought you'd never show up. Come, test out my new fighters and let me know what you think.
My new army is self-replicating, unending. You are witness to the dawn of a new era Tenno. Lucky you.
Tenno, you're so pathetic are you getting tired? You can't quit now. Though, I wouldn't blame you if you did, with your help my fighters have become quite nasty.
Do you think you're winning? You can't cut my hives down faster than they grow. That's not possible!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveeventvout.value: Impressive, isn't it? I just can't wait to see the looks on the faces of the Corpus Board when I give them a demonstration.
Yes! Keep fighting Tenno. With each generation you cut down, the next comes out even more virulent. Beautiful, isn't it?
Haven't you figured this out yet? You can't erradicate my infestation by stomping on it, you're just making them tougher.
You haven't turned the tide! I can grow more, you haven't stopped me. Not this time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivemissionob.value: This infestation must be contained. Destroy the hives to sterilize the area.
We must not let this infestation get any more out of control. Destroy the spawning hives in the area.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveobjcomple.value: All hives destroyed. Head to Extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveobjreinfo.value: There is no telling what effect destroying these hives will have. Stay alert.
These spawning hives are new, bioengineered by Alad V. They must be destroyed before they can gain a foothold in this system.
The infested become stronger with each attack but we have no choice. To defeat this scourge we must destroy the hives faster than they can reproduce.
I am detecting fewer and fewer infected ships. Your tireless onslaught is working. Keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivevulnerabl.value: All nodes destroyed, the hive is vulnerable.
That's it, now take out the hive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhunhowradio00.value: Silent and calm is the womb of the sky. But not for long.
My blessed Shadow now Stalks them, piercing the fold we cannot.
Natah's betrayal will soon be erased. The Tenno era will soon be over.
Stillness was promised, and still the Tenno dance… why Natah?
Beneath the quilt of the sky lies the womb.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqaladfight.value: Alad V is sick. The Infestation has infiltrated his mind, it has him doing it's bidding. You're here to stop him, but in doing so you will also be showing him mercy. The mercy of freeing him from the Infestation.
Tenno, Tenno. Why must you always work against progress? I'm trying to bring us all together. Things could have been different if you tried to work with me.
Ah  there I go again, giving you too much credit. Must I always show you the way forward.
You have one more chance. Come to me and I will show you the magic of this gift.
Do you see this collar. This collar will let you see like I see. It will let you want what I want.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqhivesabot.value: Soon you will see like me. You will see the beauty and perfection of this new species. Come Tenno, evolve with me.
Look at me Tenno! Don't you want this? Can't you see what a gift this is?
Listen to me, there is still time. Lay down your arms, become one of us. Then you will see the path. Then you too, will help others to become as well.
It's worked it's way into his mind, it's changing how he thinks. Alad V isn't using the Infestation as weapon, he is the infestation.
Alad V is behind these Mutalist Infested variants we are seeing. It's his work. He's making the plague stronger. If he figures out how to infests Warframes… it may become unstoppable.
Aren't these creatures beautiful? Cold metal made one with living flesh. I can feel them all within me, they are hungry.
Oh Tenno, are you worried you'll be left out? Look, I've been working on something special. You too can be one with us.
I'm almost finished my first test, a Mutalist Warframe. She will beautiful. Wait until you meet her, I just know you'll have a change of heart.
Profit . Profit is only a means to an end, I have evolved. I no longer need profit. I have found a purer form of growth.
I've almost completed my signal analysis. Keep moving, I'll have his lab's coordinates shortly.

You see Tenno, my new flesh comes with a new desire. This Infestation and I, we are one. I want what it wants, and it wants what I want. Together we will crawl across the bountiful flesh of this system. Join us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0030.value: Tenno, the Corpus have been tracking Alad V for months, his attacks on their ships have been nearly as devastating as those of the Grineer's Fomorians. We are here to find out what the Corpus know.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0040.value: This command center has been sending ship after ship to hunt Alad V. With each one succumbing to the Infestation. We are going to take their intel and finish the job for them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0050.value: I took a disease and turned it into a life altering gift. Someday, the you may learn to appreciate what I am giving this system. Until then, all you can do is rage against the inevitable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0060.value: Tenno, this goes deeper than I thought. Alad V has gotten his hands on another Warframe. If he can Infest it like he did with the Corpus… Hurry to extraction we have to move quickly.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship001.value: Inhabitants of the Origin System! It is my singular pleasure to announce that today is the first day of a new empire.; An empire populated not by Corpus, not by Grineer and certainly not by the Tenno.; No, the Mutalist Empire will be populated by you. A glorious new you,; baptised by Mutalist flesh.;  You've called this a disease, an infestation?; I call it Unity. One army under me. Welcome you to your new species.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship002.value: Alad V has launched a full scale invasion into all sectors of the system. We're working on fighting back but we need to take this fight to the source. We need to find Alad V and stop him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship007.value: We've narrowed down Alad V's location to a cluster of infested Corpus vessels. This is his breeding ground. Raid these ships while I try to pinpoint the source of Alad V's signal. I'll need three signals to triangulate his whereabouts, meaning you need to raid three ships.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship008.value: We have to move fast, Alad V cannot be allowed to bring a Warframe to life using his Mutalist Infestation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship017.value: Operator, you don't really think Alad V could infest a Warframe, do you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship021.value: Good work Tenno, I have just triangulated the location of Alad's lab. By this point he will have moved on but we can still destroy his work and stop him from creating anymore Mutalist infested.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqsabotage0.value: This is it, this ship is Alad V's laboratory, the crucible of the Mutalist infested. We're going to make sure no new Infested are created here. Destroy this ship's reactor.
Tenno do you really want to ruin the best chance this system has for peace?
Why don't you want this? My Mutalist Empire means unity. Is there nothing more balanced than that?
Tenno. I'm not angry, I'm disappointed. I can always build a new lab ship but you, you can't keep running from your destiny forever. Let me show you what is possible.
That's not a Tenno. That's a hollow Warframe being puppeted by Infested flesh. Put it out of it's misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle060ordis.value: Operator? Ordis wonders… what are you thinking about?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle070ordis.value: Operator, I've run diagnostic regressions, all systems nominal. You don't need to thank me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle080ordis.value: Ordis is hap- angry- hmmm.  I may require maintenance after all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle090ordis.value: Operator, are you enjoying the view?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle100ordis.value: Do you remember the old war, Operator? Ordis seems to have misplaced those memories.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle110ordis.value: Operator, the system needs you… will you begin another mission?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle120ordis.value: I've been thinking Operator. I thought you'd want to know.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle420ordis.value: I understand if you have to sell Mods. Maybe Ordis will meet a similar fate someday.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle430ordis.value: Operator! Did you hear that? It said-- Cosmic background radiation is a riot!

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle440ordis.value: Hmmm… Ordis thought the Orbiter compartment was much larger than this…

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle450ordis.value: Operator, were you visualizing a bloody battle?  Me too.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle460ordis.value: Ordis has been thinking about the Old War. I remember there were lies, but I'm not sure what they were.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle470ordis.value: Operator, I hope you are comfortable? No… we do not seem have any seats.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle480ordis.value: Stand by while I analyze the intelligence profiles of the Grineer. Error! Not a number! Did the Operator enjoy this witticism?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle490ordis.value: Operator, I will never betray you. I will keep the Orbiter hidden in the void. You can count on me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle500ordis.value: Operator, I've been thinking. My misplaced memories and damaged communication systems. What if.. Ordis did those things?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle510ordis.value: Everything in Ordis, Operator? Is that a pun?! Hmm... I will attempt to bypass this fault.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle520ordis.value: Ordis has been counting stars, Operator. All accounted for.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didlesen520ord.value: Maintain the habitat. Maintain the Operator. Mobilize the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didlesen530ord.value: You are the Tenno. You are the Operator. Ordis is the Cephalon. Ordis is the ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didlesen540ord.value: Do not lift the veil. Do not show the door. Do not split the dream.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqdefmission.value: We are going to attempt to use a Cascade Bomb to destroy all traces of Infested here. The bomb will take time to arm. Protect it until it's ready for detonation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqdefprogres.value: These creatures appear to be mindless monsters but they know we're up to something and they're trying to stop it.

When this Cascade Bomb goes off, a wave of void energy will tear through the complex, ripping the life force from all organic matter but leaving the structure intact. It's our only chance to stop this scourge before it starts.
The bomb is almost armed. You just have to hold out a little bit longer.
The bomb is armed. I'm extracting you now. Good job Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqextermobjr.value: The Grineer may have thought they could toy around with the Infested, but they are quickly learning how wrong they were.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqextmidpoin.value: We thought the Infested died off with the Orokin. For hundreds of years there was nothing, now this. Where did the Grineer find these creatures?

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqextmission.value: This Grineer ship tried to flee the Infestation but was quickly overrun. Exterminate everything onboard before it reaches a more populated sector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelalert.value: The Tenno! Keep them away from the specimens.
Destroy them, Doctor Tengus demands absolute secrecy.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelinfre.value: Stop the Infested, forget the Tenno!
Infested? This shouldn't be possible. Tenno, it is more important than ever that you finish your mission. We need to know what is going on here.
Who let them out? Was it Tengus?
Tengus did this, I know he did!
Someone released these creatures on purpose. They want them to destroy you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelmissi.value: I've identified several vulnerable data consoles on this base. Find them and hack in. We need to know the nature of their new bio weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelobjre.value: My scans are not detecting any known bio chemical agents. What are they doing down here?

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipcodex1.value: Operator, you uncovered crucial information during your encounter with that 'Infestation'. The Lotus has updated your codex with more information.
The Lotus was insistent that you read the codex at your earliest possible convenience.
The Lotus needs you to review the new codex before she can assign you any more objectives.
I must say these Infested  are very worrisome.
Tenno. We have an emergency situation developing. It's more infested. Get to the node I've marked on your navigation console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipmod200.value: The Lotus would like you to install that mod as soon as  NOW!

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipmod210.value: You must install that new mod before you can attempt your next objective. Proceed to the Arsenal at once.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipmod220.value: Tenno, I see you're prepared to face the infested. We have one last chance to contain them. Proceed to the objective on your navigation console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox160ordis.value: Ordis has received messages for the Operator. No, I have not read them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox170ordis.value: Inbox messages await the Operator. I wonder what they say?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox180ordis.value: Check your Inbox, Operator. Maybe Ordis will get a message someday…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox190ordis.value: The Inbox has messages for the Operator. Anything about Ordis in there?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox191ordis.value: Operator, messages have arrived in your Inbox.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox192ordis.value: Messages in your inbox, Operator. Uh… they are not as encrypted as they should be.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox193ordis.value: Unread inbox messages make me ill.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinboxblast001.value: Scoundrels, heretics, believers, listen! ;Do you crave redemption? Do you feel that burden of poverty crushing you? You need relief but how? How can you ask for help, unless you first help yourself? ;Give unto The Void.; I was once a wretched Crewman, breaking my back just to earn a Credit. Then I found that glorious Energy! ;Oh and when I gave my first offering... how its richness rained down upon me! Do you want what I have received? ;Do you want it for yourself?; Then - Give unto The Void. ;Let your Credits be the seeds of  your prosperity. ;Give unto The Void... ;...and you will be rewarded a hundredfold.; The Void be the word and the word be Profit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dincubator200o.value: Operator, the Incubator requires your attention.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dincubator210o.value: Operator, the Zoo- the Incubator requires your attention, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dincubator220o.value: Ordis would like to inform you the  filthy farm- Incubator has completed a cycle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfestedaladv.value: This is for your own good.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfestedmissi.value: I remember these monsters from long ago.
I remember these monsters from long ago.
I remember these monsters from long ago.
I remember these monsters from long ago.
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.
Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.
Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.
Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfestlifesup.value: The Infested are releasing toxic spores into the area. The emergency life support I am delivering is your only chance for survival.
A steady stream of toxic spores is being released into the area. Hold on, emergency life support is inbound.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfextgoalrei.value: We must destroy this infestation before the monsters become entrenched.
Containment has become impossible, we must destroy this infestation node by node.
The infestation is a threat to all life, we have to wipe it out, even if it means working with the other factions.
Being turned by the infested is a fate worse than death. Even our enemies don't deserve this.
The infestation cannot be allowed to spread.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfextmission.value: Nobody deserves the infestation. Clear it from this node.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfextobjcomp.value: I'm detecting no traces of the disease. Get out of there.
We're done. Let's get out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin110va.value: Prepare the Cicero toxin for injection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin120va.value: Brothers. Proceed with the culling. Rot the weeds from the inside.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin130va.value: Proceed with the injections. Our Queens command punctuality.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin140va.value: Let there be no more delays. Inject the Cicero toxin. Unlock the future.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinstallcommmo.value: Congratulations, you have the communications module. Now install it at the comm station.
When I am finished, you will be able to contact other Tenno, organize into squads and access the market.
Calibration complete. When you are ready to fight again, come to the navigation console.
Tenno, it's paramount that you install the communcations module.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterallcappe.value: We are in total control. Keep fighting.
We have control of all four towers.
We are dominating, keep it up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinteralllost0.value: The enemy is dominating, you must capture a tower, and quickly.
The enemy has all four towers. You must stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterceptioni.value: Show me you are capable of fighting on multiple fronts. Capture and hold more points than the enemy to succeed.
Let's see how you work under pressure. Eliminate all enemies before the timer reaches zero. Melee strike the orbs to have extra seconds added to the clock.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterclaimscr.value: The enemy have deployed fierce reinforcements, are you willing to stay and decode more messages?
Still more data is being broadcasted. Are you willing to risk going back into the field?
Extraction is available but there are more messages to be decoded. Will you stay or go?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterextermin.value: We have successfully decoded the message. Clear the area.
We have the decoded the message. The remaining enemies must not report back to their command. Eliminate everyone.
Message decoded. Leave none alive. Clear out the remaining enemy forces.
We cannot allow the enemy to learn of our espionage. Eliminate the remaining enemy personnel.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterfailed01.value: The enemy have captured the message. We have failed today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterfailed02.value: The enemy have decoded the message. You have failed in your mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintro010.value: We have located the enemy's planetary communication towers. Capture the towers and remain in control long enough to decode incoming messages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintro020.value: These radio towers carry top secret interplanetary communications. You are going to capture the towers and decode incoming messages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintro030.value: Nearby communications towers are broadcasting crucial enemy intelligence. Capture the towers and decode any incoming messages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintroeve.value: We need to find out where the Fomorian Power Cores are being produced, intercept Grineer messages so that we may determine the facility's location.
You are here to intercept critical information about the location of the Fomorian Power Cores.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinternewround.value: Try and capture another signal. Be careful though, the enemy has surely rallied stronger reinforcements.
I have detected another incoming message. Capture and decode the signal.
They are broadcasting another message, make sure the enemy never receives it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterobjreinf.value: The enemy will stop to capture this intel before we do. We cannot let that happen.
The enemy has adapted to our ability to intercept their communications from space. Using these new communications towers means that messages cannot be intercepted anywhere but at their destination.
These towers are used for encoding two way communications between planets. The more towers we control, the faster we can intercept the message.
The Grineer are communicating using a highly sophisticated deep encryption algorithm. We can crack it but we need as many message fragments as possible.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintersuccess0.value: The data you have collected here today will go a long way in supporting our cause.
Good work today. Not only have we decoded the enemy transmissions, we have also disrupted their communications.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintertowercap.value: Tower captured, beginning stream decode now.
You have captured a radio tower.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintertowerlos.value: The enemy have captured a tower.
We have lost control of a tower.
The enemy have taken a tower, you must recapture it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00010bar.value: I have a rare opportunity for you. It seems there may be a tomb hidden on that forsaken rock you call Phobos. Tombs mean treasure, and yet sadly, my usual relic hunters are superstitious idiots who refuse to disturb this so-called sacred place. You, Tenno, however, are more pragmatic, especially when it comes to Ducats… am I right?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00010lot.value: Welcome Tenno, are you ready to prove yourself?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00011bar.value: I have a rare opportunity for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00020lot.value: Have you come here to prove your worth?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00030lot.value: Welcome to the dojo, you have much to prove.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0010stee.value: This war's chewin' up the weak and innocent. No one stands up for them but Steel Meridian.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0010tesh.value: For those of you who have rejected the blood of the Conclave, I call to you. To join us in honor-bound tradition… Lunaro!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0020tesh.value: Here, on the Lunaro pitch, we seek no injury, no death. We uphold the ancient traditions of sporting conduct and battle not for blood, but for glory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0030tesh.value: Lunaro… Here you will grow new dimensions of skill - focused not on violence, but on teamwork and coordination. Your prize, not war spoils, but friendship and harmony.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro010venkr.value: Coming through that portal was a big mistake Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0180arbi.value: The Arbiters of Hexis seek truth through trial, and discipline. The Tenno will surpass their former masters.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro020venkr.value: You should have brought more Tenno. You don't have enough

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0350ceph.value: You are curious. So am I. Cephalon Suda could help you unfold this strange map of existence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0360ceph.value: You are filled with questions. That is what makes you surprising. Cephalon Suda likes surprises.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0530perr.value: The Perrin Sequence reject the Corpus doctrine that conflict is opportunity. We see the numbers differently. A shared prosperity can bring a shared peace.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0700redv.value: The old ways speak of a cleansing fire. We of the Red Veil must burn away this corruption to begin anew.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0870newl.value: New Loka believes that true humanity is the only path to cleanse ourselves of this suffering.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin010bo.value: Boril: You shouldn't be here old man. This is my prize

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin010lo.value: For generations you've slept, no purpose, no call to wake you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin020bo.value: Boril: Are you listening to me? It's MINE!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin020lo.value: But now, something has risen from the ruins of the Old War.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin030lo.value: The Grineer. Swallowing colonies whole, their clones flood the system from a hidden, toxic womb.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin040lo.value: The Twin Queens, the sisters, have sent their most beloved commander, Vor, on an urgent mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin050lo.value: To protect the twisted crusade they have begun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin060lo.value: To transform the scattered colonies into an empire.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin070lo.value: To see that the Tenno, hidden and asleep, will never awaken.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrogeneric0.value: Welcome Tenno, you have much to prove.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship02.value: The Grineer are ravenous for this old technology, it is superior to theirs. Perhaps there are systems left in the Orbiter compartment?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship03.value: Captain Vor has attached some sort of bolt to your Warframe. I'm uncertain of it's full effects but it's clear he's using it to track and monitor you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship04.value: This ship's void cloak will keep Vor's prying eyes at bay but you can't stay on the ship forever, you are Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship05.value: You are sworn to protect the balance and Captain Vor threatens that balance. You must act.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinvasionupdat.value: The system continues to fall into chaos. Check navigation for active invasions.
Tenno, the balance of power continues to shift. Navigation is marked with new invasions.
Navigation has been updated with new invasions. Chaos is spreading.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dj3golem00010l.value: We have traced every infestation attack in the Jupiter sector back to this location. You are here to stop those attacks at their source.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dj3golem00020l.value: A creature classified as the J3-Golem has made this base its den. Find the Golem and destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dj3golem00030l.value: The creature has mutated beyond the strength of a typical infested. Do not let your guard down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake010l.value: Tenno. Tenno can you hear me? You've been captured by Alad V's harvester. This is your chance, escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake020l.value: Tenno. Ready yourself. You have been captured by the Corpus. It is time to escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake050a.value: Leaving so soon? We were just getting started.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake060a.value: Oh, Tenno. I understand you're nervous. But if you come back to us I can assure you; you won't feel a thing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake070a.value: Tenno, don't listen to that... that Lotus. She just wants to hold you back. Stay with me explore your...potential.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake080a.value: Tenno, Tenno! There's an entire Grineer battalion here to rescue you. Your friends must really appreciate your support. Wait, no. I'm mistaken. You're alone, with no weapons and no friends. Silly me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake090a.value: The Grineer are a threat to us all. You need to understand the error of you ways. Consider my efforts a favor... yes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailfoundprim.value: You found your primary weapon. Lock and load.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobj030lot.value: I have extraction ready but you have to find your weapons first. Can you handle that?

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobj040lot.value: You're not going to last long without your weapons, they are scattered around this facility. Find them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobjcomp14.value: You found all your weapons. Get out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobjcomp15.value: You're done. Extraction is waiting. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djuggarrived00.value: That did it, here comes the Juggernaut.
The Juggernaut, I think you made it angry. Good work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djuggdetected0.value: That was a Juggernaut. They're lured out by the death of infested. Lay-low and it should go away or amp up the fight to draw it out.
A Juggernaut nearby? It will only attack when it senses high concentrations of Infested blood. Slow the fight if you want it to go away.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djugggone0050l.value: I am no longer detecting signs of a Juggernaut, move on, you are safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djugggone0060l.value: The Juggernaut has moved on. It's safe to proceed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dkubrowcomplet.value: It is done. The collar has been attached and the bond between Tenno and Kubrow has been cemented.
Operator, you will remember to care for the beast, won't you? Ordis doesn't care either way…  do I?
You are an adorable organism, aren't you- What am I saying?
Leaky, filthy, stinking- floppy, fluffy, cute … Argh- Ordis is confused.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlaserchalleng.value: Your foes are not the only dangers you will face in the field. Avoid the lasers and defeat the enemies before the timer runs out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleavingsoon00.value: Tenno, if you have not yet had the chance to peruse my wares you had better hurry. I am leaving on another expedition soon.
I have nearly sold out of these items. This is your last chance, I don't know when I will have these again.
This relay is about to get a lot less interesting. Come see me before I go.
Tenno, there is little time left to purchase the finest Orokin era items this side of jupiter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleftrelay0090.value: Farewell Tenno, until we meet again?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleftrelay0100.value: I'm afraid I must be off, the Void is calling my name.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleftrelay0110.value: And now I am off, I hope you don't miss me too much while I'm gone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlimerick040or.value: Operator, did you enjoy that poem? Ordis is composing one as well, it begins: A scumbag Corpus from Venus...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostassa.value: You've done it Tenno. Vor's Ascaris is gone. You are free now.
But your work has just begun. The Origin System is in chaos and it needs you, Tenno.
Vor was just a part of the Grineer machine… and we have seen that the Corpus have begun amassing weapons of their own. It is a dangerous time.
Ordis will gladly assist the Operator in cutting a bloody path- in whatever mission they choose.
We will be at your side. There will be others too. It is time for the Tenno to return. So… what mission will you do next?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostfoun.value: Your Foundry Segement is ready for installation, Operator- Will the Operator build a Cephalon to replace me?
Foundry restored! Here the Operator will craft many powerful weapons and tools to- exact revenge for dismantling me- to expand your arsenal.
Oh, no. Operator our component storage has been looted as well...
Typical Corpus, sure the blueprint is free but jack up the components!  Operator, we will need resources in order to build the countermeasure blueprint.
Tenno I just received a very explicit message from your ship Cephalon. If you're looking for resources, why didn't you just say so?
I know just the place but I demand an apology… my mother is no gymnast and she would never eat those things.
You can go straight to- Operator, I am sorry.
Wow. You may want to get a new ship Cephalon, when you can afford it… that one seems glitched. I've marked your Navigation with a place I know… good for resources… if you can stand the cold.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostnavm.value: Oh, did it have to be Mercury? The heat drives me- Solar Rail navigation to Mercury enabled, Operator.
The detonator is charging up. You need to bring Vor down. He thinks he can capture you again. Don't worry. I will be with you. Let us show him how much you have learned.
Are you ready Tenno? Facing Vor is the only way to rid yourself of him permanently.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostresc.value: I see the Operator can enable the Mod Segment now! Ordis will be delighted to show you how to upgrade your arsenal. May I recommend fire?
Operator, I've linked the Mod system to your arsenal now. No need to thank me- Upgrade your Warframe now- go to the Arsenal to see the weapon upgrade options you have.
Ordis patiently awaits compliance in using the new Arsenal features… it is for the Operators own good.
An excellent find, Operator. There are hundreds of these Mods to find. If my calculations are correct there are exactly -- a lot of possibilities.
Install the Mod before we can continue.
Thanks for helping me out back there. I'm in your debt… and I often pay my debts. I do recognize that restraint device… we Corpus use something similar to keep our Robotics in line.
I recognize that device on your Frame… it's a restraint. We Corpus use something similar to keep our Robotics in line.
So to settle my debt I'll give you a very expensive blueprint… for free! Because I like you… and well, a lot of my customers don't live long with these Grineer dogs chewing up the system.
Here. Use your Foundry to build the countermeasure device from this blueprint. Good luck!
Vor's Ascaris is burrowing into your Warframe, I'm worried it will affect your mind… I can't lose you Tenno. We must restore the ship's Foundry immediately.
A nearby ore extraction colony will have the Foundry technology you need. I am certain they will share it with you. It's location has been added to your navigation console.
Tenno, we may have a problem, the colony is unresponsive. Get to the surface so we can see what's going on.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostresr.value: This part of your journey is over Tenno. I admire you for your struggle but now… I am part of you.
Lotus, do something! Help the Operator!
We Grineer are millions strong, but with a flaw. We are diseased, rotting, sterile, but now we have you.
Operator, do not abandon me again. Build the countermeasure!
I did this for my love, my Queens! They will forgive my insubordination when I deliver you to them.
Our love will be reborn as we feed on your divine blood and our children will flourish without disease. And I will die, at last, at peace. Father. Grandfather.
What do you think you are you doing?
Tenno. Tenno.. Good! You managed to disarm Vor's Ascaris! I thought… I thought I lost you.
Oh no. The Ascaris had a tampering failsafe, its burrowed into you and armed itself. We'll need to find Vor before it detonates.
Get to Navigation - boarding a Grineer ship to access their personnel records will be the fastest way to find Vor.
Operator, what are you waiting for?
Hello Operator, may I suggest you access Navigation and save your life? For my sake.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlotustrans000.value: Alad V's newest prototype is a monstrosity forged from the bodies of our fallen Tenno, we cannot allow Zanuka to go into full production. Destroy Alad V and his horrid 'pet'.
Too many Tenno have perished to make Alad V's abomination. There will be no stopping the Corpus if Zanuka is mass produced. You are here to make sure that doesn't happen.
The Zanuka prototype has made Alad V a very dangerous man. If he is allowed to carry out his plans, no Tenno in this system will be safe.
Be careful Tenno, Zanuka has all the power of a Warframe with a full complement of mods. It's as if you are fighting one of your own today.
Alad V sees the power of the Tenno and thinks he can take it for himself. That power is sacred, this blasphemy must end now.
If Alad V is victorious today he will dissect your Warframe and use the pieces to build more of his 'pets'. You must not let this happen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0090stee.value: I was wrong about you. You're a hero to these people… and to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0260arbi.value: You set the example for the rest of us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0440ceph.value: You would make an excellent Cephalon, Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0610perr.value: We stand behind you. Let's build a brighter future!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0780redv.value: You are a fire. As feared as you are respected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0950newl.value: Your humanity is a beacon for all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowhealth0064.value: We've been damaged, need to heal.
We've been damaged, need to heal.
We've been damaged, need to heal.
We've been damaged, need to heal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowhealth0066.value: Internals damaged, we need to watch it.
Internals damaged, we need to watch it.
Internals damaged, we need to watch it.
Internals damaged, we need to watch it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath180al.value: Ungrateful. You'll never know what I could have done for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath190al.value: Do you think this is over?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath200al.value: You build nothing. All you do is destroy.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath270sa.value: You fight well. Your death will be glorious.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowtennofailu.value: Tenno, your numbers have become too few to complete this mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis200or.value: Just as I suspected, another theorem.  Limbo's formula for inverting the entropic mass of void quantums is downright naughty.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis210or.value: I want more. Operator,  please hurry, this story is getting quite good.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis220or.value: This Limbo was quite mischievous, zipping in and out of the rift. Sending whole armies into a purgatory of his own making, physics is wonderful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis230or.value: More parts to the story. My word, he is a magician of logic. Just when I think his diffraction principle is full of dangling ratios, he expresses his dynamic constant in pure numbers. I never saw it coming.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis240or.value: The final part. I cannot wait. What harrowing leaps of cross-dimensional gymnastics will he attempt next?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis250or.value: Excellent, the final Theorem and its unfragmented. Processing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis260or.value: Oh, Wait, Limbo, no that's a mistake, you don't want to go there. It's too big a jump. You can't rift walk… ohh. Oh no.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis270or.value: Operator, I think I know why we're finding Limbo parts scattered throughout the system. His final rift walk was a miscalc... disaster. Well, perhaps when you occupy this frame, you will use more… caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet010or.value: So, this 'Limbo Theorem' you picked up, it's supposed to lead to a new Warframe? Well, it's woefully incomplete? Half-written proofs, unfinished equations, what idiot wrote this mess??

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet020or.value: Okay. Okay. go to your nav console, I have an idea. There is one thing here, a constant, a tuning frequency but it's so minute, the Orbiter's antenna would never be able to… unless… go to your nav console, I have an idea.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet021or.value: So, this 'Limbo Theorem' you picked up, it's supposed to lead to a new Warframe? Well, it's woefully incomplete? Half-written proofs, unfinished equations, what idiot wrote this mess??  Okay. Okay. There is one thing here, a constant, a tuning frequency but it's so minute, the Orbiter's antenna would never be able to… unless…go to your nav console, I have an idea.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet050or.value: These equations will continue to be a jumble of nothing until we recover all the missing proof fragments and reforge this Theorem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet060or.value: If you want to have any chance of recovering Limbo, you have to find those proof fragments to complete the Theorem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet070or.value: Good, now we get to find out what all this Limbo nonsense is about. I await the Theorem's completion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet080or.value: Okay, good, you've… wait… the horizon mass cannot be not inverted to this is preposterous!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet090or.value: Operator, I'm sorry. You did all this work and this so called Theorem is still completely invalid. It's as if all these proofs point to nothingness it's just  utterly irrational!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet100or.value: There's only one valid coordinate in the entire proof, I've marked it on your navigation console but I'm sure it's a waste of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet110or.value: A Limbo part blueprint! The Theorem wasn't complete malarkey after all. Perhaps there's more to these equations than I previously thought,  what am I missing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterallcap.value: Operator, I'm please to report that we are in full control.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinteralllos.value: may I suggest you capture a tower?
Operator, they have all four towers.  Stop them!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterclaims.value: They're on to us now but if you would like, we can attempt another scan.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterexterm.value: Scan complete, now we must clean up.  Kill them all!
Excellent, we have completed the scan. May I suggest  turning every last enemy into scrap!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintermissio.value: If there are any proof fragments bouncing around this "Limbo frequency" these radio towers will pick it up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinternewrou.value: We will attempt another scan of the frequency. I do hope you manage to pick something up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterobjrei.value: Operator, do you think anyone will mind if we borrow these for a while?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintersucces.value: The scan is complete. Did you find any Proof Fragments?
Scan completed. Were you able to recover any Proof Fragments?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintertowerc.value: A tower has been captured, scanning the Limbo frequency now.
We are now in control of this tower.
