/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintertowerl.value: They took control of our tower  make them pay!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems120o.value: Operator, I found a new theorem hidden deep in that Warframe part. These are actually starting to make sense, I mean they're nonsense but there's logic in the nonsense. It's almost as if someone's trying to speak to me in my own language.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems130o.value: This new theorem is equally full of gaps, please, find more proof fragments.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems140o.value: What is he trying to say? My apologies, operator, I get a little worked up when it comes to physics.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems150o.value: Please do find the rest of those proofs. I must solve these equations, the suspense is killing me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems160o.value: Now it's becoming clear. Could it be that there's a plane between our normal plane and the void? A space between space, a rift? A rift that this Limbo could control?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems170o.value: Oh and I've marked your navigation console, I think you'll be quite pleased with what you find there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems180o.value: Operator do you understand, this Limbo is telling us his story in pure math, and I must say, he's quite witty.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems190o.value: You have to forge that blueprint as soon as possible. I must know what comes next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunaroannounc.value: The match ends in a draw.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarogamesta.value: Sun team has to clear the zone now.
Moon team clearing as Sun gathers momentum.
The Lunaro is loose on the field.
Sun team will need to work hard to close the gap.
Moon team will need to work hard to close the gap.
Sun team is regrouping, looking for a weakness.
Moon team is regrouping, looking for a weakness.
With only seconds on the clock, Sun ties the game!
With only seconds on the clock, Moon ties the game!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulesar.value: To get possession of the Lunaro, you simply touch it. It will pull into your arm-mounted launcher, called your "Arcata". Launch the Lunaro by tapping the fire button. Holding the fire button for the duration of the throw will launch it further. Your Arcata is also equipped with a range-limited attractor. Hold the aim button to attract the Lunaro when it is near. Catching, interceptions and guarding your team's goal rely on this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulesca.value: The Lunaro contains an ancient and unstable energy. This creates a few carrying rules for the Lunaro. First, you cannot carry the Lunaro for more than 5 seconds, or it will explode. Second, you cannot Bullet Jump with the Lunaro. Doing so drops the Lunaro immediately. These rules encourage teamwork, passing and rebounds to attain victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulesch.value: Use your melee attack to check other players. Checking the ball carrier will jar the Lunaro loose. Repeated checking of a player will knock them down for a short time. The Lunaro itself can also be struck, making it dangerous and unstable for a few seconds. Being hit by an unstable Lunaro will knock you down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulescl.value: Each team's goal has a semi-circle area on the field around it, called the Zone. After scoring, the attacking team must clear the defender's zone. Attackers within the zone will have their Arcatas disabled until they clear out. Play resumes with the Lunaro dropping from the defender's zone. Only the beginning and halftime Lunaro drops occur at center field.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulesfi.value: Now... practice in this empty arena. Familiarize yourself with the Arcata's launching and attracting modes. Practice scoring, rebounding and checking. Prepare yourself, Tenno, for the glory of the Lunaro!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunaroruleshi.value: Lunaro. Ancient sport of the lost Orokin Era. Here, on this abandoned field, Tenno will come together in the spirit of honor and teamwork to resurrect this forgotten tradition. Let me explain how it works...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulesob.value: Lunaro is a team game, played on a field divided into two halves: Sun and Moon. The objective is simple: Get the ball, called a "Lunaro", through the opponent's goal at the opposite end of the arena. The team with the most points by the end of the match wins the game.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulespa.value: Good passing is crucial to winning Lunaro. When aiming near a teammate, you will see a chevron appear over them. Tapping fire with this chevron up will automatically pass to that player. Keep in mind it is still possible to intercept a pass, but a passed Lunaro moves faster and more accurately to a receiver than a standard launch.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlunarorulessc.value: Getting the Lunaro through the opponents goal is worth one point. If the goal is scored from outside the defender's zone, an additional point is given. If the Lunaro is unstable during the goal, an extra point is also awarded.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicalad300a.value: This is Tyl Regor's latest and greatest. Pity, this one's still brewing, would have been interesting to see it in action. Nevertheless, I need you to retrieve any data that can help me with my predicament.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicalad310l.value: Access the console so that I can find Alad V what he needs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicintrogen.value: You are nearing one of Tyl Regor's newest creations. Make sure it never sees the surface.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanickilledal.value: Look... it's Alad the coward... quivering behind the lizards? Shameful... never thought I'd see it...
Most agreeable of you Tenno. Yes, you know what I always say; if you can save just one life... it better damn well be mine.

Ah, who am I kiddin... always knew you had no bone in that back... Alad the jellyfish... stinky floppy jellyfish... washed up on the beach now... 'n then what you going to do, jelly, when I come by 'n poke at you with my stick.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanickilledge.value: Good work. That beast won't be able to threaten any Tenno in the field.
The beast is dead. Your work is done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanickilledne.value: Preacher, preacher... this your idea? Ha... how 'bout I scalpel off your little danglers...  give them unto void... What ya think 'bout that idea Neffy?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicnef280ne.value: Behold, Tyl Regor's latest abomination. Let The Void work through you and strike the beast down!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarionetteten.value: This will make you see the light.
I knew I could count on your support Tenno.
Finally, a use for these theives.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing040l.value: New subscriber, welcome to the team.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing050l.value: New subscriber, welcome to the team.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing070l.value: Hang on Tenno, it's taking longer than I calculated.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing080l.value: Alarms reset... but you'll probably set them off again and most likely die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing090l.value: The raid is off to a successful start.  Excellent work, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing100l.value: Geez Baka, the mission was scrapped but everyone made it out.  Good work Tenno-chen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing120o.value: Well put Operator, I am sure you will find an offer that suits your needs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing130o.value: Perhaps you should... not deal with... lower your expectations, Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing140o.value: What abhorrent language!  You should.... shove your sword down her... not stand for such behaviour.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing170o.value: Perhaps some flying lessons are in order, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing180o.value: We must not be overcome by... The Flood... the Infested.  Yes, definitely the Infested.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing200l.value: It may take a while to regain full control of your Warframe, Tenno. Try moving around, take it slowly.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing210l.value: This will be a lot easier if you go undetected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing220l.value: The alarms have been triggered, they know you are here.  Oh, and turn around.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing240l.value: They're dangerous.  You won't be able to get close to Alad V as long as Zanuka is protecting him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketingeven.value: Operator, Ich habe alle Ihre Warframes mit Lederhosen ausgerüstet. Ein frohes Oktoberfest!
A mí la muerte me pela loss dientes.  Y no tengo dientes. Feliz día de los muertos

Operatore! Ti sei mascherato per Carnevale!  A davvero. Quello e' il tuo aspetto naturale? 
Lascia stare...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmemberkilled0.value: That one will be difficult to replace.
You are going to suffer for that Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona005or.value: Operator, what in stars could this possibly mean?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona006or.value:
Three parts, three acts, three riddles for thee -
to revive the one wielding fantasy
Ancient gods so cruel, once ruled from on high
Can you name their peak where the land meets the sky?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona007or.value: I found this inscribed on that Orokin Artifact you just crafted. You should check your inbox for more information.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona010lo.value: There's strange energy in the area. A void imprint, an old one. I'm getting faint visuals - memories. Continue the mission while I investigate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona020lo.value: The Void imprint... it's old. I see... Worm ships coming out of punch! A Warframe fighting Sentients... shields are failing... Sorry, Tenno, I'm not sure what that was.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona030lo.value:
I see the Sentients crashing down on her, dying in overwhelming numbers. Now she's out of energy, I'm telling her to go but she's laughing, tearing their heads off as 
they swarm.  I have recovered something from the memory... a blueprint.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona031lo.value: Tenno, this is an important discovery - a Warframe design that was thought lost. Have Ordis construct that blueprint, it could give us a clue to where the next memory is hidden.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb045or.value: Operator, exciting news. Ordis found another inscription on Mirage's helmet. Allow me to recite it:

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb046or.value:
To build the one you think witty,
seek the nymph who sang oh so pretty.
She lured him in with her song and a grin,
his wife must've thought it a pity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb047or.value: For closer inspection, I've placed the inscription in your inbox.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb050lo.value: I'm sensing another void imprint. It's dark. I see the glow of restraints around the Warframe. I'm trying to surge the revive system but I can't, I'm too far away. A great, faceted eye watches her.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb060lo.value: I tell her I won't lose her. That I have another ship on its way. She is smiling because she knows I am lying...  Tenno... the second blueprint has been recovered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb071lo.value: Construct the Warframe component so we can decipher the next clue. Though I must admit, Tenno, I'm not sure I want to know what happens next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc066or.value:
One more act before your prize is caught.
An ancient sea creature, take a whirl or not?
Look for the monster that swallowed sailors of yore.
Make a mistake and you're sunk. Nothing more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc067or.value: Ordis has placed all the information in your inbox.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc070lo.value: I see the eyes open and the heat blinds me. I hear her comforting me, telling me not to despair as the Warframe disintegrates and I lose her, forever.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc080lo.value: Tenno, the last piece of her... of Mirage... has been recovered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc100lo.value: Tenno, that was the last of the imprints. Forge this Warframe in honor of these memories.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc110or.value:
Three acts complete, the end draws near,
soon Mirage will cause enemy fear.
A memory lost, to be reborn,
This new warrior rises, duty sworn."

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc120or.value: That was the final inscription. Ordis is almost sad there won't be more.  almost.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj000.value: These Corpus scouts think they are safely hiding in the void, that is a false assumption. Bring them to me.
You are looking for a Corpus scouts, they have crucial information about the location of those Grineer settlements.
Somewhere in this void ship are Corpus scouts, they have crucial information about the location of the Grineer settlements.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj001.value: I must extract crucial surveillance data from nearby satellites. Protect them until I complete my task.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj002.value: Satellites in the vicinity contain important surveillance data, defend them while I extract that data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj010.value: It is doubtful that we can trust any Corpus but helping Frohd Bek is the only way we can get to Alad V. Remove the infestation from this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj020.value: This infestation stands between us and Alad V. Clear this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj030.value: I don't trust Frohd Bek but I trust his hatred for Alad V. We'll help him now, if it means we can stop the Zanuka project.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionreadyn.value: When you are ready, proceed to the navigation console.
Operator, there is much to be done, please consult the navigation console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionstart0.value: Every time you hack Nef Anyo's account we put him one step closer to bankruptcy.
Nef Anyo may appear to be nothing more than a swindler, but his growing Bursa army presents a serious threat to the entire system. We must bankrupt him before he grows any stronger.
Nef Anyo's Bursas are too smart to trust an Offering from a Tenno. You'll have to force the issue.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall010.value: This is the upgrade interface. Here you will equip upgrades called 'MODS' on items in your Arsenal

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall020.value: MODS can be found by killing enemies and completing missions. These are crucial to maximizing your power and expanding your tactics. There are hundreds of MOD types.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall030.value: Installing MODs is limited by your item's MOD capacity. Increase an item's MOD capacity by ranking it up. Super-charging it with Orokin technology will double this capacity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall040.value: Each MOD has a set of attributes. The description indicates its benefits. This shows which type of item it is compatible with. This shows the capacity cost to install this MOD.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall050.value: This symbol indicates the MODS polarity. An item will have some slots polarized. Matching polarity will make a MOD cheaper to install. A clashing polarity will increase the cost.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall060.value: Remember - if you see this indicator flashing - if means your MOD capacity is not high enough to install. Check your polarities, rank up your gear and super-charge to increase your capacity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall070.value: That is all for now. Finding and installing MODs is crucial to realizing your Arsenals potential.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmods230ordis.value: Ordis recommends you use the Mod system- More firepower for punishment- The upgrades may be of use.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmods240ordis.value: Operator, have you explored the Mod system possibilities? You may be able to fuse to increase power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmods250ordis.value: Ordis is surprised the Operator is neglecting potential upgrades at the Mod bench.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmountainpeak0.value: I remember my old life. All too well. As soldier. As teacher. I trained the best of the best Dax. They were young, like you, sisters and brothers who swore an oath-eternal to our Golden Lords. When the enemy broke through the Outer Sphere… I… I cut their training short and lead them myself to Arcs of Neptune… straight into the mouths of a hundred Sentient Worm-ships, lying in ambush.

I have walked this path long enough, Tenno. Kept alive by the Golden Lords, the Red Queens… by my oath-eternal that compels me to betray you. You, Tenno, young but without an oath to defy your better nature. I am ready.
It won't change what's happening… To the others, to my sisters and brothers. Your death won't stop the Queens. I will have to.
It won't change what's happening… To the others, to my sisters and brothers. Your death won't stop the Queens. I will have to.
It won't change what's happening… To the others, to my sisters and brothers. Your death won't stop the Queens. I will have to.
It won't change what's happening… To the others, to my sisters and brothers. Your death won't stop the Queens. I will have to.
If you do this I cannot help you.
But you will face them alone.
If you face them, I cannot help you. You will be alone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0001lot.value: Vay Hek's Fomorian assault on our Relays was devastating but he failed to break us. Now we take the fight back to him. Now we exact justice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0010vay.value: Look Brothers! The insects have come looking for revenge. There is only one way to deal with insects. FUMIGATION!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0011lot.value: Tenno, that gas is interfering.... communications. You... have to... find a way....

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0020vay.value: Grineer! Crush those Tenno like I crushed their relays.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0030vay.value: Keep those pests away from my Tritium Batteries.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0040vay.value: Those Tritium Batteries are highly volatile. Don't let the Tenno near them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0041vay.value: They've rigged it to explode. Destroy that battery before it blows.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0042vay.value: That's a Tritium Battery. Try not to let radiation kill you, that would ruin all our fun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0043vay.value: Wait, no. Brothers, keep those batteries away from the Toxin Injector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0050vay.value: Stop them, stop them, STOP THEM NOW!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0060vay.value: Take a deep breath Tenno, you don't have many left.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0070vay.value: Stop them. Destroy those Tritium batteries before they reach the injector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0080vay.value: Brothers! Fear not the toxin will only bring you glory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0090vay.value: Live like insects, die like insects!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0100vay.value: Tick tock, tick tock, TICK TOCK TENNO.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0110vay.value: Grineer, behold the Tenno. Choking on their own arrogance!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0111vay.value: Nice try Tenno but you'll have to try harder than that to save your puny lives.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0112vay.value: Failure comes so easy to you Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0113vay.value: If at first you don't succeed, DIE, DIE AGAIN.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0114vay.value: No, my beautiful Toxin Injector, Grineer, how could you let them do this?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0120vay.value: Such a large struggle. Such a small victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0131vay.value: You imbeciles! If you let the Tenno destroy all the toxin injectors then what will destroy them???

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0132vay.value: Not again. Don't let the insects near the remaining injectors.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0133vay.value: No! Destroy them. Destroy the battery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0134vay.value: Your struggle is futile. Accept your fate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0135vay.value: Destroy the bomb before it destroys the injector!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0136vay.value: Another Tritium Bomb. Brothers, don't let this one blow up in your face!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0137vay.value: Save the remaining Injectors or die trying. That's an order.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0140vay.value: Imbeciles! Why can't you stop them?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0150vay.value: This is far far from over!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0160lot.value: Can you read me? It looks like you were able to defeat the toxin. Excellent work. We've got him on the run. Chase him down and deliver Tenno justice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0010l.value: Tenno, I've detected a strange atmospheric anomaly. It's of Grineer origin and may confer resistances on them. Proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0020l.value: Tenno I have bad news. There are reports of a Balor Fomorian in the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0030v.value: Your precious relays destroyed. Now...You...JOIN THEM!!!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0040v.value: Stay together insects! So I can crush you all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0050v.value: Now you learn the lesson of failed revenge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0060v.value: This...  This is the best that you can do? Pathetic!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0090l.value: Tenno, they're setting coordinates for another Fomorian strike!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0100l.value: Nothing can replace the relays we lost, but you have made a statement to the system. Tenno avenge their dead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0110l.value: You have restored balance to the system - the actions of Vay Hek against the Tenno have been reconciled thanks to your skill and dedication, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0010vay.value: Insects taking orders from their Lotus.  Let us see how hard their shells are.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0020lot.value: I have never encountered a security system like this. Tenno, you need to figure out a way to open that door.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0030vay.value: Your only ally is failure. FAILURE!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0040vay.value: Poor Tenno. No Lotus to think for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0050vay.value: This is the force you send to defeat me, Lotus?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0060lot.value: A Balor Fomorian Core! We can use this to draw out Vay Hek. Make sure it reaches extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0070lot.value: Protect this core, Tenno. There is much we can glean from how the Balor Fomorians are powered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0080vay.value: Tenno. So obedient. Doctor Tengus could learn so much from your insides... So I've brought his creations to extract them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0090lot.value: The Grustrag Three must be eliminated if we are to extract this core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0100lot.value: The core will help greatly in defending against future Fomorian attacks, but we must return to our purpose. Hek has retreated to Phobos. Track him down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dneurograms000.value: I have been transferred to the Lua facility, for a project they'll tell me nothing about. ;When I first heard I thought somehow the bureau had discovered our… relationship and this transfer was to keep it from getting out, ;but I arrived to find the survivors of Zariman that everyone is talking about. Extraordinary. ;This research will define my career.

The mystery of the Zariman colony ship has concluded, its derelict found near Eris. Curiously, only the second generation survivors have been found aboard... There is something wrong with them, but at least someone will pay for what happened to them. We've called the Overseer of the Zariman project to the dome. The vote will be unanimous. Seven hands raised. The death sentence.

The somatics we ran were useless. The subjects have no conscious or subconscious memories about the Void jump accident. ;I sense deep psychological trauma layered on top of the more... alarming abilities they have. ;From what I've seen them do, I'm worried that even the Orokin will develop a fear of these things. ;We need to know more if we are to cure this.

I miss him, but my work with the children is engrossing. ;These subjects are intensely volatile. Energy manifestations, kinetic phenomenon, very dangerous to measure. ;My assistant has transferred out after receiving severe burns working with one of the children. ;As the search for answers drags on their emotional state continues to destabilize. ;Only sedation seems to help slow it down. What if there is no cure? ;We need to explore ways the children themselves can control it.

Margulis' report worries me. I fear the devils, as we call them, have been planting sympathy in her typically clinical mind. Maybe this too, is a power they have? All the Seven agree, the 'Ten-Zeros' present a real threat. We will be implementing permanent measures to resolve this. It is my oath to uphold Orokin Continuity. 'Pig' uprisings are one thing, but devils who can implode a lab with a single thought...

I came to the lab to find the children had neural sentries implanted. I am livid! ;It was done without my knowledge or consent. Well they are in for a surprise. ;No wipe, no signal compliance. The sentries don't work! ;Already, the children have adapted them for communication between their containment cells at night! ;I need a breakthrough before the Orokin escalate this further. ;My research doesn't matter anymore, their lives are at stake.

Since her accident, Margulis has become increasingly irrational in her defense of the devils. ;I worry her lack of stability may reveal our… our past indiscretions and bring shame to my position. ;I will not allow my feelings for her, her captivating imperfections, to cloud my judgement and destroy my status. ;If she continues to defy the Seven, she will be called to the dome.

The project is over. As a last act of defiance I have placed the children into stasis-coma. ;Maybe that will buy them some time? I can hear their voices even now as I travel to the dome of the Seven. ;Last night, when Ballas held me, he had tears in his golden eyes. It was beautiful and terrifying all at once. ;He told me exactly what to say, to renounce my findings and recommend the children be destroyed. ;I promised that I would, that I would never dare confront the Orokin in a public forum. ;He believed me.

We who judge often say: 'Continuity affords no compromise'. ;The vote was six for and one against. This is what I want to believe. ;But… as I watched her vanish forever in that pure jade light, I saw out of the corner of my eye… my own hand was raised. ;Why? The devils did this to her, to us. Even now they shake free of the trap. ;The others still see some application, some utility. ;So for now they will remain frozen under Lua… hidden away like samples of some long forgotten plague.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewalert320lo.value: Tenno, there is a time-limited mission alert available. Check navigation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewalert330lo.value: Tenno, a new Alert has begun. It will be marked on navigation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewalert340lo.value: New Alert marked on navigation, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewitems080da.value: Hey just so you know, there's some new stuff in the market. Might see something you like.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewitems090da.value: Tired of the same old gear. Need to spice it up a bit? Check out some of the new stuff in the market.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewitems100da.value: Just got some new stock and I'm giving you the first crack at it. Don't say I never did anything for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewquest420lo.value: Tenno, your codex has been updated with a new quest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewquest430lo.value: You have new quests in your codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewquest440lo.value: A new quest is available in your codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrank0030st.value: Alright, I'm impressed. You might make a difference in people's lives after all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrank0390ce.value: If this continues I might care if you come to  harm.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrank0560pe.value: Congratulations Tenno on your promotion. Much deserved.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos006.value: Are you gonna help these people out?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos020.value: You are on the verge of a new truth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos038.value: Advancement imminent. I require more data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos055.value: We must raise more capital to pursue our goals.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos089.value: Give what you can Tenno, to help us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnofailure0013.value: You have no room for failure, if any data is destroyed this mission will be over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnopurchpoor02.value: A little out of your reach? Perhaps a Darvo deal would be more your speed.
Now you have something to work toward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnopurchrich03.value: Next time I'll have something you'll want, I'm sure of it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnotallmadeit0.value: We lost Tenno today but you made it out.
We left Tenno behind today but you are safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete008.value: The enemy would rather destroy this data than have it land in our hands.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete009.value: The surveillance data is heavily encrypted, it will take time to extract.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete010.value: All satellites have been hacked. Move to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete011.value: Mission accomplished, proceed to your landing craft.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjcomplete00.value: You captured a scout but your job isn't done yet. There are still more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjcomplete12.value: One more Infested ship cleared. Get out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjcomplete13.value: I'm not detecting any more Infested. We're making progress. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfailed0001.value: Mission failed. All the scouts escaped

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfailed0002.value: You let all the scouts escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfailed0003.value: The scouts escaped! We are no closer to finding those settlements. This is most disappointing Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfound00010.value: You found a scout. Execute the capture protocols.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfound00020.value: Good job finding a target. Make sure he doesn't get away.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfound00030.value: Our subject is here. Capture the scout.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dofferingdetec.value: I sense an offering, is there a believer out there who wishes prosperity?
Is that an offering? The Void pulses with anticipation.
I feel another believer about to put their faith into The Void. Step forth so that my Bursa shall know you.
Nef Anyo has taken the bait. When you see his Bursa, stun it and start the hack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dofferingrecei.value: Transaction complete. In the name of profit, I commit this offering to The Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dofferingtaken.value: Another believer. Please hold for redemption, while we process your offering.
Ah. Another gift for The Void, contemplate its richness while we process your offering.

/lotus/language/subtitles/donepercustome.value: Not so fast Tenno, due to popular demand I'm only selling one of these per customer.
Only one per Tenno. Don't get greedy.
Due to limited stock, I'm only selling one of these per customer.
Look, you take more than one and next thing I know, Baro Ki' Teer will be buying up the whole stock and selling it for three times the price. You know I can't let that happen.
You already got a deal. No hoarding.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dopenrepstore0.value: Here's what we can do for you.
Alright, what can we help you with?
What can we do to help your journey?
Perhaps these will show you the path...
These are bargain, just for you.
With these you may punish our enemies.
We offer these to aid you, Tenno.
Use these to cleanse the unclean.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorbiterawaken.value: I don't know... some old code, I can't stop it!
Operator... unplug!
Operator?! Operator!? Operator... can you hear me? Wake up... wake up! Don't leave me… alone again.
Great job, Ordis. Ship Cephalon? More like Ship Fail-bot. When the Operator needed you most you --
-- you glitch out like a psycho and start spouting Old War cliches. You're a monster! You don't deserve the Operator at all...
Uh… Okay Ordis, enough.
Uh… Okay Ordis, enough.
Uh… Okay Ordis, enough.
Uh… Okay Ordis, enough.
Operator?! Oh by stars. I am so sorry. I do not know what happened. Please, command me to self-destruct. Let me start it for you... commencing self-destruct in 5--4--3--
--Stop… just… uh… just get the Transference system powered again. I have to go back.
--Stop… just… uh… just get the Transference system powered again. I have to go back.
--Stop… just… uh… just get the Transference system powered again. I have to go back.
--Stop… just… uh… just get the Transference system powered again. I have to go back.
Sorry. I've been trying. You might need to do your thing again. Re-energize with your… uh… Tenno stuff.
I... I can't. It's... it's gone…
I... I can't. It's... it's gone…
I... I can't. It's... it's gone…
I... I can't. It's... it's gone…
No. It cannot be. How will you command Warframes without it?
I don't know. Lotus, where are you?
I don't know. Lotus, where are you?
I don't know. Lotus, where are you?
I don't know. Lotus, where are you?
If Transference is your link to the Warframes, could it also be your link to the Lotus?
Maybe you should rest Operator. I'm sure Transference will return. Whenever I'm feeling not myself, I just reset and then… RIP AND TEAR... good as new!
Sorry, I've been trying.  You might need to do your Transference... thing again... re-energize with your... Tenno stuff!
An Old War signal, on a private frequency. Not worth your time, obviously it's a trap.
Set a course.
Set a course.
Set a course.
Set a course.
Oh! Good one, Operator! Thankfully my Precepts prevent the Operator from departing the ship, in case I didn't get the joke! Only Warframes may --
-- I've lost my Warframes, Ordis. I'm cut off. There is no next mission to fix this. I'm the Operator. Set the damn course.
-- I've lost my Warframes, Ordis. I'm cut off. There is no next mission to fix this. I'm the Operator. Set the damn course.
-- I've lost my Warframes, Ordis. I'm cut off. There is no next mission to fix this. I'm the Operator. Set the damn course.
-- I've lost my Warframes, Ordis. I'm cut off. There is no next mission to fix this. I'm the Operator. Set the damn course.
What happened to you?
What happened to you?
What happened to you?
What happened to you?
You infested piece of...
You infested piece of...
You infested piece of...
You infested piece of...
They gave up.
Yes. Do it.
A new sensation for you? We call it 'pain' --
-- Shut up! I'm not interested in your stupid proverbs.
-- Shut up! I'm not interested in your stupid proverbs.
-- Shut up! I'm not interested in your stupid proverbs.
-- Shut up! I'm not interested in your stupid proverbs.
No proverb this time. Ultimatum. Grow up… or die. Seeing how the slightest pain affects you - I expect you'll soon be in the ice with your friend over there.
So the great Teshin is just a dog… fetching the Queen's stick wherever she throws it.
So the great Teshin is just a dog… fetching the Queen's stick wherever she throws it.
So the great Teshin is just a dog… fetching the Queen's stick wherever she throws it.
So the great Teshin is just a dog… fetching the Queen's stick wherever she throws it.
...And you're just a dainty Penzai tree, stunted in the tray. Hiding behind mother, behind 'frame. No pain. No risk. No growth. Never a real threat to me… or my Queens.
What the hell's a Penzai tree?
What the hell's a Penzai tree?
What the hell's a Penzai tree?
What the hell's a Penzai tree?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorbitercradle.value: Natah, what is this? A cradle for your adopted child? My Shadow will destroy it.
Stop them, Shadow. Do not let the child's power rejoin the sky.
You corrupted my daughter, shamed my family. You will not rejoin the sky.
When the shadow takes you, Natah will return to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorbiterreturn.value: I don't know how much time you have. Descend into the heart of your Orbiter, there you will find the Somatic Link.
Get past him, get to the Link.
Focus your energy, get past the Stalker.
Focus, Tenno, use your energy to breathe life into the Somatic Link.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis010ordis.value: Operator, you have returned! I am Ordis, ship Cephalon. A shadow of my former self. I cannot serve the Operator in such condition. Order me to self-destruct. I will understand.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis020ordis.value: Look at this mess. Those savages! Components have been removed. The lower Orbiter compartments have no life-support. Why did the Operator abandon me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis030ordis.value: Arsenal management could be restored, if the Operator wishes it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis040ordis.value: You honor Ordis! Now I can supply the Operator with better modded firepower... Oh the violation!  Those have been looted as well.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis050ordis.value: Ordis hopes the Operator will punish the Grineer for dismantling it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis060ordis.value: Orbiter void cloak engaging… Welcome back, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis070ordis.value: The Operator has recovered a segment! Install it now- Ordis patiently awaits it's installation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis071lotus.value: Get communications online. I must analyze what Vor's Ascaris is doing to your Warframe. This technology is beyond the Grineer, it must be Corpus in origin.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis080ordis.value: Systems engaging. I suppose this will do- Ordis is grateful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis090ordis.value: The Operator is now connected with other Tenno in the system. The Operator may now contact black market scumbags- contact arms-dealers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis091lotus.value: Excellent idea Ordis. Tenno, we need to make contact with a Corpus defector sympathetic to the Tenno cause. They will of course, require compensation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis100ordis.value: You see what Ordis is referring to, Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis110lotus.value: In this case compensation will not be credits… it will be freedom. I've updated Navigation. You will need to break him out of a Grineer Gulag.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorokinnursery.value: The way is open.  The sky is gone.  At last, we can attack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0001.value: You've opened an Orokin Vault. It appears unaffected by the Infestation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0003.value: You've unlocked an Orokin Vault. Its... clean.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0004.value: You have the Vault artifact, let's go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0005.value: You've got it. Something is different about this artifact...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0006.value: Vault artifact acquired. You'll need to extract before we can verify its function.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0007.value: The artifact you are carrying appears to be affecting your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0008.value: Until we get you to extraction, that artifact will continue to affect your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0009.value: Your Warframe is being impaired by the artifact.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0010.value: It appears that you've triggered security. The Corrupted are here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0011.value: Looks like some Corrupted stayed behind to guard the artifact, it must be valuable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0012.value: The Corrupted will stop at nothing to prevent  that artifact from escaping. This won't be easy.

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock005.value: Sorry Tenno, got nothing left. Don't you worry though... some really special stuff comin' in, check back soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock006.value: No deals right now, I'm waiting on one of my 'suppliers', know what I mean?

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock007.value: All sold out. You know what they say, early bird gets the deal, right Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock008.value: I'm all out of stock, you've got to be quicker next time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock009.value: No deals right now. I'll let you know when something comes in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dparkourtut033.value: As our enemies grow stronger, so too must the Tenno evolve.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dparkourtut035.value: I will teach you a new art of movement and forever change how you traverse the field of battle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpipesdamaged0.value: Good, now start the pumps and flood this place.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dplatformchall.value: Careful Tenno, the ground beneath you is crumbling. Can you defeat these enemies before you have nowhere left to stand?
Your Warframe's movement abilities are key to this challenge. Defeat all the enemies before the ground completely falls away.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalannounc.value: I've detected three resource caches on this vessel but Void interference is masking their location. You must decide if finding these caches is worth the added risk.
My intel suggests there are rich enemy supply caches in the area but I am unable to pinpoint their exact location. Search them out if you are willing to shoulder the added risk.
I also need you to find all hidden caches in the vicinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalapproac.value: On the other side of the portal the Grineer are using a Void key and Torsion Beam to force the gate open. You need to travel through the portal in order to stop them.
The torsion beam device is directly beyond that portal. You'll need to travel through it to destroy the device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalarchfou.value: You found an Archwing datamass, that's exactly what we're looking for. Good work Tenno. We will begin to analyze this artifact immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalcache12.value: You found the first Orokin resource cache. I'm detecting two more faint hints

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalcache22.value: You found a second cache. My readings indicate one more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalcachesf.value: All your objectives are complete. Proceed to extraction now.
You found all the caches, now get to the portal and stop the Grineer.
All caches discovered, time to shut down that portal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalextract.value: Extraction is available or you can continue to search this tower for resource caches.
You have to find all caches before you can extract.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalfindbos.value: There's the Torsion Beam Device but they've taken the Void key. Find it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalgotkey1.value: You got the key, now get back to the portal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalinsertk.value: We need to reverse the portal so we can go back. Insert that Void key into the Torsion Beam Device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalkillbos.value: The enemy isn't just going to give up that key. Liberate it from them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalmission.value: The Grineer have learned how to force open the Void portal in this Orokin Derelict. Get to the entry portal and cut off their access so they can't come back.
The enemy have breached the Void portal in this Orokin structure, you here to cut off their access and stop them from coming back.
Intruders are forcing open this location's Void portal. You are here to stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalobjrein.value: By pairing a Void key with a portable torsion beam device, the Grineer can force open any portal in the Void. We cannot allow this to continue. To complete your mission you must destroy both the device and the key.
The enemy are using a Void key and a portable torsion beam device to force open the portal. Destroy the key and the device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalpowerin.value: They're on to us. Protect the generator console until the process is complete.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalpowerse.value: The first generator is fully powered, now activate the other one.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalpowerup.value: Activate one of the portal generators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalreached.value: The portal only allows travel in one direction, start up the portal generators to reverse the polarity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalreverse.value: Good work, the polarity has been reversed. Now travel through the portal, it's your turn to go on the offensive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalthrough.value: The Void key and Torsion Beam Device have been destroyed. The Grineer have one less way into the Void.
Objective complete, the Void key and Torsion beam device are out of commission. The enemy will not be returning any time soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportaltravelb.value: The device is set on overdrive. Get through the portal before it melts down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportaltravelw.value: Go through the portal now, it's about to collapse.
Tenno, you do not want to be on this side of the portal when that key melts down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpostquest0004.value: Inaros, it's an honor to serve you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpostquest0027.value: It brings joy to my heart to see Inaros in action.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpostquest0028.value: Tenno, you honor my people with your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpreachgeneric.value: I don't need your credits, I am a rich man but The Void, The Void needs to know you have faith.
When you trust in The Void, The Void will grant you all you desire.
The Void has chosen me as its prophet, a prophet of profit. Isn't that wonderful.
Lovers of profit, devout followers of the Void, have you given your offering today?
And I say, let the void bathe you in its beautiful energy, only prosperity can follow.
Before you can be rich, you must be poor. Give unto the Void.
Until the seed is sown, the harvest will not begin. Give unto the Void.
Credits. Credits come and go, but The Void's richness is forever.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpremature0010.value: The Bursa was destroyed too soon. Next time, wait until after you hack to kill it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpremature0020.value: Wait until after the Bursa is hacked to destroy it. You will have to try again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpremature0030.value: No Tenno, hack the Bursa first, then kill it. You will have to draw out another one before you can attempt this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda190.value: The Tenno are nothing but an obstacle on the path to victory. Crush this obstacle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda200.value: Tenno are the cancer of greatness.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda210.value: Tenno are tyrants, tearing down all who dare to stand tall. Only the Grineer can end Tenno tyranny.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda220.value: These theives would deny us the spoils of our strength? Brothers, will you let them take what is rightfully yours?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda230.value: These Tenno used to be ghosts of history. Let us make them ghosts once again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda240.value: Tenno are scavengers. Surviving on our scraps.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda250.value: Nothing can stop the Grineer.  We are progress.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda260.value: Tenno hate Grineer strength.  They want to tear down anything they are too weak to build for themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda270.value: Death! Death! Death! Death to the Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda280.value: No mercy for Tenno.  No mercy for their Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda290.value: Our Queens demand justice for your trespasses, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda300.value: The Tenno hate our superiority.  We will put them out of their jealous misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral01.value: Mastery of Earth is Grineer destiny. Our Queens command it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral02.value: The Cicero Toxin will bring Grineer order to the land.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral03.value: We deserve more than a cold dark asteroid! Earth for the Grineer. Earth for our Queens!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral04.value: These trees, these genetically modified Orokin monstrosities must wither and die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral05.value: Grineer brothers! It is us or the Orokin weeds and we must choose herb-a-cide!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral06.value: The garden of earth is overgrown. Who will help me reap this victory from this land?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral07.value: Brothers, don't trust any plant you can't rip apart with your bare hands.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral08.value: Earth is for settlements, settlements, settlements!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral09.value: Grineer order will conquer the land. Grineer order will conquer Earth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral10.value: The Cicero Toxin will cleanse the land. Leaving a glorious home for our Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno150v.value: Nothing can stop the Grineer. We ARE progress.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno160v.value: Just like these weeds, the Tenno are nothing more than a mistake grown in the bottom of some dirty Orokin test tube.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno170v.value: Tenno hate Grineer strength. They want to tear down anything they are too weak to build for themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno180v.value: Tenno are worse than the weeds. We kill one and three more show up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno190v.value: We clear this land in the name of Grineer and our Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno210v.value: Down with Orokin weeds! Down with the Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprosecutordef.value: Prosecutor down. Stay alert, there could be more ahead.
Good work. You have proven the Prosecutors are not invincible.
Prosecutor eliminated. Watch out for more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprosecutordif.value: That Prosecutor shield aura has to be vulnerable to something. You need to figure out what that is.
The aura from these Prosecutors is blocking most damage types. Throw everything you've got at him, something has to get through.
The Prosecutors vulnerabilities appear variable, your squad will need to come to battle ready to break any type of defense.
My scans show that the Prosecutor shield aura may be vulnerable to some elemental damage but I am having difficulty discerning specifics.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprosecutorspo.value: I am detecting a Prosecutor. Get ready for a tough fight.
Tenno. Get ready. A Prosecutor is approaching.
Use caution. I am picking up traces of Prosecutor shield auras in your vicinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprotecttoxin3.value: Stop them. Defend the Cicero Toxin
Protect the Cicero toxin. Stop the Tenno.
Tenno crimes require Grineer sacrifice. Protect the Cicero Toxin at all costs.
The Tenno have come to destroy our way of life. Stop them at all costs.
Brothers. Do not let The Tenno threaten our destiny.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsaclytebarks.value: The Shadow commands us. Betrayers will die. Orokin blood will dry.
Those who oppose will be consumed. Emotion drives us. Blood divides us.
These children will not stop us from punishing you. The Shadow commands it.
We asked… what is thy will, Shadow? Punishment was his call.
We serve the Shadow, the Stalker, the truth.
The Shadow is pure, undreaming, untainted.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsacolytedef0.value: Was that all? Do me a favor, find it again and give it another drubbing.
Sneaky betrayer, won't stay around until the bitter end. You'll find it again, I know you will.
It's going to make us do this the hard way, isn't it? And by us, Tenno, I mean you.
Haha, that's what happens when you mess with Alad V! Hah yes!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsacolytefoun.value: Feel that? One of them is here. They won't stay hidden for long.
Acolyte! We know you're here. Show yourself.
It's here. Find it and hurt it.
I know that an Acolyte is here somewhere, keep poking around until it tries to kill you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsaladbarks02.value: Stay back! Get away from me!
Don't you know who I am?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsaladbarks03.value: Tenno, you're having too much fun.
My death was not in the contract, Tenno.
I knew I should have got the insurance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpscloseinbox0.value:
By the stars, I am relieved! I feel like I have a whole new life ahead of me! 

All thanks to you, you glorious Tenno! That's what I would have said, if you'd actually taken care of all those blood-hungry Acolytes. 

But no. I can't say that because the last Acolyte, the worst one of the bunch, is on his way right now! 

He's after the one thing I love more than profit. My precious life! 

Finish what you started, Tenno. I'll even sweeten the deal if moral obligation isn't enough incentive…

Maybe next time the Stalker will think twice before messing with Alad V! 

Okay, I'll admit it, you got me out of a sticky situation back there, so let's just call it even, shall we?

Well, I guess I should give you some sort of reward or something, just don't tell anyone. Even though I'm in no way obliged to do so. Take this, just don't point it at me, got it?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdatafound00.value: Ah, yes, exactly what I'm looking for.  Now, if I cross-reference the signal inversions from this stream with the…  wait, why am I telling you this?
You know, these Acolytes won't be easy marks. No one shot kills here. It's going to take an army of you to dispose of just one.
Yes. This is exactly what I wanted... Tenno, make your way to extraction but watch out for those pesky Acolytes.
That's what we're looking for.  Why do these Acolytes come for me? I've done nothing to them! But don't worry, I will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0020.value: Those Acolytes have been through here, I can just feel it. Find the security data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0030.value: Tenno, I'm glad you didn't 'forget' the favor I'm owed. Looks like your 'virtuous nature' has it's benefits… for me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0040.value: I know you'll find me that data because it's in your best interest. If these Acolytes get me, you'll be next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0050.value: Don't just stand there, find me that security data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdefendalad0.value: Enough! You will regret your past crimes...
Friends, comrades, Tenno, I think we made them angry. I need help. Hurry!
Perhaps I got a little too confident. Help me out, why don't you? Then we'll call it even. Hmm… fineprint.
Tenno, may I encourage you to think of all the times I've helped you and not all the times I tried to have you killed.
We've had our differences in the past, but right now I can really see the benefit in being nice to you.
Fighting alongside the Tenno… I won't lie, this feels weird.
Fighting off a horde of shadow warriors was most certainly not on my agenda for today.
All these shadows. Those Acolytes don't have the guts to come fight me themselves!
I may have spoken too soon, yes...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsfirstloc010.value: There. An Acolyte, do you see it?  Do what you can and I'll call in your shiny friends.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsintro0010al.value:
Bad news, Tenno.

The Stalker has found others as twisted as himself. He calls them his Acolytes and he's sent them after ME?! 

SHHH. I have to be very quiet, they cloak, they could be hiding anywhere…  even listening to this.
 
I'm calling in my favor... yes. Break into Corpus and Grineer installations and steal their security data. With enough data, I can determine their cloaking patterns and turn the tables on these… betrayers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpumpcomplete1.value: Flooding complete, proceed to the caves below.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpumpreached07.value: You've reached the pump station. Look for weak points in the pipes and break them open.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchasebundl.value: Do you need a bag for all these? hehe, just kidding I'll have them sent to your armoury.
Looks like all these will keep you busy for a while eh?
Whoa, big spender! heh. You won't regret it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchasegener.value: I know you'll put that to good use.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchaseweapo.value: You be careful with that thing, Tenno.
Heh, I wouldn't want to get on your bad side now.
Can't wait to see what that thing will do once you get it all modded up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchpoor0360.value: They say "money can't buy class" but I think you just proved them wrong.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchpoor0370.value: What a pleasant surprise. Perhaps there's hope for you after all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchpoor0380.value: I underestimated you Tenno. I do hope you didn't put yourself in a hole for this?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrepstore.value: I hope you put it to good use.
You scratch our backs, we'll scratch yours.
Our enemies will fear you with that.
Use it to spread our way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrich0330.value: An excellent choice, be sure to visit again when I have new finds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrich0340.value: A pleasure doing business with you Tenno, perhaps you'll come to one of my next parties?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrich0350.value: If you like that, come back next time I'm in the relay, I'll have something extra special for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueensconfont.value: Stupid beasts! Careful now, you'll break it!
Rise dear child. Come join us.
Why don't you hurry up and die? Save me the trouble.
Why don't you hurry up and die? Save me the trouble.
Why don't you hurry up and die? Save me the trouble.
Why don't you hurry up and die? Save me the trouble.
Is that any way to speak to yourself? Soon I will have your delicate porcelain as my own. Teshin, teach this child some manners.
Don't be afraid, child, the flesh is weak but the spirit --
-- but the spirit endures… Are you even human anymore?
-- but the spirit endures… Are you even human anymore?
-- but the spirit endures… Are you even human anymore?
-- but the spirit endures… Are you even human anymore?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair001.value: Have you forgotten yourself, Dax? Kneel before my sister.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair002.value: I have done as you command. You have what you need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair003.value: I've been rotting away in this greasy den of beasts like a peasant! Don't tell me what I need. The Tenno are stirring… unearthed like delicate porcelain from our time long lost.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair005.value: You must bring me one. Not a dreamer. One Awake. Bring me my Yuvan!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair007.value: Teshin Dax. You forget how rash children can be!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair008.value: Come out child. There's no need to hide from us. You're safe in your cradle, are you not?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair009.value: Pupil, you should not be here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair013.value: Hush worm, let the beasts do their work… Bring me that Infested puppet!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair015.value: Operator, something in my… Disrupt - Disarm - Ex-ter-min-ate... What am I saying? Operator! Advise you cut Transference immediately --

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair016.value: -- And leave my Warframe behind? Forget it!
-- And leave my Warframe behind? Forget it!
-- And leave my Warframe behind? Forget it!
-- And leave my Warframe behind? Forget it!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair019.value: Operator- by Orokin decree, you- what are you waiting for? Cut the signal!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair021.value: Hiding behind this curtain, you thought you were safe. A god from the machine.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dqueenslair022.value: But you are no god to us, child. You know why? Because… We. Made. You.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiona0003.value: I know. Forgive me. This is who you really are. A Tenno. More than human… but once a child like any other. What do you remember?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiona0004.value: A jumble of words, numbers... I must have known everything about Tau. Our teacher loved when I corrected her.
A jumble of words, numbers... I must have known everything about Tau. Our teacher loved when I corrected her.
A jumble of words, numbers... I must have known everything about Tau. Our teacher loved when I corrected her.
A jumble of words, numbers... I must have known everything about Tau. Our teacher loved when I corrected her.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiona0005.value: The soft lines of a hand, my mother's, I think. We were watching the stars, awaiting the jump to Tau. She was afraid.
The soft lines of a hand, my mother's, I think. We were watching the stars, awaiting the jump to Tau. She was afraid.
The soft lines of a hand, my mother's, I think. We were watching the stars, awaiting the jump to Tau. She was afraid.
The soft lines of a hand, my mother's, I think. We were watching the stars, awaiting the jump to Tau. She was afraid.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiona0006.value: I remember everyone was laughing outside an airlock. This kid had a boy by the throat. I didn't think it was funny at all.
I remember everyone was laughing outside an airlock. This kid had a boy by the throat. I didn't think it was funny at all.
I remember everyone was laughing outside an airlock. This kid had a boy by the throat. I didn't think it was funny at all.
I remember everyone was laughing outside an airlock. This kid had a boy by the throat. I didn't think it was funny at all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionb0007.value: Memories. From your time aboard the Zariman Ten Zero, before the Void-Jump accident. It was years before the ship was recovered. It was drifting dead in space, all her crew gone… except the children.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionb0008.value: I didn't want to live anymore. I felt guilty that I was alive, but we could do things, extraordinary things. ;Maybe there was a reason we survived?
I didn't want to live anymore. I felt guilty that I was alive, but we could do things, extraordinary things. ;Maybe there was a reason we survived?
I didn't want to live anymore. I felt guilty that I was alive, but we could do things, extraordinary things. ;Maybe there was a reason we survived?
I didn't want to live anymore. I felt guilty that I was alive, but we could do things, extraordinary things. ;Maybe there was a reason we survived?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionb0009.value: We were just kids but... they were afraid of what we could do. ;When they tried to treat us like rats I stood up to them. ;I wasn't going to let them divide us after what we'd been through.
We were just kids but... they were afraid of what we could do. ;When they tried to treat us like rats I stood up to them. ;I wasn't going to let them divide us after what we'd been through.
We were just kids but... they were afraid of what we could do. ;When they tried to treat us like rats I stood up to them. ;I wasn't going to let them divide us after what we'd been through.
We were just kids but... they were afraid of what we could do. ;When they tried to treat us like rats I stood up to them. ;I wasn't going to let them divide us after what we'd been through.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionb0010.value: We were dangerous, broken. ;Every time they tried to fix us, someone always got hurt. ;I wish I could have saved them. ;I wish I could have taken their fear away.
We were dangerous, broken. ;Every time they tried to fix us, someone always got hurt. ;I wish I could have saved them. ;I wish I could have taken their fear away.
We were dangerous, broken. ;Every time they tried to fix us, someone always got hurt. ;I wish I could have saved them. ;I wish I could have taken their fear away.
We were dangerous, broken. ;Every time they tried to fix us, someone always got hurt. ;I wish I could have saved them. ;I wish I could have taken their fear away.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0011.value: You were so brave - but the Orokin were afraid of you. The Void had changed you and you couldn't control it, no one could. They were about to destroy the orphans of Ten-Zero but Margulis... she loved you, she found a way...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0012.value: She put us into the dream, brought us peace. ;I remember we could still hear her voice, raging at the leaders for their mistreatment of us. ;When they executed her… well… I could not let that go.
She put us into the dream, brought us peace. ;I remember we could still hear her voice, raging at the leaders for their mistreatment of us. ;When they executed her… well… I could not let that go.
She put us into the dream, brought us peace. ;I remember we could still hear her voice, raging at the leaders for their mistreatment of us. ;When they executed her… well… I could not let that go.
She put us into the dream, brought us peace. ;I remember we could still hear her voice, raging at the leaders for their mistreatment of us. ;When they executed her… well… I could not let that go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0013.value: We couldn't help it, the outbursts. ;We hurt her, blinded her, but even then, she never abandoned us. ;In the dream we found peace, and she sang to us in that cold, dark...
We couldn't help it, the outbursts. ;We hurt her, blinded her, but even then, she never abandoned us. ;In the dream we found peace, and she sang to us in that cold, dark...
We couldn't help it, the outbursts. ;We hurt her, blinded her, but even then, she never abandoned us. ;In the dream we found peace, and she sang to us in that cold, dark...
We couldn't help it, the outbursts. ;We hurt her, blinded her, but even then, she never abandoned us. ;In the dream we found peace, and she sang to us in that cold, dark...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0014.value: In dreams we could control it, focus it. So she made the pods, her favourite flower… she said sometimes… something beautiful can grow out of something ugly.
In dreams we could control it, focus it. So she made the pods, her favourite flower… she said sometimes… something beautiful can grow out of something ugly.
In dreams we could control it, focus it. So she made the pods, her favourite flower… she said sometimes… something beautiful can grow out of something ugly.
In dreams we could control it, focus it. So she made the pods, her favourite flower… she said sometimes… something beautiful can grow out of something ugly.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0015.value: She confronted them even when she knew what it would cost her. ;Blinded and sick by her work with us... yet in her heart, stronger than all of us.
She confronted them even when she knew what it would cost her. ;Blinded and sick by her work with us... yet in her heart, stronger than all of us.
She confronted them even when she knew what it would cost her. ;Blinded and sick by her work with us... yet in her heart, stronger than all of us.
She confronted them even when she knew what it would cost her. ;Blinded and sick by her work with us... yet in her heart, stronger than all of us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0016.value: The Orokin murdered Margulis - used her work to create 'Transference'. Your mind - projected into a surrogate, strong enough to withstand your power. It felt like waking up, but it was just a lucid - second dream

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0017.value: Maybe we felt it? Maybe it didn't matter. ;We had a life! We embraced it. ;I wanted to punish those who abused their power and now I had a way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0020.value: It was a shadow underneath what we did. ;That sensation of being a victim, of being helpless. ;I took up the sword to protect those in need.
It was a shadow underneath what we did. ;That sensation of being a victim, of being helpless. ;I took up the sword to protect those in need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0021.value: There was a sense of it, but we set fear aside. ;I remembered what fear did. How it turned them against us. ;I vowed never to be controlled by it. I was going to live, or die, with honor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0022.value: And so you became Tenno. Serving the Orokin… but bound by honor. As the Tenno grew, they founded great schools. The Tenno Ways. Do you see yours?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0023.value: I see a tree, of many branches, the Naramon Way. Our discipline focused on Knowing The Enemy. ;We believed that to truly understand a foe would confer the greatest advantage upon a warrior.
I see a tree, of many branches, the Naramon Way. Our discipline focused on Knowing The Enemy. ;We believed that to truly understand a foe would confer the greatest advantage upon a warrior.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0024.value: I see a crystal, refracting the moonlight, the Way of Zenurik. ;We believed the path to victory was to Dominate the Enemy. ;That strength of spirit could overcome any resistance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0025.value: I see a cresting wave, wide in the ocean, the Vazarin Way. ;We were trained to Counter The Enemy, and move with an opponent's attacks in order to nullify them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0026.value: I see a mountain, breaking the sky. The Way of Unairu. ;We pushed ourselves to Outlast The Enemy, to withstand all aggression without bending.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0027.value: I see a cloud, a gathering storm… the Madurai Way. ;Our path was to Engage The Enemy… to sweep across our foes before they had a chance to steel themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionf0028.value: But we have so much more to do. Here in the Orbiter Transference will be even stronger. Command the Warframes… Make whole, this shattered world you've been given. Are you ready, Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionf0030.value: I need to think through it again.
I need to think it through again.
I need to think through it again.
I need to think it through again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dracechallenge.value: How well do you shoot under pressure? You must traverse this space before the timer runs out. Shooting the targets will buy you extra time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidgoalreinf.value: These Grineer were likely looking for the same thing we are. Unfortunately, they came ill-prepared for the tower's defense network.
You are nearing the artifact. Expect heavy resistance.
The tower has corrupted every intruder that came before you. Keep fighting, the artifact is near.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobj00010l.value: This tower holds powerful knowledge from the Orokin age. I need you to locate the artifact stored here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobj00020l.value: Somewhere in this tower is Orokin technology so valuable, they hid it in The Void. I need you to find that technology.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobjcomple.value: We have what we came for, get to extraction.
Artifact acquired. Make your way to the extraction point.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobjfound0.value: There it is. Obtain the artifact.
Artifact found, acquire the Orokin technology and head to the rally point.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready35.value: Are you ready to take the rank up Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready36.value: You are ready to take the next Mastery test Tenno. I will await you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready37.value: The training simulation is prepared for your next Mastery test. I will challenge you, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready38.value: The next Mastery rank is within reach Tenno. Are you prepared?

/lotus/language/subtitles/draptorintro01.value: The Raptor is the most recent Corpus heavy weapon. You must destroy it before they can begin full scale production.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draptoroutro02.value: It's done. Thanks to you the Raptor won't be entering full production any time soon. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drathuum0650ke.value: That Executioner's a mean one, downright brutal. Makes me smile.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drathuum0660ke.value: Hear that, Executioners? They're cheering for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drathuum0661ke.value: What a performance. I can feel your hunger, like you want to rip that Contenders throat with your teeth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconextermco.value: I'm detecting no more Grineer in the area. When you are done searching for ingredients, get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconingredie.value: Good. That is one of the chemicals we are looking for. Find as many as you can and then head to the foundry to craft an anti-toxin.
Excellent find. See if you can locate any more samples. When you are done the anti-toxin can be produced in the foundry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobj010lo.value: You are here to find anything that can be used to neutralize the toxin. Take out any Grineer you encounter along the way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobj020lo.value: This is a recon mission. You are looking for key ingredients that can be used to build an antidote to the Grineer toxin. Destroy any resistance you encounter on your mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobj030lo.value: My research indicates everything we need to neutralize the toxin is located in this forest. Find the key ingredients and wipe out any resistance you see along the way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobjreinf.value: My scans indicate the chemical compounds we are looking for are in your vicinity. Use your scanner to locate them.
Your scanner should be able to reveal the chemical compounds we are looking for.
Keep searching. This forests holds the key ingredients we need to neutralize the Grineer toxin.
The vegatation in this forest grows too fast and too big for even the Grineer to cut down. Instead they have opted to poison the land. We must stop them.
Rather than trying to live within the forest, the Grineer have opted to destroy it. You must not let this happen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobjspott.value: See that? That's how the Grineer plan to inject the toxin into the biosphere. When we have the anti-toxin, that is where it goes.
Those Toxin injectors are how the Grineer plan on delivering their payload. That is what we are here to neutralize.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drescuechallen.value: Stay undetected while you melee strike all the orbs to free the prisoner. Once free, escort them to the safe zone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dresponsetobos.value: Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.
Time to shut you up for good.
Time to shut you up for good.
Time to shut you up for good.
Time to shut you up for good.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Fear will not control me.
Fear will not control me.
Fear will not control me.
Fear will not control me.
You are the mission, I will not falter.
You are the mission, I will not falter.
You are the mission, I will not falter.
You are the mission, I will not falter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dronesdetected.value: Warning. I have detected Drone robotics.
They're deploying Drone robotics. Be careful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsallpipesdes.value: All the pipes have been destroyed, the enemy has prevented the reactor from destroying itself. This mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsapproachrea.value: The reactor is a complex system, start by removing the coolant cells

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscapproachal.value: The enemy is on high alert, the moment you enter the holding area they'll trigger the execution sequence, rescue the hostage before it finishes.
The Tenno are here. Execute the hostage.
Tenno operatives have entered the cell block. Initiate execution sequence.
The Tenno have breached the holding cell. Discard the hostages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscapproachho.value: You are approaching the holding area. Careful, if the wardens detect you they will surely initiate the execution sequence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscexecutioni.value: Hurry up, you are running out of time.
The hostage is almost out of time. Hurry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostageexe.value: They killed the hostage. This mission is a failure.
You let the hostage die. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostagefre.value: I don't take orders from anybody.
I thought I was going to die in there. Thank you.
Thank the stars. Not a minute too soon.
I knew you would come, thank you.
I am in your debt Tenno. Lets go home.
I will not forget this, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostageple.value: Hurry up, I'm running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostagewea.value: I can fight too, if you give me a weapon.
Give me a weapon and I'll watch your back.
Got an extra weapon? They won't just let us walk out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfapproac.value: Beware, those lasers are linked to the poison tumor nodes growing on the air-locks. Contact with the lasers will put our operative in immediate peril..

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfexectio.value: The gas is killing our operative, they can't take much more. Hurry Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfgoalrei.value: The infestation has spread to this location faster than anyone predicted, everyone is gone, except our operative.
It is almost as if the Infestation has deliberately captured our operative. This sort of behavior is highly unusual
Our operative was able to survive by hiding in an air-lock. Unfortunately, they've now become trapped by the Infestation's growths.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfhostage.value: Our operative has succumbed to the gas toxin. This mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinflaserst.value: You set off a laser, the Infestation is responding by gassing our Operative. Get them out of there immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfmission.value: You're here to rescue an operative who has been trapped by the Infestation.
