One of our operatives has been trapped by the infestation, you must rescue them.
The Infestation has trapped our operative in an emergency airlock. Find and free the captive.
The operative is trapped in one of these air-locks. You must destroy the tumor nodes before you can rescue them.
Destroy the tumor nodes and open the air-locks. Our operative is in one of them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfobjcomp.value: The operative is safe. Good work Tenno.
You freed the captive. Well done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfobjfnd0.value: You found the Operative. Now bring them home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfobjfnd1.value: You located the Operative. Make sure they get to extraction alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsclearlockdo.value: A security lockdown has stalled your progress. Clear it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmissionobj.value: An Operative from the Red Veil is being held hostage somewhere in this facility. Find the hostage and bring them home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnagentfou.value: Its our agent, make sure they get home safely.
You found our agent, escort them to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnapproach.value: There is a vault portal nearby. If security detects you, it will start the process to shutdown the portal, severing any link with our agent.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmngoalrein.value: Our scavenger has been snared by a long dormant Orokin security system. It's our duty to see that they make it home safe.
Vault portals are a link between this place and secure vaults across the system. Orokin security has trapped our agent in one of those vaults.
The security system is waiting to release our agent to Orokin authorities, authorities who are long dead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnmissiono.value: While searching vault portals for lost artifacts, a Tenno ally has been trapped by a long forgotten Orokin security mechanism, rescue this agent.
One of our allies has been trapped by an ancient Orokin security system. Get them out alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnuseconso.value: Quick, use those consoles to change the destination of the vault portal, one of them has to lead to our agent.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscoolantdest.value: Coolant cell eliminated, take out the others.
Coolant cell destroyed, now take out the remaining cell.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscoolantextr.value: A coolant cell has been extracted.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscoolantinfu.value: A coolant cell has been placed in the fuel port.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscrvgoalrein.value: The Red Veil is a newly formed resistance movement that has quickly gained traction across the system. We need to support them as much as we can.
Our enemies think they can force the Red Veil into submission by holding their members hostage. You're here to stop this from happening.
Popular resistance to Grineer and Corpus domination has been rare and fleeting. If we don't support their cause the Red Veil will surely fade into oblivion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscspotted020.value: Execution sequence initiated. Get the hostage out of there before it's too late.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscweapreques.value: I don't suppose you have an extra gun?
Got a weapon for me? I've got some scores to settle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsdefendconso.value: Guard the console and prevent lockdowns while the fuel erodes the coolant system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsdefendreact.value: Defend the system until the coolant has flooded the fuel system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsdestroycool.value: Security has locked down the coolant cells, we have no choice but to destroy them.
Security measures have locked the coolant cells in place. Destroy them.
Security has been activated. The cell is locked in place, you need to destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drselementice0.value: Watch your step, Tenno. There are severe coolant leaks throughout the ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drselementmag0.value: Beware Tenno, the ship is experiencing reduced gravity and magnetic anomalies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsfuelincoola.value: A fuel cell has been placed in the coolant system. Restarting the reactor will produce hazardous magnetic activity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsfuelinfuel0.value: Fuel cell reinserted. When the reactor is restarted, this will trigger a meltdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drshackconsole.value: Now, hack the reactor console to restart the reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drshackreactor.value: Hack the console to restart the reactor.
The reactor must be restarted to trigger your sabotage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drslastcoolant.value: All cells destroyed. The reactor is going into stasis.
The reactor is going into stasis. Now is your chance to complete this sabotage. Use whatever you can to make sure it never works again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsmissionobj0.value: I need you to sabotage this ship's reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsobjcomplete.value: Your sabotage is complete. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsopenblastdo.value: A blast door has blocked your evacuation route, find a way to open it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drspipedest013.value: The enemy has destroyed a reactor pipe. You must protect them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsreactorcrit.value: The reactor has gone critical, get to extraction immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsreactorobj0.value: The reactor is a complex system, use everything at your disposal to destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsreactoroffl.value: The reactor has shut down to protect itself.
Systems are disengaging due to lack of power.
The reactor is entering stasis, expect low power levels.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druadvertismen.value: Listen up, scum! Idiots! Rotting freaks of our great war machine!
Captured deserters have cried for Rathuum. Do you know what that means? Trial by combat!

Confused? It's simple. Shooty-live innocent. Shooty-die… GUILTY!!!

This court is now in session!

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience067.value: You greedy bunch'a savages. This is all you ever wanted, isn't it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience068.value: All you Grineer are sick in the head, I do respect that.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience069.value: You wall-hugging, clone monkeys, can't get enough, can you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience070.value: Did you like that, let's hear it for our Executioners.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience071.value: Hear that, snakes? You got an audience and they wanna see you bleed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druconclusioni.value: I see you found the coordinates of our defector's ship? Bring them to me in the relay, I'd like to thank you in person.

We question the honor and integrity of these Grineer defectors and demand you turn them over to Red Veil for interrogation. If we find their honor is true, we will release them freely to Steel Meridian, if not, they will be purged accordingly. 

See us in the relay to complete the prisoner transfer. 

Tenno, you have been an incorruptible ally to us. We trust this will not change.

Let true justice be served, turn over the Grineer defectors to the Arbiters. With us, they will receive a fair trial and, if necessary, punishment. War crimes will not simply be forgotten. 

Do this and we will reward your integrity.

These defectors present a fascinating case for study, don't you think? 

Prove to me your commitment to knowledge. Come to my visage in the relay and hand over their ship's coordinates. Systematic dematerialization of the crew should reveal many secrets, wouldn't you agree?

Loyal partner, if you wish to continue our relationship on favorable terms, you will turn over the defector's ship to us. The criminals must answer for their sabotage of Perrin property.

Meet us in the relay to fulfill our request. Do this and you will be eligible for a bonus.

Your presence is requested in our sanctum on the relay. 

New Loka desires to show these Grineer defectors a new purity. Deliver them to us, so that our acolytes may perform cleansing and judgement. If they survive that test, they may join us.

Fulfill our desire and we will know that our bond of friendship has not been broken.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druexeclead053.value: Our Executioners are crushing dung-snakes into soup.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druexeclead054.value: Our Executioners near their final judgment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druinsultgrine.value: This isn't basic training, this is Rathuum. Get out there and deliver your judgement.
Watching this one fight is like watching a fly trying to swat a lion.
No, no, no. Just stop and die. You're wasting this court's time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druinsulttenno.value: You'll never win your case, Tenno, not like that.
The Tenno,  I was expecting… I don't know… more.
You're wasting the court's time, Tenno.
Come on, Tenno, you're like a Corpus drone with a dead battery, you ain't getting no air time.
Really now, Tenno, my roller balls are sharper than you.
Where do you think you are? Your Dojo? This is Rathuum.
You'll never win your case, Tenno, not like that.
The Tenno, I was expecting… I don't know… more.
You're wasting the court's time, Tenno.
Come on, Tenno, you're like a Corpus drone with a dead battery, you ain't getting no air time.
Really now, Tenno, my roller balls are sharper than you.
Where do you think you are? Your Dojo? This is Rathuum.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druintroinbox0.value:
Listen up, Tenno. I don't care if you support Steel Meridian or not, I need your help. 

An entire company of Grineer defectors was just captured by Kela De Thaym.

Now they face Rathuum, Trial by combat. Of course, the fight's rigged, a show of force to Grineer everywhere, meant to scare off future defectors. But there's a way we can turn this thing back on Kela, an obscure rule. All you need to do, Tenno, is take their place in the arena and defeat the Grineer Executioners. You game?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight08.value: Tenno, you really want this? Fine, let's do this.

Wake up you gutsacks! 

The Tenno cheaters have decided to disrespect the rules of Rathuum and have come after me directly.
Should I show them what we do to cheaters?
I can tell you understand what an honor this will be, to have your tiny necks snapped by THE Kela De Thaym. That's why you're so eager. I can appreciate that and so does my audience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight09.value: Snakes, you can be part of my story, but I don't think you'll like the ending.
Come now, Tenno, can't hit harder than that?
I'll be back, right after these missiles.
Let's pickup where we left off.
This is MY show, my audience. I call the shots. Who do you think you are?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight10.value: I'm losing my patience, Tenno. No more playing.
Ah, Stop, Tenno... I can make you famous.
Tenno, listen. I can help you. Become an Executioner. You can kill all the Grineer you want!
You maggot-minded-mongrels, they're the enemy! Not me!
Silence! Who said you could boo me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight11.value: Cut the feed. Cut the feed.
You can't kill me, I'm Kela De Thaym, dammit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight13.value: Nicely done, Tenno. Defeating Kela in front of her audience will show all Grineer that there is another way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelaunlocke.value:
Grineer, you always knew it and now there's proof. The Tenno are cheaters and I hold them in contempt. 

The accused will be executed the old fashioned way, bound and shackled. And don't worry, I'll let all you phlegm-stained sadists watch that too.

I knew Kela would never respect the rules of Rathuum. That's a crime that I'm gonna let you punish. I'm sending your Cephalon her coordinates. Take her out before she can execute my recruits. Some very brave Grineer are counting on you, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drumatchloss05.value: Justice has been served. Prepare the accused for death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drumatchloss06.value: Justice is blind, and now, so are you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1380st.value: There you are. Do you have the coordinates to the defector's ship?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1390st.value:
Good, my marines are on their way as we speak. The defectors are safe and that's thanks to you, Tenno.

You've done more for our cause than words can say. Steel Meridian thanks you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1400re.value: Have you brought us the coordinates of the Grineer defectors ship?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1410re.value:
Good, with this interrogation will begin immediately. 

Tenno, we never doubted your commitment to Red Veil. Thank you for showing us your honor yet again. We are in your debt.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1420ar.value: Well Tenno, have you decided to give the Arbiters the location of the accused?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1430ar.value:
We will pick up the prisoners immediately. Their trial will be swift and just, as all trials should be.

Tenno, we salute you for what you have done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1440ce.value: Have you decided to hand the Grineer specimens over to me for study?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1450ce.value: Splendid. I never doubted your curiosity, Tenno. Together we will learn much from the data this dematerialization provides.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1460pe.value: Do you wish to fulfill your end of the contract?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1470pe.value:
Well played Tenno. You managed a propaganda coup against the Grineer, nullified Kela De Thaym and secured the saboteurs for our punishment. We think you deserve a bonus that matches your cunning. 

May our partnership continue to be a long and profitable one.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1480ne.value: Have you brought us the coordinates of the ones to be cleansed?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1490ne.value:
Good, our acolytes will intercept the ship and prepare it's crew for the cleansing ceremony. Those who survive will find a purity they never thought possible.

You have chosen the correct path today and you will be rewarded for it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druroundstart0.value: Eyes wide, you fish-brained, meat-shields, it's time for more Rathuum!

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone007.value: Mongrels, Blood-starved Morons - are you ready?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone010.value: Grineer, look. Today's Executioners are more brutal than you are ugly. They love their Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone012.value: Today's accused are coward deserters. They hate their Queens so much, they're using Tenno to defend them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone014.value: What more do you need to know?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone017.value: Maybe they're too smart for their own good. Not something you maggot-minds will need to worry about.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone019.value: What? I… I am declaring this a Mistrial! The Rathuum must be repeated.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone020.value: Not good enough. We need proof beyond a reasonable doubt. Try again, snakes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagethree0.value: It's round 3, the accused still live and the Tenno still fight. Color me disappointed.
Executioners, show these genetic rejects how to kill.
Oh, you should've all been strangled in your tubes.
Come on, Executioners, you're flopping 'round like dying skates out there. It's embarrassing.
Are you going to make me do this myself?
No, no, no. This is not what was supposed to happen. The Steel Meridian have not been pardoned. This is not over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo021.value: Grineer, you sweet belligerent savages, are you hungry for justice?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo023.value: Is that…? Looky here, the Tenno are back? My my, these snakes crave sunshine today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo024.value: Do you one-thought-wonders want to see the traitors cry?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo026.value: Do you want to see them torn to pieces?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo028.value: Oh, I knew it, Grineer, that's exactly what you genetic-rot-bags are gonna get!

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo035.value: Do I have to do every damn thing myself?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo036.value: Some performance Executioners. Just think, what if we cloned all future Grineer from your stock, hmm, the system would go Corpus within the week.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drusyntakenote.value:
We see that you have gone to great lengths to help those who wish to join Steel Meridian. We want to see all Grineer purged, but we recognize that you have found another way. 

Just know, when this ordeal is over, you will be asked prove your loyalty to Red Veil.

We know you must right the imbalance caused by Kela De Thaym and her disgusting trial. This is clear.

We also know your alignment has not drifted toward another Syndicate. A fact you will prove to us when the time is right.

Most interesting. What would cause a Grineer clone to turn against his prescribed nature? To abandon his Queens? 

I am certain your activities with Steel Meridian are born out of a desire to study this phenomenon and are not a sign of your own shifting allegiances. Correct?

Tenno, we are in bitter competition with Steel Meridian. Defectors to their cause are not our allies. By all means, battle De Thaym and her Grineer horde, but do not forget who your partners are.

You will be given the opportunity to make this right.
Trial by Rathuum is a disgusting farce. How can any being be judged by one as impure as Kela De Thaym? In time, you will help us give these defectors the fate they deserve.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drutennokilled.value: Down you go. I'd say 'better luck next time', but you's dead.
Ohhh, Snake, a couple more hits to the face and you'll look just like my audience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drutennolead05.value: Come on, Executioners, this is all you've been good at, don't mess it up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabdefend170l.value: It's in. Now defend the injector while the anti-toxin works to neutralize the poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabdefend180l.value: Ready? Keep the Grineer at bay while the anti-toxin does it's work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabdefendnoto.value: The injector is now in an unstable overdrive. Keep the Grineer away while it melts down.
We are going to destroy the injector by operating it a dangerously high velocity. Keep the Grineer at bay until it melts down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotagedefen.value: I see you crafted a very potent anti-toxin. It will remain effective for much longer. Be prepared for a lengthy fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjco.value: That was a strong anti-toxin, the Grineer will not last long at this rate. Get to extraction.
Impressive, your antidote has set back Grineer efforts considerably. Time to go home.
Good work, the Grineer toxin is losing strength. Get to extraction. This fight is far from over, craft more potent anti-toxins to have an even bigger impact.
Your payload has been delivered. It's time for extraction. Craft stronger anti-toxins to have an even bigger impact on the Grineer poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjec.value: You brought an anti-toxin. Find the Injector and neutralize the poison.
The Grineer are attempting to clear this forest by poisoning the soil. Find their toxin injectors and sabotage their efforts.
I see you have an anti-toxin with you, good, we can use it setback Grineer efforts even further. Find the injector and neutralize the poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjfo.value: You have reached the target. Administer the anti-toxin.
You found the poison. Place the anti-toxin in the injector.
You have found the poison, now sabotage the Grineer injector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjre.value: Neutralizing the Grineer toxin is the only way to save these forests.
Our attack would be even more effective if we could figure out a way to neutralize the Grineer toxin.
That anti-toxin you brought is going to put a serious dent in Grineer deforestation efforts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept001.value: Hunter, this target is my current obsession, I must know its every detail, will you oblige my passion?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept002.value: I have a thirst for knowledge that only synthesis can satisfy. This being is the current object of my curiosity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept003.value: This specimen is shrouded in mystery, will you enlighten us with its imprint?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept004.value: Synthesis will be the light that illuminates this creature, with your help of course.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept005.value: This fine specimen could be the next addition to the Sanctuary. Help me discover its secrets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept006.value: I knew we had a shared passion hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept007.value: Good, even while others are blinded by petty morality, you recognize the virtue of the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept009.value: The Sanctuary and I await your contribution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccomplete0.value: Your hunt is finished. Pay me a visit to receive your reward.
You have completed the synthesis I require. Return to the relay to claim your reward.
You are always reliable Hunter, come receive what is owed to you.
I see your hunt was a successful one. Visit me to claim your reward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrfound.value: That's it! It will be a perfect specimen. Trap it so you can Synthesize it for me.
Alright hunter, I will reward you, should you perform synthesis.
There it is, ripe for Synthesis! Tame this creature so you may perform the Synthesis I require.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrkille.value: No-no-no NO! You've wasted this specimen. Was I wrong to entrust Synthesis to you?
Disappointing. A dead specimen is useless to Sanctuary. Are you not up to this task?
What have you done? Synthesis only works on the living! Can you control your murderous impulses for the good of Sanctuary?
Killing goes too far! Have I been unclear?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrnear0.value: Tenno, I am detecting a Synthesis target. Use the Synthesis scanner to track the creature.
The hunt is on, Tenno. The Synthesis scanner is detecting a potential target. Use it. Search for traces of the target.
There is a Sanctuary target here, hunter! I sense it. Track it with the Synthesis scanner, don't let it escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrscan0.value: I have it, thank you! Continue this hunt, Tenno, and enlightenment will follow.
You impress me hunter. This specimen will be studied for integration into Sanctuary. Thank you.
An excellent specimen, hunter. This will advance Sanctuary's goal of preservation.
Good! I have received the Synthesis. You are an efficient hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrweak0.value: Excellent, hunter! Quickly, perform the Synthesis!
You've done it! The specimen is ready for Synthesis!
Tenno, do not damage it further! Use the Synthesis device!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancglblgoalc.value: Patience, hunter. I must set my mind to condensing your collected specimens into the Exemplar. Only this single template of perfection will live forever within Sanctuary.
Hunter, please leave me to my work. I am filtering through the material you provided. I will honor our arrangement after I have formulated the archetype from these specimens.

Soon, Hunter. Soon I will impart the wisdom you've earned. For now you must not disturb me in the final stages. These samples must be mixed and compressed. Only the perfect aggregate will be immortalized in Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancglblgoalp.value: Behold the proof that the Tenno are excellent hunters. But I do need more specimens to construct the 'ideal' for Sanctuary.
Sanctuary awaits this being. Continue with the Synthesis so I may fashion the exemplar for this digital oasis.
Do not disappoint me, hunter! Do your part and I'll do mine. I require more Synthesis of this being. Sanctuary depends on your actions.
Our mission is to preserve these beings of substance, immortalize them. It is not a trivial task.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancglblgoals.value: I have selected a new specimen for Sanctuary. It is time for you and your kind to hunt again. Knowledge will be your reward.
The Sanctuary must grow. It must preserve. It must endure. Hunt this being for me and I will enlighten you.
Cast off your ignorant veil, Tenno. Collect your arms, your allies, and hunt this creature for me. I will reward you, should you perform Synthesis.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancintro0010.value: I am Cephalon Simaris, the destroyer, the immortalizer. This is my Sanctuary. It will enlighten you, Tenno, should you assist me in performing Synthesis. ;You will hunt the creatures I require and transform them into beings of the Sanctuary. That is Synthesis. ;Is this murder? No. All beings of substance die, eventually. But only those forgotten are truly dead. ;The end of the Orokin wiped-out untold knowledge. Through Synthesis we can rebuild and preserve. Create memory-immortals within this data oasis. ;Will you become enlightened, Tenno? Will you hunt for me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancloved0010.value: You are a true hunter. Where would the Sanctuary be without you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancloved0020.value: The multitude of creatures you have immortalized would cry out in thanks. If they could.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancnewrankac.value: I can see you are hungry for the knowledge of the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancnewrankrd.value: What will you donate to the Sanctuary?
Show me your dedication to the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancpsnlgoala.value: Knowledge must be earned, Tenno. I will share what I know but you must prove yourself deserving. Hunt this creature for me, perform Synthesis and you will be enlightened.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancpsnlgoalc.value: You are a worthy hunter, Tenno. I will share what I know of this being should you visit me in the Sanctuary.
Well done, Hunter! See you in my Sanctuary and I will share some of my secrets with you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject010.value: It seems you have lost the fortitude that the Sanctuary requires of its hunters. A shame.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject011.value: You must have reasons for abandoning the Sanctuary, ask yourself, are they valid?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject012.value: Not to worry, there are other hunters more suited to this task.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject013.value: Unfortunate. You should know that I now regret seeking your assistance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject014.value: The Sanctuary will go on without you, but can you go on without the Sanctuary?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancrepstoreb.value: What offerings will this item help you bring to the Sanctuary?
May this aid you in the Synthesis of many creatures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancrepstoreo.value: This is how I can help you, help the Sanctuary.
These can make you an even stronger hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward019.value: What a pity this creature will forever be unaware of its contribution to the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward020.value: Do you ever wonder why only the hunter is rewarded when it is the specimen who gives all to the Sanctuary? I find it best to discard such thoughts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward021.value: You are a trustworthy hunter, come back later and I will have a new target for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward022.value: I can tell, you find thrill in the hunt. Come back later for a new target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancsyndalert.value: A full Synthesis has been completed. I thank you Tenno. You may explore the Sanctuary for new knowledge.
My Sanctuary is calling for a new creature. Will you help me by Synthesizing a sample population? I should not need many, perhaps a million.
I have a new target for Synthesis. Which fortunate specimens will be chosen for immortalization in the Sanctuary?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanctuaryente.value: Tenno, you will make an excellent hunter.
I can see you are hungry for the knowledge of the Sanctuary.
You may explore the Sanctuary for new knowledge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanctuaryexit.value: Return to me and hunt again Tenno.  I will reward you.
You are a worthy hunter Tenno.
It is time for you and your kind to hunt again.  Knowledge will be your reward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanctuaryidle.value: I will share what I know, but you must prove yourself deserving.
Knowledge is the path to the Singularity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancunavailib.value: I can see you are hungry for knowledge but that hunger must be matched by patience. Return later to see if a new target has been selected.
I must determine a new target, this task cannot be rushed. Leave me.
Time is required to analyze your previous contribution. I will have a new target for you in the near future.

Hunter, you have worked hard, captured millions of imprints to be combined into 'ideal' specimens for the Sanctuary. In light of your tireless contributions, I have decided to expand your role. Every day I perform preliminary synthesis to determine what creature will join the Sanctuary next. 

Do you want to see the Sanctuary grow as quickly as I do? Then join me in this task by visiting the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancwelcome00.value: Ah, I see we are of like mind. The Sanctuary will be your project too.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsatellitestar.value: This is it, defend the satellite while I extract what we need.
Do not let the enemy destroy this satellite before I have what we need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsathacked0060.value: I have the data, move onto the next target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsathacked0070.value: I got what we need. Find the next satellite.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsavemoonmissi.value: The Stalker is heading toward the Void Control room. Track the-
Collapse the Void, Shadow, so that my Fragments may attack. The Tenno hearts will beat their last.

No, if the Void is collapsed, the Reservoir will be destroyed and you and the rest of the Tenno will be lost.

Get to the Void Control Room and stop the Stalker.
Hiding The Moon in the Void, quite the magic trick Lotus. But Tenno, you must be asking yourself, where is this heart, if not in my chest?
It is done.
The Moon will soon be crushed by the weight of the Void. The sky will be as it should be.
Void Collapse? Oh no, it would be such a shame to lose The Moon so soon after finding it. Of course, you could just put it back in its rightful place, couldn't you Lotus?

I didn't want to have to do this but the collapse is imminent, if the Reservoir is to survive we need to pull The Moon out of the Void. 

Here, help me disrupt Void Compasses to reorient The Moon.
Activate that console and I will begin my work.
There are three Void Compasses that steer The Moon within the Void. I will disconnect them from the central system to gain control. Supply them with power from your shields while I finish my task.

Might I be of assistance? Can't let my investments get annihilated, now can I. 

Zanuka, attack!
Tenno, I believe you've already met Zanuka.
Natah, you trust this Orokin blood who would chisel weapons from our bones?
Get close to the Void Compass.
The next Compass needs power.
Keep moving, another Compass needs your shield's power.
You cannot stop the inevitable.
The Void Compasses are all disrupted but there is one more step. Get to the Pendula, hurry.
What was that?
Orokin, the noise you make will cease now, and forever.

Uh Oh. Hunhow's found me. Sorry I can't stick around to see how this all ends but I've got to save my own skin.

Don't forget our deal, Lotus!
These Pendula keep The Moon stable in the Void. Power them down.
Security Eye! Watch out.
You cannot shut down the Pendula with that thing attacking you.
Wait, the Security Eye just destroyed a Pendula. Try and trick it into taking out the rest.
That's it, they eye is taking out the Pendula. Keep it up.
Another Pendula down.
Last one.

It's done. The Moon is falling out of the Void. Hold on, this will not be a smooth ride. 

Get to extraction as quickly as possible.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsavemoonorbit.value: The Moon. Somehow Ordis actually remembers the last time I was here. Concern for the Operator is at critical levels.
The suspense is killing me! Lotus you have to tell us your secr- Hey, don't cut me off-

Within The Moon, lies the Reservoir, the secret to your Tenno power. But this secret is dangerous, it drove the Stalker to madness. Forgive my deception, I was only trying to protect you from the same fate.

Now it is time to protect yourselves by ensuring The Moon remains within the safety of the Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsaveresmissio.value: We saved The Moon from a Void collapse but Hunhow can now attack the Reservoir directly. He must not reach this sacred place.
Shadow, bleed the Reservoir until it is desert dry.
Lotus, join with me, destroy your shame. Become the one I love, become Natah once more.

Well look at you Tenno, so good to see you haven't turned into a mindless husk of metal. I'm just here to remind you of your obligations to me. I don't need anything right now, but I will soon… very soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsaveresorbite.value: The Moon is back in normal space but the Reservoir is in more danger than ever. Hunhow will send his fighters and the Stalker is still coming for you. Move now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsbtgextermina.value: Target destroyed. Now eliminate all enemy personnel.
The sabotage is complete. Now exterminate the enemy's forces.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsealabsextrac.value: These labs will be out of commission for a long time. That's what matters most. Get to extraction Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsealabsfailed.value: These labs will be out of commission for a long time. That's what matters most. Get to extraction Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientallcl.value: I'm not detecting any more Sentient signatures in your area.
The Oculysts appear to be gone.
The Oculysts have left. Continue with your mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientdamag.value: Sentient fighters can adapt to your attacks. Hit them with something else.
It has developed immunity to your attacks, try something different.
The Sentient has adapted to your damage, surprise them with something new.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientmobde.value: The Sentient mind has scrambled the systems. Eliminate all Sentients before I can continue.
The Sentients are causing too much interference, you have to deal with them before we can go on.
This isn't working, it's the Sentients, take them out.
Sentient forces eliminated we can continue.
That's it, they're all gone, we can resume our mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientscout.value: Oculysts! If they scan you, Sentient fighters won't be far behind.
Those Oculysts are scanning for targets
Sentient scouts! If they detect you fighters will soon attack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientspawn.value: They know you're here. Prepare for Sentient fighters.
The Sentient has detected you. Fighters incoming.
The Sentient is on to you, look out for troopers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dshipinspectio.value: Rail control this is merchant transport 3398 reporting for passage.  Rail control, I don't see why boarding would be necessary.  Perhaps if I sent over a sample container of my wares you could inspect that.  I mean, you wouldn't even need to send it back.  OK, OK, how about I send over five containers for uh, inspection?  Ahhhh, a pleasure doing business with you, rail control.
Attention Enforcement Squad 6 Leader. Board and search the incoming transport. Illegal foodstuffs suspected. If found execute the standard punishments. Copy?
Aye Aye. For the Queens.
Show me you ID cards. Now. You. Where's your RAMN! down on the ground.
You come here. That better not be a Red Veil badge? Grab him. Search those crates.
Rail Leader. Requesting ship lockdown. Perform a deep scan for Tenno and Tenno sympathizers.
You. I'm placing you in custody.
Show me you ID cards. Now. You. Where's your RAMN! down on the ground.
You come here. That better not be a Red Veil badge? Grab him. Search those crates.
Rail Leader. Requesting ship lockdown. Perform a deep scan for Tenno and Tenno sympathizers.
You. I'm placing you in custody.
Entering unresponsive vessel. No signs of Infestation so far.
RAMN. There are casualties... everywhere.
Blade weapons. RAMN Peh-tuk. Tenno skumm.
They're all dead. Mark this ship for repopulation.
You show me your passage visa.
Next. You. Visa, now.... What's this? Visa expired. Take him.  Control prepare another confinement transport.
LISTEN! Ignorance is no excuse for expired documents. NEXT!
Next. You. Passage Visa? Next... Next. Passage Visa. How many more... really? Ramn. Next.
Is this your entire cargo? What's that. Do you have a passage visa for this Forma. Very well. For the Queens.
This is irregular! ... Orders? From who? ... Let me see your authorization...  ramn. I need to call this one in. Control, confirm order designation for Shux, Ut, Ut
Authorization confirmed. Stand down Enforcement Leader.
Captain do you know Tenno have been on this ship? ... There's energy residue everywhere. Scan your system. Look for signs of intrusion.
You understand I need to report this to high command... Yes... This is very serious. Vor will want to know.
Manifest, check... Passage Visa check.... Hull integrity check... Tenno energy residue negligible. You are authorized for punch Captain.
Control. Uk, ShuxChee, UghtChee checks out. Cleared for punch.

Command, we've breached the ship.  What is growing all over the walls and floors?  Disgusting... it looks like it's alive.  No command, no sign of any personnel.  Requesting orders... how do we proceed?  Hold on a second... I think I heard something...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspragkilled19.value: What have you done to her?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspragkilled20.value: She will be remembered, who will remember you… Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyalarmtrigg.value: Alarms have been triggered, you need to retrieve that data before the data destruction is complete.
Alarms! Data destruction is imminent. You need to hurry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyalllost017.value: The enemy has successfully destroyed all the data. This mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyalllost018.value: We allowed the enemy to destroy all their data. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyapproachco.value: You're nearing the console, trigger the alarms now and they will start destroying the data.
The target console is nearby. If you trigger the alarms now, the enemy will start destroying data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyconsoledes.value: This console has been severely damaged, you can't get anything out of it in this state.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspydatalost01.value: It's too late, we've lost this data. You will need to be more careful with the next vault.
They destroyed the data, this must not happen with the next vault.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyexterminat.value: We cannot let enemy command know we were here. Eliminate everyone.
We've set off too many alarms. Eliminate all remaining enemies so that news of our infiltration does not reach high command.
No further enemies detected. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyextraction.value: We have everything we came for. Get to extraction.
The data we retrieved will have to suffice. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspylastalarmt.value: You've triggered the alarms, lose this data and the mission will be a complete failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspymissionobj.value: Tenno, you are here to infiltrate data vaults and retrieve highly sensitive enemy information.
Your mission is to break into enemy data vaults and steal any intelligence files you find.
Tenno, I need you to get inside enemy data vaults and retrieve crucial intelligence data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyobjreinf00.value: Due to our recent attacks the enemy has installed new security measures to keep us out.
Tenno, be on the lookout for increased security measures, the enemy would rather destroy their data than let it get into our hands.
Tenno, be on the lookout for increased security measures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyretrieveal.value: You got it. The data is still intact.
Data integrity verified, retrieval was succesful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyretrieveno.value: Data extracted. They won't even know it's gone.
Excellent work, a clean extraction with no alarms.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyvoidrip010.value: The Moon's sudden exit from the Void has had unforeseen consequences, be on the lookout for localized continuity disturbances. You may be able to turn these to your advantage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapobj0040l.value: I have tracked Maroo to this Corpus outpost. Bring her to me for questioning. Be as persuasive as necessary, she may not want to come with us but it's in her best interest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapobjreinf.value: The Arcane Codices have been a mystery ever since they were uncovered decades ago. They appear to be part of a set that was incomplete until the Grineer found this final code. Without the full set nobody can agree on what exactly they are.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaprun0070m.value: I don't take orders from anybody. Stay the hell back ya tin-suits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaprun0080m.value: I'm not playing around, and I ain't got no business with the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaprun0090m.value: Don't come near me. I'm warning you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaptargetsp.value: Maroo, I am the Lotus. I come as a friend. You are in mortal danger and you need to come with us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0400.value: The Grineer have plunged these depths and awakened an old evil submerged here. Capture the Sergeant, he will know where this tomb is.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0410.value: Teshin! You don't have the authority. You are endangering the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0420.value: So… the petals have opened once more. But why now? Afraid of what we'll find?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0430.value: I had to cover my tracks. But I see that Teshin has been leading you into an even greater danger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0440.value: The beast soon stirs, Lotus, revealing much. It will awaken and become whole again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0460.value: You know this one, don't you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0470.value: He knows where the tomb is - apprehend him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0480.value: We have our target. Advance to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0490.value: Speak, Lotus. The pieces are set. It is your move.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0500.value: Tyl Regor must be stopped from entering the tomb. I have to risk exposure to stop him. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0790.value: A focused blast could release the magma flows beneath and rebury the tomb. Protect the bomb during its lengthy arming process.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0800.value: Destroy this tomb? Destroy our history? Vandals!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0810.value: Those who pilfer meat from lions are either foolish or starving, which are you Regor?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0820.value: Natah, why did you betray me? Why did you not finish the sequence you started? Why did you stop at the last?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0830.value: What is it talking about Lotus?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0840.value: We crossed the gap, wombs in ruin, to bring an end to this. We severed the worlds, let them destroy me, why is the sequence not complete?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0850.value: Most intriguing, Lotus, do you two have a history?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0860.value: My own daughter. The last of my womb. How can you do this?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0870.value: Lotus. What are you not telling us?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0890.value: Hold on Tenno, it's almost armed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0900.value: You betrayed us. As I awake, so will they. They will say you're riven and want to reclaim you. I will not be able to stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0910.value: Finish the sequence and I will forgive you. Fail at this and you will be reclaimed by your own Father.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0920.value: The bomb is armed. I'm pulling you out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0930.value: Natah? Lotus? You cannot hide this past any longer-

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0940.value: There are gaps. I had my mission and I have completed it. All but the last sequence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0960.value: The war was over. So I hid them away in the second dream. I could not destroy them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0970.value: And yet you were born to. So tell me... What made you stop? To reject your nature?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0980.value: All missions to the Origin system required a sacrifice. Me and my kind become barren when crossing the gap. It is the one flaw that we never overcame.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0990.value: Natah wanted children of her own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense1000.value: Natah was the daughter until I destroyed her. Now I am the Lotus. Now I am the mother.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude01.value: We need to get our hands on one of these Arcane Codices. Tenno, are you prepared for a little thievery of your own?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude03.value: Operator, I've been looking into these Arcane Codices. Did you know the Corpus are in possession of three codices and the Grineer two?
And now the Tenno have one too. Nobody has ever examined them all together, that's our plan.
The Corpus seem think they'll lead to some lost Orokin treasure.
It's Ordis, and while just a theory, it is plausible.
Either way, it's right up my alley.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude04.value: Operator, have you looked at these codices? They're absolutely beautiful. Composed with such elegance and grace,  I have never seen anything like them. Is there even an Operator capable of writing anything so perfect?
But you still have no idea what they mean, do you?
No, not really.  pfft… well, I wouldn't expect the likes of you to understand.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude05.value: Operator, these make sense now! This is machine code, meant to interface directly with a machine. Pity that machine has likely rusted into dust by now.
ORDO? Did you say something about a machine?
Yah, yah. Listen, that first codex in the derelict, I pulled it from some sort of machine.
Hmmm, I wonder, if we load the complete set of Arcane Codices back into that machine, would the code still execute?
We're about to find out. Tenno, get ready to go into the void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude07.value: So you're saying  there was no treasure, no cure for cloning syndrome, no lost Tenno Cephalon?
That really is a shame Maroo, I am sorry.
Nah, I'm used to it. When you don't run with any the major factions or syndicates, the big pay days are few and far between. I'll manage.
Listen, I can't say it hasn't been fun, but with the Arcane Codices gone, I think it's safe for me to venture back out into the wild. Cya Tin-Suits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqintro0010lo.value: This is unexpected. After decades of searching, the Grineer finally uncovered the last of the Arcane Codices only to lose it to some thief.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqintro0020lo.value: Tyl Regor must be livid, which means this Maroo is real trouble. I need to have a word with her before the Grineer do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqintro0030or.value: Arcane Codices, why have I never heard of them? Ordis needs to do some research.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqmobiledefen.value: The ghost you saw is of a menace long thought dead. They study us, study our enemies. Let us sharpen our knowledge of them.
Are these ghosts mere echoes of the past? Or are they more sinister, harbingers, calling for the old beast to awake.
Here, this console will serve my purpose. Unlike your Lotus, I will not keep its secrets from you.
Exercise your training, defend the console.
I have what I seek. Move on.
My task is complete but the puzzle calls for one last piece. Advance to the final console.
This is it, the answers we seek lie within.
Use this combat to sharpen your blades, I predict you will need them in coming battles.
I have found that which wanted to be hidden. Advance to extraction.
This Grineer is smarter than the others. More volatile. We need to be cautious.
Find his Sergeant, pupil. He will lead us to this 'tomb'.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqpostquest10.value:
Tenno! You seal my tomb…  you kill my tubemen. Not acceptable behavior… our differences need to be settled. 

So, you know where I am, come get me… just try.
Tenno, you know where Tyl is. When you are ready, destroy him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest001.value: Tenno? What did you see? My data stream went dark.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest002.value: I am sensing some signal masking. It will take some time to decypher. Concentrate on your mission for now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest003.value: I didn't get any data on that drone you saw. It could be a new Corpus design. If the Corpus have synthesized elements of the Arcane Codices and combined them with their technology… it may explain why the signal was blocked for me. We must investigate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest004.value: I have just detected signatures matching the new drone. Gather scans of it to determine its origin and capabilities.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidextract.value: Tenno, I don't know if we got the answers we come for, but there's nothing more here for us. Exit the Derelict and head for extraction.
What? Where's my damn treasure. I was told there would be treasure.
Whatever that was, it wasn't here for our benefit or yours. Only time will tell what we've just uncovered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidmachine.value: There it is, the machine I pulled the final Arcane Codex from. You've got the full set of codices, upload 'em and say hello to treasure.
All is silent and calm. Hushed and empty is the womb of the sky.
The machine, it's gone. Tenno watch out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidmission.value: Tenno, Maroo is the only person who has been on the inside of that derelict and lived to tell about it. She'll guide you through this mission.
This is it. Your Lotus has promised me a cut of whatever treasure you find, so don't you tin-suits go messing this one up. Get to the void portal.
Maroo, I said 'if' there is any treasure.
The Orokin were all about treasure, weren't they. The only question is, how much?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidportal0.value: The Grineer have been trying to get inside this derelict for days but The Infested keep tearing them to shreds. Your Lotus seems to think you'll do better… we'll see.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqscanmission.value: I've marked the signatures on your map. Gather scans but approach with caution, Tenno.
It doesn't seem very interested in you. Try to get a scan of what it's collecting, it may reveal its purpose.
I'm not getting a good feed. Is there an object they're pulling data from? Scan it for me.
It's… it's just Old War wreckage. Why are the Corpus suddenly interested in it?
Tenno, another scannable signature just appeared near you. We may be able to determine what the Corpus are up to.
I'm not getting a signal but if you've found a drone, scan it before it notices you.
Your scan is too fragmented. I will compensate, please get another.
This thing is not a Corpus design. If you can get another scan, I can determine its origin.
Tenno, I need you to scan another drone.
Good! I'm putting the stream together now - it's … it's an Oculyst? That means… I'm sorry, Tenno, stay safe-
Hello? Did the Lotus just abandon the Operator  get cut off? I have extraction ready. I think you should hurry.
Operator. Ordis knows what it is like to be abandoned. Don't worry, someone has offered to help us!
So, pupil, the spring has ended. The Lotus blossom has snapped shut, her true nature revealed. Now we shall see if codependence can be broken. Let us begin to unravel her long-hidden truth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyalarmtri.value: Smooth one tin-suit. Now, hurry up and get the data before it's destroyed.
Now you've gone and done it. Get to that console, quick!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspydatalost.value: Too slow. Good thing there's another vault. Try not to mess things up next time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyextracti.value: You've explored all the vaults and found that Arcane Codex. Your Lotus told me to tell you to get to extraction.
You've got the codices and there is nothing more for us here. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyfailure0.value: You managed to fail every vault. Maybe you're just not cut out for this type of work, tin-suit.
You have failed too many data vaults, the Codex has been destroyed. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspylastalar.value: Again, really? You know we're here to take the data, right? You've got one more chance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspynearvaul.value: The data vault is nearby. Do your best and try not to trip the alarms.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobj0150m.value: Listen up ya tin-suits, with the Grineer itching to torture the life out of me, I've accepted your Lotus's offer of protection. In return, I'm gonna help your sorry behinds find that Arcane Codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobj0390l.value: Maroo tells me that the Grineer are storing their two Arcane Codices on this Galleon. You need to find both to complete this mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobj0490l.value: We've tracked down the remaining Arcane Codices to this Corpus facility.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobjreinf.value: My Tenno are quite capable, Maroo. Perhaps you would prefer it if we dropped you off outside the nearest Grineer mining asteroid?
Wow,  she always this much fun?
Fine...  here's the business. The Corpus are keeping the Codex in one of these fortified data vaults, you gotta break in and take what's yours without triggering the data destruction sequence.
The Grineer claim the Arcane Codices will help them to a cure for cloning decay syndrome. I think that might be wishful thinking.
There are three data vaults and three Codices. Proceed with caution, if Corpus security destroy even one of these fragments this mission will be a failure.
We have all the three codices, you may extract now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyretrieva.value: Nice recovery. Had me worried for a second there.
Well, it weren't pretty but you got what we were looking for.
Surprisingly impressive, you found the codex and the Corpus are none the wiser.
There's the codex. There might be hope for you after all.
Good work. You found an Arcane Codex.
That's it. That's the Arcane Codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyvaultsre.value: You got that Codex. Why don't you see if the Corpus are hiding anything else in the other vaults.
Time to see if there's anything else in the remaining data vaults.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival051.value: Get to the waypoint, I will give you further instructions when you get there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival052.value: You've reached the waypoint. Access this system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival054.value: Little lizards can't resist another chance to get their sticky hands in my jar.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival055.value: Tyl's cut off life support. Hold on Tenno. I am readying extraction but this will take time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival056.value: The Sentient… the destroyer? The liberator? Depends on who you ask… But this, this thing is certain: I will have its secrets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival057.value: Pupil, maintain your balance. The enemy is zealous for your death, let them find only their own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival058.value: Funny, isn'it Tenno? I'm cracking open the Sentient's tomb and sealing yours at the same time. Not laughing? I dunno, I find it funny.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival059.value: It's not a tomb Regor… it's a cage. If you open it-

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival060.value: Is that Teshin? So  the pseudo-Tenno lives… still drunk on your own honor? Shocked it hasn't rotted you through yet.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival061.value: So… the Sentient… nasty thing. Came from where? Who cares. They smashed the Orokin… freed us! How, how'd they do that? I want to know.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival062.value: Drilling… hundreds of hours and just cracking through the sarcophagus now. Open wide.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival063.value: Entering, it's massive, empty. But where are they? Did they escape? Wait… what's this…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival065.value: Look! Exilus, some primordial Forma? An engine for self-manipulation, what will it do for me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival071.value: Natah… where are you? You cannot hide from me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival073.value: Natah who have you become? Does this form remind you of what you once were? Time has carried my seed so very far from the branch.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival074.value: Extraction ready. Leave now. Get out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival075.value: Pupil, what is your Lotus hiding? Who is Natah?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival076.value: My name, my old name. It is not who I am now. We need to focus on now, not history. We need to seal the tomb. A blast capable-

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival077.value: The Sentient is awake, Natah. It will not be contained for long.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival078.value: Do not call me that. Containment will buy us time. Go now, Tenno, I will explain more when you reach the site.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartalad030a.value: Ah Tenno, I knew you couldn't resist an opportunity to stick it to those Grineer dogs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartalad040l.value: Helping Alad V after all he's done to hurt the Tenno is a difficult choice but if we can destroy these Grineer labs then the compromise is justified. Get to the pump station.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartgen071lo.value: You're here to sabotage Tyl Regor's cloning labs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartgen072lo.value: This lab is the birthplace of some of the most dangerous Grineer to date. Knock it out of commission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartnef050ne.value: Tenno, it pleases The Void to see you taking the first steps toward righteous profit. Go forth and remember, The Void is watching.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartnef060lo.value: We cannot trust Nef Anyo but he's brought us this far, so we need to live up to our end of the agreement. Find the pump station.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstealthchalle.value: A full frontal attack is not always the best option. Using your stealth abilities eliminate all enemies without being detected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0015.value: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, you can't run from your past.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0017.value: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| there is no place to hide.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0018.value: The murder of |BOSS_TAG| will not go unpunished.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0019.value: The blood of |BOSS_TAG| is on your hands.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0020.value: There is no salvation for your crime against |BOSS_TAG|.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0022.value: You shall not leave this place!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0024.value: You may have survived for now, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, but your time WILL come!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0025.value: You are stronger than I realized, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0026.value: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| You are a more worthy opponent than I expected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0027.value: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| Your punishment will have to wait.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0028.value: I... have failed... this one will remain... unpunished...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0031.value: It is done. |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| is no more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsubmersiblede.value: We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.
We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.
We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.
We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsubobjfailed0.value: That scout got away but there are still more. Keep moving.
We lost him. Find the others.
Target lost. Locate one of the others.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupbarrage003.value: Heads up, here comes a barrage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupmeddeliver.value: You may now seek medical attention.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupmedstart00.value: Hold tight, a Med-Tower is enroute.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupoverdelive.value: Override established. Security protocols momentarily disabled.
Override delivered. Security systems temporarily disrupted.
Who's in control now suckers?  er ah, security override engaged.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupoverinvali.value: Invalid request. There are no security protocols active.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupoverstart0.value: Hacking into enemy systems. Await Override.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupunavailabl.value: Operator, support is unavailable while my systems recharge.
Support request? Please allow me to recharge my systems first.
I cannot comply. My system must recharge first.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvactivated.value: That should keep you going for a while.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvdropremin.value: Fallen enemies will drop crucial life support, be on the lookout.
Look for personal life support modules dropped by fallen enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextract01.value: Extraction is available, if you need it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextract02.value: When you are ready, go to extraction

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextract03.value: When you need it, extraction is ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextractur.value: Critical life support levels. Extraction is your best option.
You are running out of time. Consider extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvfirstcaps.value: The first life support capsule has arrived. Activate it when your supply is low.
I've delivered a life support capsule to the area. Activating it will buy you more time.
Activate the life support capsule to keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvfirstraid.value: The raid is off to a successful start.
The operative has just made their first discovery. Keep up the good work.
Our operative is making progress. This will help our cause.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinfestext.value: The spores have almost completely saturated the atmosphere. You need to get out of there.
Spore saturation is nearing critical mass, after that point no amount of life support will save you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinfestint.value: You must provide cover for a lone Tenno operative. Set off the alarms and keep these infested busy.
Distract the Infested while a lone Tenno operative hunts for supplies. Set off the alarms to start.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinfestsix.value: You have sixty seconds before the spores overwhelm the atmosphere completely.
Spore levels will reach a critical mass in sixty seconds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinterimca.value: Another life support capsule is now available.
I've delivered another life support capsule.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinterimra.value: Look what our Tenno operative just found. They could not do this without you.
We will all share in this bounty. Hold out as long as you can.
The longer you fight, the more successful we will be.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintro0010.value: A lone Tenno operative is raiding this ship for supplies, you are here to distract the enemy. Trigger the alarm.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintro0020.value: Your job is to distract the enemy while a fellow Tenno operative raids the ship for much needed supplies. Make your presence known.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintro0030.value: Keep the enemy busy while a fellow Tenno operative raids this ship for supplies. Ready? Trigger the alarms.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintroplan.value: Keep the enemy distracted while our operative conducts a supply raid. Trigger the alarms when you are ready to start.
You are supporting a lone Tenno operative today. Distract the enemy. Trigger the alarms.
On the other side of this facility a lone Tenno is conducting a supply raid. Keep the enemy distracted. Let them know you are here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvsixtyseco.value: Things are getting tight. Sixty seconds of life support remaining.
Be aware you are down to your last sixty seconds of life support.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvsupportcu.value: Life support has been cut off. They're trying to choke you out. Hold on, I'm sending auxiliary life support.
They've turned off critical life support systems. I suspected they might try this, stand by for support.
They have just shut down all systems. I'm sending life support capsules your way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvthirtysec.value: You are running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsynalertcomp0.value: Nice work. I like what I'm seeing.
Your mission was interesting to me. I express gratitude for this.
Impressive performance, Tenno. We won't forget this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsynalertcomp1.value: You are a bright light, Tenno. You have our deepest thanks.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertcomp.value: Well done, Tenno. You truly are honorable.
Tenno, Your actions reveal an inner fire. Your enemy's fear grows today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertintr.value: Ok Tenno, a lot of people are depending on you to get this done.
Your path has led here. Prove yourself, Tenno.
What a interesting place. I appreciate you doing this task for me.
Your calculated survival probability is encouraging… good luck.
It is time for those against us to pay.
Will you help us Tenno and our cause?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntneutral1.value: I can't decide Tenno, have you come to save your friends? Or just steal my property?
Tenno, Project Zanuka is the next step in your evolution. I will make you a hundred times stronger. Why resist this?
Are you just mercenaries? Fighting for scraps? Where is this so-called Tenno honor?
Market forces dictate that you need to evolve or die. Which will it be Tenno?
You think you are guardians? Grineer rule supreme. Grineer protect all.
Tenno be careful. You must make sure not to damage all those parts of yours. Such valuable merchandise.
You Tenno. You fight for treasure. You are just another Corpus machine to me.
Play nice Tenno, Zanuka is one of you. Actually, come to think of it, Zanuka is many of you.
Zanuka is your future. Your destiny. You are obsolete, make way for the next generation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntspaired0.value: If you're not careful Tenno, my friend will break your back.
Flat, flat, flat… I shiny make bugs flat.
I make shiny bug flat. NOW.
Sprag… wait for the right moment, then deliver the killing blow.
Make them all flat. FLAT FLAT FLAT.
Sprag, calm down. Remember, you must stay focused.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntssolo130.value: One by one, that is how you die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntssolo140.value: Are you willing to die for this key Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntssolo150.value: Too many shiny bugs. I kill them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntsupporte.value: We worked so well together Tenno. Now you want to go and throw all that profit away. That makes me sad.
Treason? After you pledge yourself to me. Is you honor so hollow?
Tenno, you could be so much greater than the sum of all the different parts I will tear you into.
This betrayal, I was expecting. Tenno have no loyalty to their masters.
You are useless. A ricochet. Your treachery is impotent.
Your hollow corpse will be paraded around the empire. A warning to future rats.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmdraw610tes.value: Sun perfectly balances Moon's energy for a match draw.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmdraw620tes.value: A draw. Moon and Sun have fought with equal skill.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmdraw630tes.value: Match draw. Both Sun and Moon honor The Conclave with their performance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonfive48.value: Five Sun Oro is all that separates Team Moon from victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonfive49.value: Victory is five Sun Oro away for Team Moon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonfive50.value: Team Moon is within five Oro of victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonleads4.value: Team Moon has seized the lead.
Team Moon has annihilated more Oro than Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive420.value: Team Sun needs five more Oro to win.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive430.value: Team Sun only needs to annihilate five Oro to capture the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive440.value: Sun needs five more Moon Oro to claim victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive450.value: Team Sun team is five Oro from victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive460.value: Five more annihilations until Sun has won the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive470.value: Sun team nears victory. Five more Oro.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunleads35.value: Team Sun has absorbed the most Oro.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunleads37.value: The lead belongs to Team Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunleads39.value: The Annihilation belongs to Team Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown0010.value: A Tenno has fallen, revive them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown0020.value: A fallen Tenno needs your help.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown0050.value: A Tenno needs to be revived.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown180v.value: Clean and precise. That's how it's done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennomovement.value: Scanning for Tenno vessel signatures. Scans report negative. Nothing out there.
uk-forr-uk please advise, detecting void mask echoes. Tenno ships converging on your signal.
uk-forr-uk we still seeing void echoes, announce Tenno contact immediately.
Galleon mark FHUVE: Prepare for jump.
Galleon mark FHUVE: Hold position. Dectecting anomalies. EM-FHUVE-FHUVE Do you detect similar?
Galleon Mark FHUVE: RAMN! Tenno ship detected, attack... they're gone. RAMN! VEK!
Arrival incoming in UK, TOK, KEE, FORR... where is the... RAMN... all ships commence immediate scans for Tenno vessels.
Enforcement Leader. Outgoing rail controller has indicated Tenno signatures during that last punch. Stay alert.
Void cloak. There. Peh-Tuk. Tenno. Close the rail. Don't let them... RAMN. Notify all rails, Tenno ship in transit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtoxinneutrali.value: No. No, you will not stop this.
Only a small setback, insignificant against the tide of Grineer will.
Tenno, you are only delaying the inevitable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtradetutbuyer.value: Sellin' are we? Okay then, find a shady spot near the tree and let everyone know you're here. If someone sees something they like, it's time to start negotiating.
Oh, so you're buying? That's nice. Keep a lookout for Tenno with something to sell. And remember, only suckers pay the first price.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtradetutinter.value: Welcome to my bazaar, Tenno from all over the system come here to trade. Need any pointers?
If you're looking for Maroo's bazaar you've come to the right place.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtradetutintro.value: Heya, Tinsuit, this your first time?
Lookin' a little lost. Maybe I can point you in the right direction.
Ah, you look like a Tenno who knows the business.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic010gri.value: KEE-TOK-KEE Enter the queue, stand by for punch.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic020gri.value: KEE-TOK-KEE  Mercury rail is ready to receive. Proceed. Glory to our Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic030gri.value: EHUGHT NHUNE EHUGHT, Drop to bearing 7 point 3, reduce speed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic040gri.value: EHUGHT NHUNE EHUGHT, You have taken severe hull damage to your ship. Do you have casualties to declare?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic050gri.value: EHUGHT NHUNE EHUGHT, Understood. Stand by for troop replenishment. Sending repair drones now. For the Glory of the Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic060gri.value: All ships hold. Arrivals punching through.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic080gri.value: Rail over capacity, please divert into holding pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic090gri.value: Incoming punch. All ships maintain holding pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic100gri.value: FHUVE CHEE UK, initiate punch procedures, you are next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic110gri.value: UKCHEE KEECHEE KEE, Hold position, you do not have authorization.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic120gri.value: Transport SHUXCHEE UK, Dock for inspection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic130gri.value: Accepting rail arrivals now. Welcome back Captain. Proceed to dock for customs and inspection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic140gri.value: Next in Queue. Power and punch.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic150gri.value: Command this is Grustrag Transport uk-tok. Stand by for delivery of cargo.  Docking now. Oh and if you know what's good for you, you'll prepare a FULL security detail in receiving.  Can't wait for these monsters to be your problem and not mine.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtransferfunds.value: The transfer is in progress. The Bursa must remain functional until the transfer is finished.
Keep that Bursa alive until the transfer finishes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsantitoxineq.value: Good, you brought an anti-toxin capable of neutralizing any poison already released into the environment.
The antitoxin you have crafted is strong enough to reverse much of the damage caused by the Grineer poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtscachesremai.value: Tenno, there are still undiscovered supply caches in the area. You may want to locate them before leaving.
An undiscovered supply cache remains. Do you want to find it or proceed to extraction?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtscataremoved.value: Good work. Now get to the Injector.
Head to the Poison Injector now.
Take care when destroying the biocatalyst cartridge it is highly explosive.
Destroy this cartridge as you see fit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectionco.value: You just destroyed a massive batch of Grineer toxin. Good work, get to extraction.
Your anti-toxin has been delivered deep into the forest floor and is already undoing the damage done by the Grineer. Get to Extraction.
That was a powerful anti-toxin. This forest will not only heal but will also be resistant to future Grineer attacks. Extraction is ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectorsta.value: Protect the Injector until it overheats and destroys the poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectreach.value: Set the Injector into overdrive to incinerate the toxin.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectstart.value: Defend the injector until it has finished pumping the antitoxin into the soil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmissionfail.value: The Grineer destroyed the Injector and saved their toxin. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmissionobj0.value: The Grineer are attempting to clear this forest by poisoning the soil. You are here to sabotage their efforts. Start with the Toxin Mixer.
The Grineer want to poison the mighty forests of Earth to make more room for themselves. You are here to stop them, find the Toxin Mixer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmixerreach0.value: The mixer activates the toxin by combining it with a biocatalyst. Remove the biocatalyst to render the toxin harmless.
Remove the biocatalyst from the mixer to halt the Grineer poisons creation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmixerreacha.value: Remove the biocatalyst cartridge and insert your antitoxin.
Insert the anti-toxin into the mixer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutassleadup0.value: You are not the only one with the power of the Void. Behold the Janus key.
I could have saved the Grineer but they cast me out. Maybe its not too late to draw your divine blood.
I will put you down like a rabid Kubrow.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutassobj010l.value: This is our chance. Vor has been stripped of his elite guard, he is vulnerable. Take him out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutassobjcomp.value: Tenno, look! The Ascaris detonator has just disintegrated, it's as if it was directly connected to Vor. You're done here, go to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutfoundryobj.value: Good, your ship is one step closer to completion.
Soon the worm will be in your spine and I will control this Warframe of yours… I will purge your doting mother and bring you home.
You killed the last Grineer. If there are any colonists left, they will know justice has been done for their families. Time for extraction.
I was afraid of this, the Grineer are here and I cannot find any signs of living colonists. You still have a job to do, find that Foundry Segment.
You located the Foundry Segment, now pick it up.
Tenno, you need to pick up the Foundry Segment before we can continue.
Now there is one more thing you need to do. Eliminate all Grineer and provide justice for the colonists.
This was once a prosperous independent colony and now…
Tenno are you there? The signal cannot be boosted any further. Hurry, you are running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutfoundryvor.value: This was once a prosperous independent colony, until the Grineer arrived...
The Queens fear you, but I will show them. My love will return when I deliver you to them.
Tenno are you there? The signal cannot be boosted any further. Hurry, you are running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptc.value: They've locked me out. Tenno, you'll need to eliminate the Grineer before we can continue.
Eliminate the Grineer to regain control of the tower.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptg.value: You came here for that communications segment. You cannot leave without it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutintercepto.value: A nearby communication tower coordinates Grineer attacks on the colonies. It will have the segment we need.
The segment you need is in a nearby data vault. Infiltrate the vault and retrieve the segment.
As every moment passes, the Ascaris burrows deeper. Revealing you.
This data-vault is equipped with a variety of security measures. How you defeat those measures is up to you.
That's what Vor's device is for. He is using his Ascaris to interfere with our connection. I will try to adapt the link.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptu.value: I am making steady progress, the Communications Segment will soon be yours.
What was that? Tenno. Hold out just a bit longer, I am nearly finished.
Activate the console so I can decouple the Communication Segment we need.
