You must protect the tower from Grineer until the decoupling finishes.
Do not let the Grineer regain control of the tower.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptv.value: The Ascaris is working… breaking through. I see the shadows of your mind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodchoi.value: Good work we have what we... wait...
Tenno, coordinates in this nav segment put the Galleon on a direct course to a convoy of colonists.
You have a choice, you can extract now or you can disable this galleon and save the colonists.
Saving the colonists could jeopardize this mission. I recommend you head straight to extraction but the choice is yours.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodnear.value: The navigation segment is in the vicinity. Take it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodobjc.value: You've reached the ships power systems. Destroy the reactor.
That should take the pressure off the colonist ship but you need to get out of there! Get to extraction before the reactor goes critical.
The colonist ship has been lost. I know it was a difficult choice but many more in the future depend on your survival today.
The colonist ship has escaped. I admire your noble intentions Tenno, but you must survive for the future of the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodobje.value: The systems on this Grineer Galleon can be made compatible with your ship. Find and extract a navigation segment.
You have murdered my sons and disgraced me before my Queens. But soon the Ascaris will complete its task and bring you to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodvort.value: The Ascaris failsafe is attacking your systems. Your shield capacity has just been halved.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial020lo.value: The time has come, choose your Warframe, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial030vo.value: I see the Lotus has tried to wake you… pity she's too late!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial0330l.value: The bridge is in ruins. Tenno, you are a master of movement, traverse this gap.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial0340l.value:
Follow this example. Jump against the wall and hold your jump as you run across.
Use <JUMP> to jump then hold <JUMP> to wallrun

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial0341l.value: There is no more time. Work on traversal when you have fully recovered. For now, just run.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial0350l.value: Vor, is close. Get out of there now!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial060vo.value: We are taking this one with us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial070vo.value: Take this one back to my ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial080lo.value: What has he done to you? I can't lose another Tenno. I am surging your Warframe's power systems.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial090lo.value: Quick. Use your power. Defend yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial130lo.value: I am the Lotus. Your friend and guide. I see that the cryosleep has taken your memories, so for now we will focus on survival.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial170lo.value: Vor's done something to you... but now...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial190lo.value: ...now you have to run. Get to the drop-ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial201vo.value: Salvage team, why have you not reported in?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial210lo.value: An extraction ship is on its way but the Grineer will be hunting you. Arm yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial211vo.value: Where is my Tenno prize? I cannot keep my Queen's waiting!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial231lo.value: A Tenno's melee weapon honors their warrior tradition. When technology was turned against them, they adapted.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial240lo.value: A Tenno master respects their enemy, but offers no mercy. You have much to relearn but I will be with you as I am with all Tenno that still live.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial270lo.value: Your Warframe is out of power. Use another weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial281lo.value: This planet was once a wasteland, abandoned. But now that the air has returned, so have the Grineer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial290lo.value: There's a cache of weapons ahead. Grab what you can.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial300lo.value: With discipline and aim a Tenno's side-arm can strike like a torrent across the battlefield. Choose your weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial310lo.value: Tenno. Pick up a weapon. You are running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial330lo.value: Good. The extraction point is up ahead. Hurry before Vor finds out you've escaped.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial341lo.value: Take what you can. You will require resources to build yourself into a diverse and effective warrior.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial360vo.value: Fight me. Prove to me you are worthy of this effort.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial370vo.value: I am going to enjoy breaking you, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial380vo.value: So much spirit in you. I have work to do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial390vo.value: Yes, this proves it. You will make a fine prize.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial400vo.value: You will come to our side. I am certain of it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial410vo.value: I've seen enough. My soldiers will wear you down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial430lo.value: Hold tight... there has to be another way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial440lo.value: Okay, I found something. Get to the waypoint.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial450lo.value: It's a relic, an Orokin ship. It has not been...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial460vo.value: That's her plan? Your Lotus thinks she can perform miracles.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial461lo.value: You made it. There's the extraction ship!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial462vo.value: I've searched the dismal deserts of these worlds for too long to let you go!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial463lo.value: You're not ready to face Vor now. Use your melee weapon to block the beam and get inside.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial464vo.value: My decrepit heart is pounding! This one is stronger than the rest. Lock the area down! This Tenno is mine!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial465lo.value: There's an energy signal in the ruins nearby, it may be our only chance but we need to release the lockdown. Search the wreckage - you should find a cipher.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial466lo.value: You need to avoid Vor's beam, or divert it with your melee weapon, Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial467lo.value: Good. I'm marking the console - use the cipher there to release the lockdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial468lo.value: Watch your navigation map, I will be able to map areas you enter as well as mark objectives on it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial469lo.value: Get out of there Tenno, you will have to face Vor another time… when you're fully restored.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial470vo.value: Tenno, the system has changed. The Lotus is weak. Come to the Grineer to find true strength.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial471vo.value: Grineer, my sons, prepare the reinforcements. We need that Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial472vo.value: The Queens want to destroy you, but I need to know more

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial480vo.value: Fight me, if you want to learn futility.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial490vo.value: Keep running. There is nowhere to go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial520lo.value: A Tenno will face overwhelming odds. Through mastery of all weapon forms the coin of combat lands on its edge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial530lo.value: Tenno, you cannot survive without arming yourself. Choose a weapon before we continue.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial531lo.value: I'm not sure what Vor has done to your Warframe but we cannot remove it now. Just keep going, your ship is up ahead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial550lo.value: There it is, your ship. Hurry, Vor's reinforcements must be on their way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial560lo.value: Disengage the suppression system so we can restart the ship - you'll have to bypass the security on that panel.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial570or.value: Stop touching me you - what? Are my sensors deceiving me? Operator, is that you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial580lo.value: Enemy reinforcements are here! Ship Cephalon, we require immediate extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial581or.value: The Operator is in danger? I will need a few moments to cycle the engines!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial630lo.value: Tenno, the ship is ready, it's time to leave

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial640vo.value: Tenno, are you afraid? You cannot hide from these old eyes. I've marked you. You will return to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial650lo.value: The ship is taking too much damage. Stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial680lo.value: Quick, get to the console and release the lockdown. Do that and I will guide you to your old ship. Its your only chance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial681lo.value: Tenno, you need to go to the console to release the lockdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial682lo.value: I've marked the console on your map. You need to access it to release the lockdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutreschostag.value: Who sent you? Look, tell Alad I will get his credits - Oh... a Tenno, rescuing me? My lucks about to change! Let's go!
A Tenno! Darvo may live a few more hours!
The Lotus must be desperate to send you fetching greedy fools from the Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescshield.value: Now the Ascaris has burrowed deep enough to give me influence. Shall we see how your shields work?
The Ascaris is letting Vor control your shield! We must figure out how to remove it. Avoid taking damage while I try and block him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueappr.value: Bypass the security so we can enter.
This is the prison block. If you can avoid detection by the Warden it may be easier to get Darvo out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueextr.value: I owe you for this Tenno. I will get my entourage to meet us in orbit once we're clear of this mess.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescuehost.value: Tenno, help me! I'm feeling actual, physical pain. Do something!
It wasn't supposed to end this way. Tenno, please, do something.
You can't leave Darvo behind, Tenno. Using your Warframe's revive system should get him moving again.
Tenno! This really hurts, I ain't kidding around. Do your thing!
Hey, is somebody out there? Listen, whatever you think I did, I swear, it wasn't me.
Oh, thank you. I thought I was a goner. Let's keep moving.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescuenear.value: Search these cells for Darvo. He has to be here somewhere.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueobj0.value: The arms dealer is named Darvo. He's being held in the prison block on the other side of this factory complex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueobjr.value: Darvo is out for himself, but he is sympathetic toward the Tenno. The Grineer must have found out.
How many Grineer slaves died to build this place?
We've been wrong all this time. Tenno do not control the Warframe's divine energy. The Tenno are that energy. Each Warframe you control is merely a glass shaping your furious light.
Don't let Vor distract you. Focus on the mission, it's our only hope of figuring out this link with him.
Extraction is ready. Remember your success here depends on getting Darvo out of there… alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescuespot.value: You've been spotted. Get ready for a fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueweap.value: Lend me your side-arm Tenno, I'll cover you… which end does the hurting come out? I kid, I kid.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidcor.value: This outpost belongs to The Corpus, a secretive but extremely powerful Merchant Cult known to be working with the Grineer. Darvo will fill you in.
Legions of robots, mindless automatons, freaking lasers! These guys are bad news, but they're also loaded, which is why you're here.
Technically this is stealing but don't let that bother you. The Corpus aren't exactly beacons of moral fortitude either. They sell anything to anyone.
Don't get me wrong, I like profit… a lot, but I don't sell my wares to the damned Grineer. That's unforgivable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidgot.value: Keep moving there is more here.
Good work but you're not done yet.
Find the next cache, you almost have what you need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidnea.value: You're nearing a supply cache. Take everything you need.
There's a supply cache in the area.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidobj.value: Darvo's intel suggests that this outpost is host to several rich supply caches, raid the caches and take what you need.
The Ascaris has reached your mind and rendered Lotus mute. You will return to me… over your own free will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidvor.value: You have murdered my sons and disgraced me before my Queens. But soon the Ascaris will complete its task and bring you to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylapproach00.value: You had me anxious Tenno, nervous… pacing even. Didn't think you'd come. Such a relief… I'll finally get the chance to hurt you.
You must be feeling guilty? Need to atone? I'll oblige- let my gavel ring justice off your thin tin skull.
I'm very excited now. The anticipation… I always learn so much from a live dissection.
A dissection? No, that sounds too humane… your death will be…  painful.
Tell me! No, no, let me see… when I crack open your head-fruit, what color juice spills out?
The Lotus, barking at you. Always so calm. Always in control. She doesn't care about you Tenno. She don't love you. Not like I loved the tubemen you murdered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylcombat0080.value: Come for a fight? Should'a dressed for a funeral.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylcombat0110.value: Would you look at you. Worthless, ugly, freaks.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylcombat0120.value: Come near me and I'll pound you into a tiny cube.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtyldiscovers1.value: Jealous... that's why you've come... my tubemen are too healthy... too resilient... too strong... too vicious! No wait... that's not jealous... that's frightened.
Tenno Lizards scampering 'bout my house. Messing with my work... contaminating my science. Who let them in. Which twit did this thing?

Old Grineer... life too short... mind too small. My tubemen overcome... leave old mistakes behind...  'n all of a sudden, along slithers the Tenno, sick, sick things... here to ruin this flesh made right.
You hate my science. Hate my tubes 'n my tubemen! But I have the numbers, add those numbers... mix those waters. Grow the tubemen so they kill forever!
Needs to be secret. Needs to be clean... this house. Not some dirty Galleon... hatch open... for trespassers to spread their filth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylevents0140.value: Gonna pull this ocean down on us if I have to.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylevents0150.value: Nowhere left to hide. Nowhere left to run.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylintro0070t.value: First you Tenno. Next… your Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dualmissionobj.value: We've received a message that we are to eliminate a target at this location. Carry out the assassination.
Well, this just got interesting. We now need to capture a target here.
It seems we'll be here a little longer. Deposit a data unit into the location's mainframe
We've received a second objective. Defend the artifact in this location before it's destroyed.
Change of plans, ignore your original objective. Leave nothing alive.
It appears there's some valuable intel stored here. Gather the intel now.
I can't breach this door's security. We'll have to find a key pass. Scanning the ship now... Key signal detected. Marking on your HUD.
We're locked out, patching us in now. I can't bypass this door. Scanning ship now for key pass... Found it. Marking location on your HUD.
Our mission just got more complicated. There's a hostage here. Rescue them now.
Well, what do you know. I'm detecting an Orokin Artifact here. Extract it before we leave.
It appears we now need to sabotage this location. Destroy the Reactor Core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dumbraflashbac.value: What would you do… to save them?
Pupil! We have to go! NOW!
Teshin, what was that? What is Umbra?
Teshin, what was that? What is Umbra?
Teshin, what was that? What is Umbra?
Teshin, what was that? What is Umbra?
A fury untamed by Tenno control. A rogue Warframe.
It is beyond me. Focus on the now. We must escape. Your life depends on it!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire290vay.value: Thank you for your service, Brother.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire300vay.value: Look what these Tenno made me do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire310vay.value: This one fullfills his duty with honor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire320vay.value: This one honors the Grineer with his sacrifice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire330vay.value: A sacrifice worthy of a warrior.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dverifyfunds00.value: Hurry. Destroy the Bursa before the verification is finished.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel1challe.value: I could have never foreseen this, that Vessel, it contains primitive etchings that seem to be a sort of blueprint. Was a Warframe entombed there?

Look at it. It's exquisite. There's an inscription: "Prove you are him, destroy the ones who oppress." Destroy who? Does this smudged glyph represent some enemy? You will have to carry that Vessel into battle and prove yourself if we are to unlock these secrets.
If you want to prove yourself, you're going to need to carry that Burial Vessel in your inventory.
Whatever that Vessel wants you to do, I'm certain it's somehow connected to that smudged glyph.
I don't know how this happened, but the glyph on that Sacred Vessel, it's changed. I suggest you stay on this path.
The glyph, it's changed. You must be fulfilling some primitive rite of passage…
The vessel, it's responding to your actions.
Tenno, look, the glyph. It's completely clear. And there's a new inscription: "Return for him." Return to the tomb so we can get past this superstitious nonsense and on to something worthwhile.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel1phobos.value: You can feel the filth and the grit in every breath. This desolate rock is the former colony of backward-thinking sky worshippers. Their stories are worth as much as the sand around you. Nothing.

The Grineer took 'pity' on their miserable existence years ago, returning this so-called civilization to the sand. Yet, for some elusive reason, their relics have become quite fashionable and thus valuable. Rare antiquities, that's why we're here.
Ignore these glyphs, nothing but nonsense about their so-called god-king. Inaros, is it? How quaint - the only thing heaven-sent from Inaros will be the price his relics fetch at auction.
A Burial Vessel! It will contain precious relics… There there - you're not defiling a tomb, you're creating wealth!
Hush my little dune. You don't need to be scared. There, there, that's right, shake out the sand, but remember, not all of it... and I'll tell you the story.
Tenno - what is this? How are you doing that?
Long ago, the lands of our colony were cursed, soaked in fear. The Golden Skymen would come and take our children away… Young and old alike, cowered before them, afraid to lose their most beloved.
But then he came. The Fear-eater. The skykiller. He was called… Inaros!
Return to your ship, we must examine this vessel further.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel2challe.value: I'm beginning to think this Inaros myth was drawn from… an actual Warframe?
Oh I see. Another glyph? Another challenge. See if you can figure out which enemy it represents.

This wretched place, why did I even come here? I keep telling myself it was the treasure but… Push it back, stupid Baro, there's no wealth in these memories. Tenno, we need to open that next chamber. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel2phobos.value: I'll be grateful when this is over, I cannot stand this barren place. Even the Orokin could not enlighten those sand skates.
Remember, we're here for relics, not stories, so I'd appreciate if you kept your Tenno soma-void-resonance… 'thing' to a minimum. I've had enough of this culture to last a lifetime.
Take the Vessel to the door. What happens?
Little one, after this you must sleep…
Inaros began not as our King, but as our enemy, a warrior of the Golden Skymen. But for each child the Skymen took away, Inaros grew ever more angry - until one fateful night.

Another child had been taken and the villagers had gathered in a mourning circle, weeping... until they heard a small voice. By the dunes! It was the child, returned! As he approached the people gasped in horror as they saw that he was drenched in blood.

His father rushed to the boy and embraced him - and saw that he had no wounds. Whose blood is this, he asked? The boy looked to the sky and said - this is the Blood of the Skymen. This is the work of Inaros.
By the sand and stars, the Skymen raged. They set upon Inaros with their armies but none could prevail... for he commanded the sand, he commanded death. Inaros ate their fear and became stronger.
None of this… none of this could be true. Could it?
And so they left us, and took with them our fear. On that day, Inaros became our King and, in a great whirlwind of sand, ascended to watch over us from his throne in the sky.
What if? It… It can't be.
Watch-out, you've just been shut in.
That voice, return to your ship. I… I must collect myself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel3challe.value: The story isn't just a myth, is it?
Look at this sacred vessel, one of four, just as she described. And the challenges, you must prove you're Tenno.
The Grineer are returning in force! Tenno, I don't care about the money anymore, just stop those dogs from getting Inaros!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel3phobos.value: By the Void, the Grineer have picked up our scent. They'll take me … uh - it … Inaros! You have to stop these animals at once!
So where is she? That voice? I… I think I need to hear the rest. I think I've needed to hear this for a long time.
And so for years we lived in peace and our little dunes were our own to keep. But the sands of peace are ever-shifting. Years later a plague came to the desert. The Infested.

Desperate, our people called out to sky: Inaros! Inaros! But they could not wake him… and so they were consumed by the ravenous horde. With all lost, the few remaining villagers gathered in the mourning circle to prepare for the end... when suddenly, a storm rose about them… A colossal spiral storm of sand, piercing the sky! The villagers huddled, trapped within the storm's eye as the beasts charged them... In moments the beasts were torn apart and the Infested plague was swept away, never to be seen again. As the storm subsided the people ventured out into the desert, hoping to catch a glimpse of their saviour, their beloved Inaros...

They found his glorious metal body, broken and still, lying in the sand. Did they mourn? No. They knew his spirit had returned to the sky to watch over them, once again. They gathered his body to keep it safe from thieves and raiders. They placed the pieces within sacred vessels and entombed them in secret… knowing that one day Inaros would reclaim his body and rise again.
So now my sweet dune, you have no need of fear. Take these grains, and keep them under your pillow. Inaros will watch over you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel4phobos.value: Cut them down, make them fear this place. The Grineer should be swept away.
Quickly, my sweet dune, they're coming…
I tried so hard to forget.
Quickly, in here. Don't make a sound, Baro. Here. Hold these grains in your hand, tight. Inaros will protect you.
It wasn't me I was worried about.
What do you want? No. You have no right!  No - it's just me.
You've shown me why I came here, Tenno. Not for riches.
The doors are closing again. Prove that you are worthy of Inaros's strength. One last time.
My mother's call will be answered. Inaros will rise again. Come home, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0001.value: Orokin towers have the power to assume physical control of intruders. Your Warframe should protect you from the tower, of course you will still be vulnerable to those under it's control.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0002.value: This Orokin tower has been hidden within The Void for over two hundred years. Be careful, we have no idea what or who we might find.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0003.value: You have entered the The Void. Use caution Tenno, Orokin Towers have a special way of dealing with unwanted visitors.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0004.value: Congratulations Tenno, you are now inside The Void. This tower may be centuries old but it's Neural Sentry is still operational, stay alert.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0005.value: Careful, Orokin towers are often guarded by a Neural Sentry, a dangerous entity capable of corrupting intruders and assuming control of their bodies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorendfight11.value: Behold, they cut me down but still, I speak. I am energy and I cannot be destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorendfight12.value: This death is temporary. My existence is forever. I cannot be destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorfightstart.value: Now, I will stop them. Now, I am changed. Reborn through the energy of this Janus Key. Forever bound to the Void.
It is time. I will teach these trespassers the redemptive power of my Janus Key. They will learn its simple truth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro0010v.value: Vor: Foolish Tenno, do you realize your Lotus has sent you to die

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro010qu.value: We tire of failure. Who put their faith in you Admiral.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro020vo.value: You did. I have a life debt.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro030qu.value: To be paid in Tenno blood.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro050qu.value: Do not awaken the vipers. Do not study them. Crush these eggs before they hatch. This we command.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro080qu.value: Take the Rail to Pluto. Boril is taking command now… Captain Vor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight07.value: We cannot blame these creatures, they are being led by a false prophet, an imposter who knows not the secrets of the Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight08.value: Let it be known. If the Tenno want true salvation, they will lay down their arms and wait for the baptism of my Janus Key.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight09.value: I was cut in half. Destroyed. But through its Janus Key, the Void called to me. It brought me here and here I was reborn.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight10.value: The Tenno are lost and they will resist but I, Vor, will cleanse this place of their impurity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprefollowu.value: My brothers, did I not tell of this day? Did I not prophesize this moment?
Tenno use the keys, but they are mere trespassers. Only I, Vor know the true power of the Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprespawn01.value: Look at them, they come to this place when they know they are not pure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprespawn02.value: Behold the Tenno, come to scavenge and desecrate this sacred realm.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize100lo.value: We have what we came for, now get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize110lo.value: Send a message to Vor. Eliminate the remaining attackers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize111lo.value: The segment is yours. Head to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize120lo.value: The communication segment will connect the ship with our Tenno operatives. You are not alone in this fight, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwallrun472lot.value: A Tenno flows like fire over the battle terrain, do you remember how to dash across walls?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome0020st.value: Alright, you're in. I hope you prove me wrong, I've been burned before.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome0190ar.value: Now begins your path to truth and power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome020ord.value: Thank you for returning to me, Operator!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome030ord.value: Ordis is pleased to see you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome050ord.value: Ordis has been- getting tired of waiting- waiting patiently for your return, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome051ord.value: Ordis awaits command.  Who dies-- what are your next moves, Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome052ord.value: Hello Operator! Ordis has reorganized the ship…  It's exactly the same!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome053ord.value: Operator! It's really you! Are you getting revenge for-- preparing for your next mission?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome0540pe.value: The odds are in our favor now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome054ord.value: All systems are in peak condition, just like the Operator!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome055ord.value: Ship Cephalon awaiting orders. I am hearing voices-- in perfect working order!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dyoulost0010te.value: You have lost… yet you learn. Developing your skills is key to future victories.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dyoulost0020te.value: Reflect on this loss… a stepping stone on your journey to mastering Lunaro.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dyoulost0030te.value: You have lost the game. Pivot your failures into experience and growth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dyouwon0010tes.value: Well done, Tenno. Savour this moment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dyouwon0020tes.value: I'm impressed. You're taking to the game as sharp does to steel.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dyouwon0030tes.value: Victory is yours… but always be humble in this win, giving honor to those you defeat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/enemiesawarea.value: You're on the sensors now. You've been detected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/enemiesunaware.value: Keep moving. None of the scanners have detected you.
You're still in the clear. No detection from enemy sensors.
Keep going. No body knows you're here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.value: You're almost at the target, keep it up.
Keep searching, the VIP is here somewhere.
We need to find and eliminate the target.
We can't let the target escape, you need to find them immediately.
This mission won't be easy, the target you are to assassinate has survived these attacks before. Be careful.
Your objective is near, keep pushing forward.
Nice work, you're almost at the objective.
The capture target has vital information that we will need to extract, we need our subject brought back alive.
We cannot let our target know we're here. Track them down quickly.
Scans indicate our target is in the vicinity. Find them.
You're closing in on the target, keep your eyes peeled.
We don't have all of the logs yet, keep searching for the remaining consoles.
You are almost at the rally point, keep moving.
We can't let the artifact fall into enemy hands, get to it and defend it at all costs.
I'm detecting a high amount of activity at the rally point, you need to get there pronto.
You're nearing the target, stay on guard.
I'm still detecting a lot of infestation activity, let's clean it up.
There must be an access terminal around here, keep searching, we need those data units.
Its critical that we retrieve that intel. You need to find an access terminal first.
We're running out of time, you need to find all the remaining access terminal and get out of there.
Keep going, we need all of the data units before you can leave.
The mainframe is around here somewhere. Keep searching for it.
The reactor will have tight security. Watch out for enemy patrols.
Find the captive as soon as you can, we don't have much time.
We can't leave without rescuing the prisoner, keep searching.
There's no telling what the captors are doing to our rescue target, you need to find the holding cell immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/grineermarines.value: Heads up. A Grineer assault team is headed your way.
I'm detecting a large security force heading your way. It's the Grineer.
Watch yourself, foot soldiers are on the way.
You are surrounded by Grineer Marines.

/lotus/language/subtitles/heavygrineerb.value: Stay focused, there's a Heavy Unit approaching.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedaccess.value: This looks ominous. Infested or not, we need those data logs. See if you can find any consoles that are still operational.
We need all the data logs from any still-functioning consoles aboard this ship. Shouldn't be a problem for you unless the Infested slow you down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedexterm.value: We need to clean this vessel up, search for the source of the infestation and exterminate it.
The area is crawling with infested. If its not a Tenno, eradicate it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedincomi.value: Multiple bio-signatures detected, we've got Infested incoming.
Multiple targets ahead. Leave no one standing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedshipa.value: I'm detecting infested bio signatures all over the place. You know what to do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedshipb.value: The infestation has corrupted all life here, let's clear it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedshipc.value: We have got an infestation. Extermination is the only option.

/lotus/language/subtitles/killallobjecti.value: There is a large platoon of Grineer Marines stationed here. Leave no one standing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/killedeverythi.value: All targets eliminated.  Let's get out of here.
All targets down.  Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbalarmsresetl.value: Alarm succesfully hacked, the location is returning to normal security levels.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbcorpbipeddet.value: I'm detecting a large security force heading your way... it's the Gri...no wait, it's the Corpus. Definitely the Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbdetecteddarv.value: Wow, they are not happy about you being here.
Looks like you're on the systems now. So watch out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbdetectedtesh.value: You are found. Strike without hesitation.
Now you must take the more brutal path.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbemergencylig.value: Emergency lighting systems activated, backup systems online.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbemglitactvco.value: Corpus Ship PA: Emergency lighting systems activated, backup systems online.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbevaccorpship.value: Corpus Ship PA: All passengers must evacuate the spacecraft immediately. Ship destruction imminent.
Corpus Ship PA: DANGER: The ship's integrity has been compromised. Evacuate.
Corpus Ship PA: DANGER: Ship systems critical. Prepare for immediate evacuation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbgrineerheavy.value: Ready yourself, a formidable enemy approaches.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbhllbrchcorps.value: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: The hull has been breached.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbhullbreachgr.value: WARNING: The hull has been breached.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblckdwncorpsh.value: Corpus Ship PA: Engaging Lockdown Procedures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblifedtcdcorp.value: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: Unauthorized life forms detected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblkdngrineers.value: Commencing Lockdown. Trespassing is an offence punishable by death.
Engaging Lockdown Procedures. Intruders, you will not leave this place alive.
Lockdown Activated. Surrender and you will receive a quick death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblkdnteshin03.value: All exits have been sealed, what will you do?
They think you are caught. Educate them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpagecorpship.value: Corpus Ship PA: Code 13 in Engineering. Code 13 in Engineering.
Corpus Ship PA: Code 6 on the Mining Deck. Code 6 on the Mining Deck.
Corpus Ship PA: Flight Commanders to Bay 3. You are loaded and ready.
Corpus Ship PA: Engineering to the Reactor Core on Deck 2.
Corpus Ship PA: Technician to the Navigation Console on Deck 4.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpagegrineers.value: Code 13 in Engineering. Code 13 in Engineering.
Code 6 on the Mining Deck. Code 6 on the Mining Deck.
Flight Commanders to Bay 3. You are loaded and ready.
Engineering to the Reactor Core on Deck 2.
Technician to the Navigation Console on Deck 4.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpublicservic.value: You are Grineer. You are always prepared for battle.
Your Twin Queens are your leaders, your guides, your mothers. You obey them totally.
Live for the battle; obey the safety protocols of this vessel.
Failure to report equiptment malfunctions is a punishable offence.
Unauthorized use of equipment is prohibited and subject to punishment.
In the event of emergency you are required to remain at your post.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpubsvcanncor.value: Corpus Ship PA: Please remember to obey all signs and rules. The safety of you and our crew is our highest priority.
Corpus Ship PA: Don't forget to seal and lock all exterior docking bays before departing the loading zone.
Corpus Ship PA: Guard rails are there for your protection, please respect.
Corpus Ship PA: Be a responsible passenger, report any malfunctioning equipment to the supervisor on duty. For the safety of you, and those around you.
Corpus Ship PA: Manufacturing zones can be dangerous, and unauthorized use of equipment is prohibited.
Corpus Ship PA: Please remain calm and civil during emergency evacuation procedures. There are enough escape pods for everyone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbrctrcritcorp.value: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: Reactor systems malfunction, power levels critical.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbreactorcriti.value: WARNING: Reactor systems malfunction, power levels critical.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbsandstormlot.value: Be aware. Sandstorms in the area are going to cut your visibility significantly.
Look out Tenno, their is a sandstorm blowing through. Visibility will be minimal.
The enemy won't be the only thing you have to contend with, a sandstorm just blew in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbshiponlockdo.value: Did they lock you out? That's cute.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbshpsysnmlcor.value: Corpus Ship PA: Ship systems nominal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbspnkcorpship.value: Corpus Ship PA: Fire prevention systems online.
Corpus Ship PA: Sprinkler systems activated.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbtimeddoorhac.value: The door is open. Get moving.
This door is using an advanced locking mechanism, I will have to open it remotely.
My scans show this door will be impassable without outside intervention. Access the panel so that I can hack it remotely.
Hold tight while I hack this door.
This will take a moment, watch your back.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbundetectedda.value: Keep going. No body knows you're on this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbundetectedte.value: The enemy remains blind to your intrusion.
The livestock graze unaware of the eagle soaring.
You are the hunter, unseen in their midst.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvesselchange.value: WARNING: Vessel is changing course, please stabilize yourself while the ship adjusts its flight pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvesselunders.value: DANGER: The vessel is under attack by a hostile force, all hands prepare for battle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvslchgcrscor.value: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: Vessel is changing course, please stabilize yourself while the ship adjusts its flight pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvsludrsgecor.value: Corpus Ship PA: DANGER: The vessel is under attack by a hostile force. Please return to your living quarters until Security neutralizes the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/locatenav.value: Your target is this location's computer system. Find and access the terminals.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lockdownbypass.value: Breach complete. We're free to proceed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusartifacts.value: These cards represent the artifacts of the Orokin War. Each provides unique boosts to you and your teammates during missions.
Each player can choose an artifact from their collection, before the mission begins.
These artifacts give a small Tenno squad an edge against their vast enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusassassina.value: Target eliminated. Get out of here.
You've found the target. Destroy them.
Your target is deep within this outpost. Find and eliminate him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusbosscorpu.value: The destruction of the Ambulas biped prototype has halted Corpus production plans for this latest model. We hope it is the only of its kind out there.
The death of Arn Etina means the Corpus mineral pipeline has been severed. Robotics production will be disrupted for weeks.
Those Hyena's were the most advanced proxies we've seen yet. The Corpus are making unsettling progress towards total technological superiority. We must monitor them closely.
Seeing the Jackal in action is grim. It's clear the Corpus are capable of producing robotics beyond what we imagined.
The death of Sergeant Ned Anyo should weaken the Corpus Research and Development operations for quite sometime.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusbossgrine.value: The defeat of Grineer Captain Vor opens up other regions for the Tenno.
The death of Counselor Vay Hek will bring all Grineer deployments to a halt.
Eliminating a Grineer General will render the Saturn region helplessly unorganized.

The death of revered War Hero, Lech Kril will undoubtedly send shockwaves throughout Grineer society. The silencing of his hammer will bring security to this system, but we have potentially created a martyr in Kril.
Tyl Regor was no ordinary Grineer. He was the leader in cloning reproduction, known as C.R. The self-proclaimed Father of Future Grineer, his death will weaken the future production of soldiers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusbossinfes.value: That Golem was the most complex species of infested we've encountered. Their ability to overtake multiple species is growing.
Infested encounters are beginning to reach nightmare-like proportions. This latest abomination proves that there is no limit to the imagination when dealing with these monsters.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdefensega.value: Reinforcements available, do you choose to leave now or continue fighting?
Extraction is ready. Unless you can handle more of the enemy.
Rest now, others will continue the battle.
Go now Tenno. You have done well.
Reinforcements are inbound. Hold the line.
We are readying reinforcements. Keep fighting Tenno.
Their reinforcements are endless! Are you ready for more?
Incoming targets. You know what to do.
Our position has been compromised. Defend the cargo until reinforcements arrive.
The enemy is at our doorstep. You must defend our equipment until reinforcements arrive.
Continue to defend! You will be rewarded for your bravery.
Keep fighting. Another opportunity to extract will appear soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo1intr.value: Tenno, you are but one against the horde. Your survival depends on speed. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo1succ.value: You have passed this test. Tenno, you give me hope that honor and balance may one day be returned to our system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo1wave.value: You show promise. Alas, this is just the beginning.
Our enemies are innumerable. There is no time for rest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo2intr.value: A Tenno must be a master of all their weapons. Prove yourself with you primary weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo2wave.value: I believe you can handle more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo3intr.value: Prove your ability with a sidearm. Eliminate all targets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo4intr.value: Show me that you know of the old ways. Eliminate all targets using your melee weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo5intr.value: You have proven your skills with weapons, Tenno, but what of your endurance? Can you survive this onslaught?

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo6intr.value: Tenno are more than just fighters. Prove your intellect by hacking these terminals.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo7intr.value: Time to test your marksmanship. Track and shoot all targets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo8intr.value: Your Warframe is a weapon. Prove you have mastered it's power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo9intr.value: Now we will test your agility. Shoot the targets to create your path.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojogener.value: Most disappointing. Only return when you are ready for this challenge.
It appears you need more practice, Tenno. This challenge awaits you when you are ready.
A formidable performance. This test is now complete

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusextermina.value: The outpost is clean. Proceed to extraction.
I'm still picking up signs of the Infested. Keep hunting.
Sensors show this outpost is crawling with Infested. Exterminate the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundrya.value: This is the Foundry. Here you will build powerful new items to expand your arsenal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundryb.value: To build an item requires a blueprint and its components. While there are blueprints in the market, most are hidden throughout the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundryc.value: Search ships and defeat enemies to obtain components. The components found are influenced by the region of space you are in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundryd.value: The Foundry is key to owning the most powerful weapons and artifacts that exist.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusintelenda.value: All data units located. Let's get out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusintelstar.value: Find all the data units on this outpost. Valuable intel lies within.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusmatchmaki.value: You control how I connect you with other Tenno agents. You may freely join other agents, restrict it to your contacts or go it alone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussabotagee.value: The power core has been destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussabotagem.value: Keep moving. The power source is deep within the outpost.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussabotages.value: This generator core on this outpost must be destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussentienta.value: I am picking up strange energy fluctuations in the area, remain vigilant.
This is unexpected, our enemy... not operate on these fre...
I'm unable to... Tenno, change of...
Tenno... You are... DANGER.  Something else... Something... powerful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusstarchart.value: Welcome Tenno. This is the Origin System, and you are its ward.
Our enemies control the ancient Solar Rail Network and with it, travel throughout the regions. Complete missions to regain control of the network.
Completing a region activates its real-time alerts. This is key to attacking high-value targets.
You begin at Mercury's Terminus, your only way into the system. It is time for the Tenno to return.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missiona.value: This is a sabotage mission. Reach engineering and destroy the reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionb.value: Our target is the reactor. Breach engineering and destroy it. Be careful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missioncomplet.value: Great work. I am pleased with your performance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionfailedc.value: Mission failed. The target has escaped.
They've got away. We have failed.
You failed Tenno, your captive has escaped.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.value: The Assassination target is nearby.  Seek and destroy.
We need to find the VIP and take them down. Do not let the target escape.
The VIP that we're hunting is here, find them and take them out.
Assassination contracts are not to be taken lightly. Eliminating this target will have a significant impact on enemy forces. Search the area, leave no survivors.
We've contracted you with a mark. You are here to find your mark, and eliminate the assigned target.
You are here to find our target and bring them to the extraction point. Happy hunting.
We received intel that somebody vital to enemy operations is here. Find them, and capture them.
You are here on a Capture mission. You must find, capture and extract our target.
We need to take full control here. Get to the rally point and defend it from enemy attackers.
We can't afford to lose this location. We must reach the rally point and resist all opposing forces.
The artifact we need is nearby, but it can't be extracted by regular means. We need to take full command here and defend the location against all attackers until an extraction crew can arrive.
The intelligence files we need are in the area. Find all four computer access terminals and recover the data units from each of them.
Intelligence files are stored on four separate data units in the vicinity.  We need all the units before we can begin decryption on the data. Get out there and find them.
We need all of the data units being stored in the vicinity. Search the area, find the access terminals, and retrieve each device.
This is a rescue mission. We need to find and liberate the hostage before any harm comes to them.
There is a prisoner here that is vital to our operations. Search for the holding location.
Our intel suggests that our person of interest is in the vicinity. Search for the hostage, and bring them home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseb.value: All data logs indicate that there is an Orokin Artifact somewhere here, get to it now, defend it, and then we can leave!

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefensec.value: The odds were against us, Tenno - but we did it. Mission complete.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefensed.value: Location reached: Drop me in and defend our position!
Terminal Spotted: Upload me in and prepare to defend!
Here is a terminal: Get me in, and get ready to defend!

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseg.value: This will only get more difficult. Get to a terminal and prepare for enemy resistance.
We have got to find a terminal. Proceed and prepare!
I need access to a terminal, find one and patch me in!

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseh.value: Still working on it, continue to defend!
I'm in, Tenno. This will take a moment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefensen.value: Artifact found. Defend it until the Extraction Team arrives.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseo.value: This is a mobile defense mission. You must deliver payloads and defend a number of locations while I break into the network. Be prepared for heavy resistance. I can't do this without you.
All Terminals have been successfully hacked. Excellent resistance, Tenno. Let's make our exit!

/lotus/language/subtitles/navcompleted.value: Upload completed. Nice work. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivecompl.value: They won't be bothering us anymore, let's get out of here.
Nice work taking down the VIP, now get to extraction.
Target down, assassination contract complete. Great work Tenno.
Success! The captive is safely in our hands. Congratulations Tenno.
Mission complete, the captive has been escorted to the extraction point. Well done.
Excellent work. We'll interrogate the captive back at base. Your part is done here, Tenno.
That's the last of them, objective is secure. Lets go home.
Very impressive Tenno, you held them all back. Time to get out of here.
We're done here. The extraction team will take over from here, time to evacuate.
Excellent work Tenno, we've got all the data units now. Time to head for the exits.
That was the last data unit we needed. Lets get out of here.
With all four data units collected we can now compile the intelligence files. We're done here, get to extraction.
Mission complete. The captive has been liberated, you will be rewarded for this Tenno.
Escort mission complete, the hostage is safe now. Let's get out of here.
The captive has been secured, you've done your part Tenno, we'll take it from here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.value: You've found the target. Deliver the payload and get out of there.
Target spotted. Stay sharp, this one is a handful.
There is the assassination target, you know what to do.
You've located the VIP, time to go to work.
Target acquired, take them down.
The assassination target is here. Wipe them out.
There's the artifact, collect what we need and head to extraction.
Artifact found, acquire the Orokin technology and head to the rally point.
You found the capture target. Do not let them escape.
There's our target. Capture and extract them.
Our subject is here. Capture them and do not let them escape.
Okay, we're here. Take up defensive positions, we're expecting company.
This appears to be the primary zone of contention. Brace yourself for attack.
Looks like we beat them here, take up a defensive position and be ready for enemy assault teams.
Here is one of the access consoles, you need to activate it to recover the data unit.
You found an access terminal, use it to release the data mass from its storage unit.
Activate the access terminal and it should release the data unit. Get the device, and get to extraction.
You've located the hostage. Escort the prisoner to the extraction point and I'll take care of the rest.
Subject found. You need to bring the captive to safety. Protect them at all costs.
Prisoner located. We need to get them back to command in one piece, find your way to the exits and don't leave the subject behind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/payloaddeliver.value: Payload delivery successfully, time to go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankdisciplea.value: You have attained the rank of Disciple.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankdragona.value: You have attained the rank of Dragon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankeaglea.value: You have attained the rank of Eagle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgolddiscip.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Disciple.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgolddragon.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Dragon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldeaglea.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Eagle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldhunter.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldinitia.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldnovice.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Novice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldsagea.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Sage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldseeker.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Seeker.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldtigera.value: You have attained the rank of Gold Tiger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgrandmaste.value: You have attained the rank of Grand Master.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankhuntera.value: You have attained the rank of Hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankinitiatea.value: You have attained the rank of Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankmastera.value: You have attained the rank of Master.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankmiddlemast.value: You have attained the rank of Middle Master.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranknovicea.value: You have attained the rank of Novice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksagea.value: You have attained the rank of Sage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankseekera.value: You have attained the rank of Seeker.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverdisc.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Disciple.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverdrag.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Dragon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilvereagl.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Eagle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverhunt.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverinit.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilvernovi.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Novice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilversage.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Sage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverseek.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Seeker.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilvertige.value: You have attained the rank of Silver Tiger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranktigera.value: You have attained the rank of Tiger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rescuemissions.value: Here are the holding cells. Search each one for the hostage.
The captive will be in one of these cells. Search them.
We've reached the prison. Find our prisoner in one of these cells.
This is the jail. Our hostage is in one of these cells.

/lotus/language/subtitles/sabotagemining.value: The Grineer have been harvesting a nearby planetoid for weapons-grade material. Locate and destroy their mining equipment.
Excellent work. You have managed to thwart potentially dangerous discoveries from being fully realized… for now.
The mining equipment is nearby. It must be destroyed to prevent the Grineer from developing energy weapons.
This research could have unimaginable repercussions. Be on your guard.
Mission success hinges on the destruction of the mining equipment. Expect heavy resistance.
The Grineer are preparing to magnetically mine asteroids for rare alloys to be used in body augmentations and modifications. Paralyze their research by destroying the mining equipment.
Well done. You have brought the Grineer research to a sudden halt.
A heavily armed security force stands between you and the mining equipment. Stay alert.
Crippling their equipment will effectively cripple their research.
We need you back alive. Stay alert.
You are gaining the upper hand. Push forward.
They are aware of your presence. Make haste.
A dormant comet is being targeted by the Grineer for its volatile materials. The material will be used in the manufacturing of fuel propellant for their fleet. Locate and cripple their equipment.
Impressive. This will temporarily immobilize the Grineer fleet. We will move-in and claim the comet.
Destroy the mining equipment before the Grineer can intercept the comet.
It is time to bring the Grineer fleet to a standstill. Strike them where it hurts.
Halting fuel production will give us a much needed advantage. Determine the position of the equipment.
Hostiles inbound. Strike hard and fast.
The Grineer have set their sights on a large asteroid thought to contain an abundance of Rubedo. Locate and destroy the extraction equipment.
Good work. Your efforts have prevented Grineer access to the Rubedo. We have an extraction team en route to appropriate the planetoid's contents.
Rubedo must be protected at any cost. Sabotage the nearby mining equipment.
It is imperative we do not let the Grineer get their hands on the Rubedo.
You are approaching a piece of equipment. Watch your back.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shipicedupa.value: The cryogenics core has malfunctioned. Expect colder-than-normal temperatures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shipicedupb.value: I've detected freezing temperatures. The ice in here will damage your shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shipicedupc.value: I'm detecting ice... lots of it. Be cautious, your shields will take a hit from the cold.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shiponfirea.value: This area has taken some hits. Stay away from fire damage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shiponfirec.value: Ammunition storage has become volatile. Rounds are combusting everywhere. Stay away from the fire.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shiponlockdown.value: Ship is entering lock down. We'll need to override the system.
Doors are locked. Time to break in.
We've been locked out. Let's override the security.

/lotus/language/subtitles/systembypassa.value: Protect the relay. Running system bypass.

/lotus/language/subtitles/systembypassb.value: Okay, I'm in. Hold this position while I bypass the system controls.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetdestroye.value: Target destroyed, proceed to the extraction point.
That's it, now get out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetfoundb.value: That's the reactor, expose its core and destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetnavigati.value: Your target is the system mainframe. Deliver the payload.
Okay, you're looking for the mainframe. It's critical that you deliver the payload to that location.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetreactorb.value: We need to destroy the reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetreactorc.value: Disabling the reactor core will cripple the enemy. Find it, and take it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial01-03c.value: I am the Lotus, friend and guide. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial01a.value: I am the Lotus. I will guide you but we must hurry, Vor is coming for you. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial02.value: I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial04.value: A Warframe shows your vital statistics. This shows your health.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial05a.value: The cryo pod has left you in a weakened state.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial06.value: Your health does not recharge. Touch this healing sphere before we continue.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial07.value: Now, I have engaged your shields. Shields absorb damage before health is affected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial08.value: Notice how the shields will recharge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial09.value: I will show you the Tenno fighting system. It has three forms. The first is your blade. A Tenno's melee weapon is always with them, always at the ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial10.value:
Cut down this target.
Hold <NEXT_INV> to draw or sheath your melee weapon. 
Tap <MELEE> when you blade is drawn to strike.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial11.value: This display shows the clip size and the total ammo you have.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial12.value: Find ammo on dead enemies and in the environment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial13.value:
Take the ammo and reload your weapon.
Press <RELOAD> to reload.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial14.value: Excellent, the second form is your primary weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial15.value:
Destroy these targets.
Press <PRE_ATTACK> to shoot.
Hold <AIM_WEAPON> to aim.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial16.value: Well done. Do you see the indicator below your weapon and Warframe? This is affinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial17.value: You increase affinity during combat, and in missions to come. Increase your affinity to unlock the power of your arsenal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial18.value:
Your third and final form is your secondary weapon. Switch weapons now.
Use <NEXT_INV> to switch weapons.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial19.value:
Destroy this target with your blade.
Hold <NEXT_INV> to draw or sheath your melee weapon. 
Tap <MELEE> when you blade is drawn to strike.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial20.value: A Tenno must use these forms in combination to destroy their enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial21.value: Attack these targets using blade and gun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial22.value: Excellent. As you level, you receive points to customize your weapons and unlock Warframe powers. I will unlock a power now to demonstrate its use.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial23.value: Power consumes energy. Absorb this energy sphere.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial24.value:
Now, unleash your power on this target.
Use <ACTIVATE_ABILITY_0> to activate the first power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial25.value: We can't afford to waste anymore time. You must get to extraction before Vor finds you. Hurry, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial25a.value: He dropped a mod. Quickly pick it up, it will come in handy later.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial26a.value:
We can't afford to waste any more time. I have unscrambled the portal. Get out of here. As fast as you can, run.
Hold <PRE_RUN> to sprint.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial27.value: I've engaged your map system. Locate your objective.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial28.value: Prove you are worthy to join us. Destroy the targets before time runs out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial29.value: Excellent, you have attained the rank of Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial30.value: You have failed my test. Return here tomorrow, if you wish to try again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial31.value: I await your return when you have learned more. Farewell.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityash.value: Bleed effects inflicted on enemies do more damage and last longer.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityashp.value: Bleed effects inflicted on enemies do more damage and last longer.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityatla.value: Becomes immune to Knockdown effects while on the ground.
Becomes immune to Knockdown effects while on the ground.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitybans.value: Weapon noises are hushed so that enemies cannot hear them.
Weapon noises are hushed so that enemies cannot hear them.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitychro.value: Chosen Energy color dictates the type of Elemental damage dealt by abilities.
Chosen Energy color dictates the type of Elemental damage dealt by abilities.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityembe.value: Regenerates Energy and deals more damage while on Fire.
Regenerates Energy and deals more damage while on Fire.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityequi.value: Health Orbs generate a little Energy, while Energy Orbs restore a bit of Health.
Health Orbs generate a little Energy, while Energy Orbs restore a bit of Health.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityexca.value: Excalibur deals increased damage and attacks faster when wielding swords.
Excalibur Prime deals increased damage and attacks faster when wielding swords.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityfros.value: Striking Frost with a melee attack may freeze the attacker.
Striking Frost with a melee attack may freeze the attacker.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityhydr.value: Slam Attacks have a chance to summon a tentacle.
Slam Attacks have a chance to summon a tentacle.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityinar.value: While bleeding-out, Inaros becomes entombed in a protective Sarcophagus. He can revive himself by draining the life-force from nearby enemies and allies.
While bleeding-out, Inaros Prime becomes entombed in a protective Sarcophagus. He can revive himself by draining the life-force from nearby enemies and allies.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitylimb.value: Increased movement, reload and holster speed while inside the Rift.
Increased movement, reload and holster speed while inside the Rift.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityloki.value: Able to hang from walls for extended durations of time.
Able to hang from walls for extended durations of time.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitymag.value: Bullet jumping pulls-in nearby items for easy collection.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitymagp.value: Bullet jumping pulls-in nearby items for easy collection.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitymesa.value: Shoot dual-wielded sidearms faster and reload single-handed sidearms more rapidly. Gain bonus health when not using melee weapons.
Shoot dual-wielded sidearms faster and reload single-handed sidearms more rapidly. Gain bonus health when not using melee weapons.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynekr.value: Restore a small amount of health with every nearby enemy death.
Restore a small amount of health with every nearby enemy death.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynova.value: When knocked-over, emit a defensive burst that topples attacking enemies.
When knocked-over, emit a defensive burst that topples attacking enemies.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynyx.value: Enemies affected by Nyx’s abilities may suddenly choose to lay down their arms.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynyxp.value: Enemies affected by Nyx Prime’s abilities may suddenly choose to lay down their arms.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityober.value: Nearby wildlife fight along-side Oberon Prime.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityrhin.value: Emit a shockwave after landing from a great height.
Emit a shockwave after landing from a great height.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitysary.value: Status Effects inflicted upon enemies last longer.
Status Effects inflicted upon enemies last longer.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitytrin.value: Revive fallen allies faster and from further away.
Revive fallen allies faster and from further away.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityvaub.value: Armor increases with each ally nearby.
Armor increases with each ally nearby.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityvolt.value: Grounded movement generates an electrical charge that is unleashed with the next attack.
Grounded movement generates an electrical charge that is unleashed with the next attack.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityzeph.value: Move with increased agility while airborne and fall more slowly.
Move with increased agility while airborne and fall more slowly.

/lotus/language/syndicates/arbitersdesc.value: The dogmatic Arbiters seek a truth through discipline and practice. They reject the Tenno as Warrior mythology... A lie constructed to limit their potential.

/lotus/language/syndicates/arbitersrewar.value: Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack
Access to Large Team Energy Restore blueprint
Hunted by Eximus Corrupted Lancer Squad
Hunted by Eximus Corrupted Lancer Platoon

/lotus/language/syndicates/cephalonrewar.value: Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack
Access to Large Team Shield Restore blueprint
Hunted by Eximus Scavenger Drone Squad
Hunted by Eximus Scavenger Drone Platoon

/lotus/language/syndicates/cephalonsudad.value: A vast consciousness watching with a curious eye. Seemingly devoid of emotion, Suda's thirst for knowledge and abhorrence of destruction can only be described as passionate.

/lotus/language/syndicates/conclavedesc.value: A warrior only grows if they face the ultimate enemy. Themselves.

/lotus/language/syndicates/conclaverewar.value: Access to Uncommon Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Rare Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Augment Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Rare Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Conclave Weapon Skins and other items.

/lotus/language/syndicates/favors_insuff.value: Insufficient Standing; |REP| more Standing is required to purchase this.

/lotus/language/syndicates/favors_mustre.value: You must choose a reward before exiting.

/lotus/language/syndicates/librarydesc.value: Through Synthesis we can rebuild and preserve. Create memory-immortals within this data oasis. Will you become enlightened, Tenno? Will you hunt for me?

/lotus/language/syndicates/newlokadesc.value: Only through the restoration of a pure humanity and the repopulation of Earth can the conflict end. The New Loka are worshipers of the human form and Earth, before its corruption.

/lotus/language/syndicates/newlokareward.value: Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack
Access to Large Team Health Restore blueprint
Hunted by Eximus Ancient Healer Squad
Hunted by Eximus Ancient Healer Platoon

/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinreward2.value: Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack

/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinreward3.value: Access to Large Team Energy Restore blueprint

/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinsequenc.value: A collective of brilliant and powerful merchants, splintered from the Corpus. Their goal is to restore order by bringing prosperity and direction to the violent world they study.

/lotus/language/syndicates/redveildesc.value: The Veil see corruption all around them. They are honor-bound to heal the system through a great and violent purge. No cost too great, no blood too precious.

/lotus/language/syndicates/redveilreward.value: Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack
Access to Large Team Ammo Restore blueprint

/lotus/language/syndicates/steelmeridian.value: Led by a battle-hardened Grineer deserter, the Steel Meridian fight a guerrilla war against a vast enemy. They are sworn protectors of what little remains of the colonies.
Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack
Access to Large Team Health Restore blueprint

/lotus/language/syndicates/syndicate_wor.value: Mastery Rank 3 and Syndicate affiliation required.

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourdoubleju.value: Double Jump - Tap <JUMP> while in the air

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourglidesho.value: Attacking Aim Glide - <JUMP> then hold <AIM_WEAPON> and shoot <PRE_ATTACK> when target appears

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourgrabshoo.value: Wall Latch (Timed) - Hold <AIM_WEAPON> near the wall

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourhighjump.value: Bullet Jump (Aim Direction) - Aim up then <PRE_CROUCH> and tap <JUMP>
Bullet Jump (Aim Direction) - Aim up then <HOLD_CROUCH> and tap <JUMP>
Bullet Jump (Aim Direction) - Aim up then <PRE_CROUCH> and tap <JUMP>

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourjumpdire.value: Wall Dash - Control direction with <MOVE_X> while holding <JUMP>
Wall Dash - Control direction with <MOVE_X> <MOVE_X:INVERT=1> while holding <JUMP>
Wall Dash - Control direction with <MOVE_X> while holding <JUMP>

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourwalljump.value: Wall Dash (Across) - Jump onto wall and hold <JUMP>
Wall Dash (Up) - Jump onto wall, <MOVE_Z> holding <JUMP>

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourziplineh.value: Zipline - Tap <USE> near zipline to mount

/lotus/language/tutorial/synthesistutori.value: <MINI_INVENTORY_HOLD> Equip the synthesis scanner from the inventory wheel
Scan all points on the target to synthesize it
Use the synthesis scanner to track the trail of energy signatures left by the target
Deploying a kinetic siphon trap slows down the target for a short time

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialmeleech.value: Hold <MELEE_CHANNEL> to channel energy into melee weapon

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialrescuee.value: Survey the area and proceed with caution!

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_ashdesc.value: Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat. Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_emberdesc.value: Ember is a nightmare for light-armored targets. Ember can super-heat the air, which opens up surprising crowd-control possibilities.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_excaliburdesc.value: The perfect training Warframe: the Excalibur suit allows players to explore the power of Warframes with a balanced set of capabilities.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_founderspacka.value: ALL FOUNDERS PACKAGES INCLUDE IMMEDIATE CLOSED BETA ACCESS

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_founderspackd.value: Being a Founder has its privileges. Snag exclusive itmes that will never be available again, PLUS instant access to the Closed Beta!

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_frostdesc.value: By channeling moisture and vapor in the surrounding environment, Frost creates formidable defenses and lethal attacks from sub-zero conditions.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_helpshapefutu.value: HELP SHAPE THE FUTURE OF WARFRAME

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_lokidesc.value: Desired by advanced players, Loki offers a variety of reconfiguring abilities. The abnormality of Loki's powers allows players to manipulate the battlefield.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_magdesc.value: With full command of surrounding magnetic energy, Mag is an expert at enemy manipulation. She is a perfect choice for players that want to deal heavy damage in unconventional ways.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_noaccount.value: Don't have an account? Sign Up!

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_nyxdesc.value: Mind control and psychic attacks make Nyx a very dangerous foe. Her ability to reach into enemy consciousness and manipulate their behavior can turn the tide of any battle.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_rhinodesc.value: Rhino is the heaviest of all the Warframes. His strength enables him to combine a mix of devastating offensive attacks with formidable defensive powers.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_trinitydesc.value: Trinity is great for players who prefer a supportive role. Warframes with healing technologies are rare making Trinity a great equalizer when the odds are stacked against the Tenno.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_upgradedesc.value: Upgrade your Founders Package and only pay the difference from your original purchase.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_voltdesc.value: Volt can create and harness electrical elements. This is a high-damage Warframe perfect for players who want a potent alternative to gun-play.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_warframesdesc.value: Warframe exo-armor uses unique combative technology to create the ultimate weaponry. The Warframes hold many mysterious powers and mastering one requires dedicated use.
