/tutorial/completedlearnaiming.value: You got it. Always aim before shooting.

/tutorial/completedlearnmeleeattack.value: Good. Remember to use this move when you are close to an enemy.

/tutorial/completedlearntodestroy.value: Didn't that make you feel good?

/tutorial/energytrap.value: The Glaive weapon is also an 'Energy Trap'. It can absorb energy from elements in the environment.

/tutorial/learnaiming.value: Now try to aim at the flying holy water pedestal.

/tutorial/learnmeleeattack.value: To do a melee attack, press <MENU_CANCEL>. When you get close to an enemy, you can do a finishing move by pressing this action key.

/tutorial/learntodestroy.value: Some things are destroyable, try to destroy both statues.

/tutorial/lookaround.value: Pushing the Right Thumb stick will move your camera around.

/tutorial/moveforward.value: Pushing the Left Thumb stick will move your character.

/tutorial/opendoor.value: Approach the door and press <MENU_CANCEL> to use the door.

/tutorial/shootpadlock.value: Press and Hold L1 to Aim, Press R2 to fire your current weapon. Practice by shooting the pad lock off the door.

/tutorial/thetorch.value: Try creating a source of fire. Using your Glaive, transfer electricity to the gas leak nearby.

/tutorial/tuaimbody.value:
PRESS <AIM_WEAPON> TO AIM
WITHOUT AIMING, YOUR ACCURACY IS SEVERELY REDUCED
SHOOT THE LOCK OFF THE DOOR TO PROGRESS

/tutorial/tubasicbody.value:
USE <MOVE_Z> TO MOVE
USE <LOOK_X> TO LOOK

/tutorial/tucoverbody.value:
TAP <ACTION> NEAR WALLS AND LOW OBJECTS TO TAKE COVER
HOLD <AIM_WEAPON> WHEN YOU WANT TO POP OUT AND SHOOT
PRESS <ACTION> (OR MOVE AWAY) TO LEAVE COVER MODE
TAKING COVER IS CRUCIAL TO YOUR SURVIVAL

/tutorial/tudodgebody.value: MOVE <MOVE_Z> AND TAP <ACTION> TO DODGE IN ANY DIRECTION

/tutorial/tudualwieldbody.value:
GLAIVE AND HANDGUNS CAN BE USED TOGETHER
TARGET <AIM> THE HIGHLIGHTED MECHANISM ON THE WALL AND HIT IT WITH YOUR GLAIVE <AIM_POWER>
QUICKLY SHOOT <PRE_ATTACK> THE TEMPORARILY EXPOSED LOCK BEFORE IT CLOSES

/tutorial/tufinisherbody.value:
TAP <MELEE_ACTION> NEXT TO A HIGHLIGHTED ENEMY
TO PERFORM A DEADLY FINISHING MOVE

/tutorial/tusprintbody.value:
HOLD <ACTION> TO SPRINT
USE <MOVE_Z> TO STEER

/weapons/assaultdesc.value: Excellent assault rifle. The range is a bit lacking but made up for in power.

/weapons/c4explosivedesc.value: A common variety of military plastic explosive. Used for detonating sealed metal doors.

/weapons/c4explosivedesccaps.value: A COMMON VARIETY OF MILITARY PLASTIC EXPLOSIVE. USED FOR DETONATING SEALED METAL DOORS.

/weapons/entrydesc.value: This thing is a cannon. Let them close in a bit, first.

/weapons/governorsbody.value:
MILITARY WEAPONS ARE LOCKED WITH INFECTION PROXIMITY SENSORS
THIS WEAPON WILL BURN-OUT WHEN THE CHARGE DETONATES

/weapons/huntingdesc.value: High powered rifle, good for those who like personal space.

/weapons/microdesc.value: Full auto pistol. A bit hard to control but it's well worth the money.

/weapons/pumpdesc.value: This shotgun makes a perfect close-quarters companion.

/weapons/revolverdesc.value: An old six shooter. I've seen it cut through several men in one shot.

/weapons/shotgundesc.value: Sawed of shotgun. Who needs more than two shots, anyway?

/weapons/socomdesc.value: Nice semi-auto. Very reliable piece of hardware.

/weapons/upgradebody.value: Cold War weapon technology pioneered at the Vozro research facility. Upgrades can be applied in the underground marketplace.

/weapons/upgradebodypre.value: Cold War weapon technology pioneered at the Vozro research facility. You'll need to find someone who can apply these upgrades.

/weapons/wu_accuracy_text.value: Decreases recoil and spread of fire.

/weapons/wu_clip_extend_text.value: Expands magazine capacity for more shots between reloads.

/weapons/wu_doubler_text.value: Fires secondary bullet on each shot.

/weapons/wu_enferon_text.value: Each shot is laced with Enferon.

/weapons/wu_puncture_text.value: Shots travel through flesh targets to strike targets beyond.

/weapons/wu_stopping_power_text.value: Bullets have increased chance to knockdown enemies.
